It is quite lightweight which is nice but for someone like me with brown spots and hyperpigmentation it does not provide enough coverage. With a couple of layers it does an ok job but I had to use far too much. Also I found it wearing off quickly and I had to reapply only a couple hours in. Definitely not mask proof either as it came off with my mask. For someone with already nice skin it probably provides a good light base but if you‚Äôre looking for coverage or staying power this missed the mark.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation, it blends well and makes my skin look flawless. Haven‚Äôt used any foundation after using this one. It also lasts long on me without any touch ups. With an oily t-zone I do use a setting powder over it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the holy grail of foundations! My skin looked amazing. It‚Äôs expensive but it‚Äôs worth it IMO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation.  It‚Äôs a great full coverage foundation that doesn‚Äôt settle in pores or looks dull.  It was a instant match no fuss which surprised me. It‚Äôs also soft, smooth, and not too liquidity. My skin tone is super hard to match but this one matches perfectly.  I‚Äôve worn makeup forever(my all time fav Y505), pat mcgrath, fenty, and a few lower cost brands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used high end and drugstore and everything in between. This foundation is PERFECT. Long wearing, lightweight, and doesn't settle. I've also never had such a perfect shade match before. I will repurchase this forever. Worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Color: 4- light, golden.  Highly recommend this product. It‚Äôs light weight and glides onto the skin easily. This is light coverage and I don‚Äôt recommend people with really dry skin to use this. Skin glows after applying this foundation and I‚Äôve repurchased this twice. I only apply a thin layer and am not looking for high coverage. If you apply a really thick layer I find that it tends to get streaky and  makes you look like oily (then you try to use a Kleenex to blotch out the oil look and foundation comes off). In my opinion, I think this foundation is best used as a thin layer, then add your concealer and light powder + setting spray to set the foundation in place.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to try this foundation since it seems like so many people love it and it has a cult following. The coverage is very very light, not even close to its claims of a medium coverage. To build up the coverage you need to use quite a bit of product. It also is not meshing with skin too well (I tried it with both beauty blender and various foundation brushes and even fingers after moisturizing and priming) and it doesn't blur pores.  It does have a nice finish right after you apply it but it doesn't last through the day. Overall I felt underwhelmed as it is a pricey item and you would expect that it would at least cover better than a tinted moisturizer but it doesn't. I think for normal/ combination skin with imperfections like acne scarring or pigmentation the best way to use it is with a medium/full coverage liquid concealer and set it with powder to make it last through the day. Not a good stand alone foundation, probably best for normal skin with no imperfections.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best foundation I have ever used. I‚Äôve been using this now for 6+ years and it is the only foundation that doesn‚Äôt make your breakouts look worse. I have acne-prone, dry, sensitive + Rosacea skin plus scarring and this foundation is the only thing that has made me feel normal on my worst days. If you use a very heavy moisturizer under it, it can look shiny after a few hours, so I‚Äôd recommend if you have oily skin, maybe go with a light moisturizer and/or seal with powder. I have tried to find other foundations as this one is on the pricey side but I cannot find anything to match the results I get from this. It‚Äôs like my skin but so much better! You may need a little extra concealer for the acne scars/pigmentation but it still won‚Äôt look cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super soft, thin and medium covered. Perfect for the summer looks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite foundation ever!! I have tried SO many foundations and this one is it for me. Good coverage without looking cakey, and lots of shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation doesn't really stand a chance against all the mask wearing, especially since I have pretty oily skin. But this is really a beautiful and luxurious foundation that makes your skin glow as it settles over time.  The texture is a little thick probably due to silicone ingredients, but it blends like a dream. I like to either blend with my finger tips or my BH Cosmetics No. 2 brush from the Nazanin Kavari set (fluffier foundation brush).  Because this is lighter in coverage, I use this on better skin days and days when I don't have to wear my mask that often (events where I'm singing or hanging out with close friends/family). But I do believe if I didn't have to wear a mask all the time, I'd be wearing this foundation almost every day.

reviews.review_title: There‚Äôs a reason this is a cult fave
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favourite. Every time I get the urge to try a new foundation (I‚Äôm a makeup junkie and can‚Äôt resist) I always regret it. This is truly the holy grail of foundation. The only foundation that I‚Äôve found blends flawlessly, doesn‚Äôt feel heavy, AND offers coverage. There‚Äôs a reason this is a cult fave...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love LOVE this foundation. I recently started getting blemishes and I wanted something light weight but with good coverage. This foundation was perfect! They do have a full coverage for the same price if this doesn‚Äôt provide enough coverage for you :)

reviews.review_title: Astounded at how bad this is
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This just goes to prove that no two people's skin are alike because this was a zero on a 1 to 10 scale. I'm very glad that Sephora has a return policy because this was a complete strike out. The foundation did not cover despite building it and using primer. It traveled into each of my pores, highlighting every little one. By the end of the day it had migrated into patches all over my face, which looked oily in my t-zone. I was embarrassed to think how it looked all day. I immediately packed this up to send right back to Sephora. A huge disappointment and I'll be heading back to Il Makiage post-haste.

reviews.review_title: THE best foundation I‚Äôve ever used!

reviews.review_text: This foundation was made for my skin, literally every aspect of it is beautiful and perfect and great. My skins pretty dry but no clinging or emphasizing weird spots, even if I don‚Äôt moisturize or prime prior to applying (hey sometimes I‚Äôm lazy). Not only does it legit last all day, but it‚Äôs the first foundation I‚Äôve used that doesn‚Äôt look yuck in some way after several hours. It truly just gradually fades. And a lovely bonus, shade 2 is a first ever dead on match for me. Only took ~20 years. YMMV of course but for this ol gal, I can‚Äôt sing the praises for this product loudly enough. Like I want to stop strangers on the street (sans pandemic, I mean) and insist they try Luminous Silk. She‚Äôs pricey but my god, it is worth every penny.

reviews.review_text: I have the 5.5, it matches my natural skin tone perfectly. I could‚Äôve maybe done 5 or 5.25, but I didn‚Äôt want to look overly pale, I prefer a slight tint. This foundation is amazing and I find it works well with all skin types (dry, oily, combination). The coverage is minimal, it can be buildable however. The coverage itself feels like second skin it is amazing. I can wear this during the day or night. I have yet to find a foundation I love as much as this one besides the makeup forever hd stick foundation (but that one is more for medium-full coverage, camera, or darker settings). I wear armani foundation alone, sometimes I set it with powder or spray. But overall, I wear it alone as a type of tinted moisturizer because the feel and look is stunning. I can use this on a wide range of clients as well especially if they will be in day/sunlight or brighter settings. Pricey but so worth it. I wish they‚Äôd come out with a palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful formulation. Very easy to blend with a blender sponge. It provides a light to medium coverage and leaves the skin soft. Even though it is oil free, it feels moisturizing not chalky.  I like that there are many shades so I pretty much got a perfect match.  There is no strong fragrance.  The pump works well.  It is pricy at 80$ a bottle but I always wait til the Vib discounts and it lasts me three to four months as I only use less than a dime since of the product 5 days of the week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm blown away by this foundation. I read so many reviews before deciding to splurge and I‚Äôm so impressed. 1) the color I got was a PERFECT match. Foundation line where?! It blends so seamless I‚Äôve never had such a perfect shade match  2) I put it on after purchasing over my sunscreen and moisturizer which is not what I do prior to makeup prep. I then went and did 30 mins of HIIT cardio and WOW. The foundation stayed on and still looked amazing!!! I sweat A LOT so this was shocking.  3) it gives the most amazing natural glow.  The foundation looking great after my workout without my normal makeup prep is what got me with this one. I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs going to look even more amazing with my makeup prep. I seriously recommend this. I know it‚Äôs on the pricier side but it is totally worth it. I have combo/oily skin so I know the struggles of looking greasy but I just didn‚Äôt get that with this. Everyone‚Äôs skin is different but I highly recommend trying it even if it‚Äôs a sample!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After I bought this I threw out all my other foundations. All of my money over the years trying to find something for my dry skin. This made my skin look better instantly. If you‚Äôre hesitating because of the price and you have dry skin GET THIS. Worth every cent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

In the photo, the images on the left are right after application (in natural, ring, and regular florescent light), and the images on the right are after 9(top) to 11(bottom) hours.   I am considering picking up a full shade range for my kit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve tried so many foundations but this one works like a charm. Super blendable and stays for long! Get it!

I also mix this with the Charlotte tilbury Hollywood flawless filter and sheers out the foundation a bit more and adds a bit of glow and it‚Äôs my perfect combination.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Shade 4 is a fair/light olive shade match!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The hype around this foundation is real. This is foundation for people who hate foundation. It‚Äôs luminous, weightless, your-skin-but-better coverage that stays in place until you wash your face. I typically go ‚Äúbarefaced‚Äù, dabbing on concealer to hide any redness from rosacea; but some days I have more redness than others (or I just feel like looking ~naturally~flawless)...and on those days I reach for GAB Luminous Silk. 1 pump on the back of my hand, tap tap tap it onto my face, then blend out with a damp bb. Spot conceal if needed, done in less than 2 minutes. No creasing, no caking, no itching, no flares of eczema or rosacea, undetectable once blended...absolutely my HG foundation.   I found my match from reviews that mentioned their shades in other foundations. I hope this can help someone else! I have used:  - MAC F&B C1  - MAC Studio Fix concealer N15, N20 - MUFE Y225 - Fenty 140  - Laura Mercier Secret Camouflage SC-2 - Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer Nude (old formula) - Chanel Vitalumiere Aqua 20B - Bare Minerals BR tinted moisturizer Birch 1.5 - Bare Minerals BR powder Fairly Light - Koh Gen Do Aqua Foundation 213 - Glossier G11 - Kaja concealers Banana Milk, Waffles - Revlon Colorstay 150 Buff  - Hourglass Vanish Seamless Finish Porcelain, Shell   So far, the one foundation to rule them all is GAB Luminous Silk in Shade 4. Anxiously awaiting the arrival of the matching concealer; I imagine that will become a daily staple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The positive is that it feels like you‚Äôre not wearing any foundation. The negatives are that it has little to no coverage. I‚Äôm not kidding, even 5 full pumps of foundation does not cover any blemishes or redness whatsoever. If you have perfect skin and want to spend $80 than I‚Äôd suggest this but I‚Äôm going to return this and exchange it for another foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disliked this foundation. Coverage awful. Followed directions as listed on package for application. Returned. Was really hoping to like this with all the good reviews

reviews.review_title: beautiful but older formulation lasted longer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favourite foundations because of the finish and the shade range. I wear shade number 6. However heres some things you should know before purchasing. It's not long wearing, if you have combination skin that gets oily throughout the day, you will need to touch up your face probably more than once. It transfers, if you‚Äôre looking for something that doesn‚Äôt transfer on phone screens, clothing etc, you probably wont like this. In my opinion this is definitely more of an event type of Foundation or special occasion if you plan on wearing it alone.  I personally like mixing it with my estee lauder double wear.  if you have dryer skin you probably wont experience any of the things listed above.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

It really feels like you're wearing nothing, which to some may be a good thing but I like to feel like I'm putting on makeup to make a difference in my appearance. Not worth it for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this. The packaging and everything is very luxurious. The product did just not work for me. The shade 1.5 is marked for neutral undertone but the shade was very orangy. The foundation did not sit well on my skin it created textures I did not know I had. I was very excited for this. But not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is no foundation like this. It is unmatchable to me. I have combination skin, but it works on my entire face. But I only need a small amount to even out my skintone and it looks flawless, like you‚Äôre wearing nothing, except your skin is glowing and perfected, it makes no sense. The price tag is insane, I‚Äôve repurchased this foundation enough to see the price move up a few dollars over the years but EVEN SO, I have tried other foundations and have never gotten a finish like this. It‚Äôs magic...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After finishing Lancome tient idole, i have been continuously been buying and returning foundations until i found the perfect one. I thought i would never find anything better than tient idole however, i have. This foundation is not only a perfect match, but the epitome of light weight. It did not make my skin feel heavy after a while and I honestly tended to forget i had anything on until i looked in the mirror. I thought that since it said luminous that i would be super oily, however it controlled my oil VERY well.   I have dark spots and felt it would be too sheer to cover them, however with a teeny bit of concealer and with this on top, everything looked wonderful. It is pricey, but definitely worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is worth every penny. I have tried quite a lot of foundations and I go back to this every time. I don‚Äôt have a lot of textures but it covers up my acne spots and dark scars really well without the need of concealer however, concealer do sit really well on top. On days where I lose confidence due to my acne, I can always count on this foundation to bring it all the way back up. Super glowy and hydrating later on in the day. I would recommend anyone using this to put the foundation on an hour prior to heading out. It‚Äôs a dramatic difference!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: MY FAVORITE! You don‚Äôt need to put on a lot because it‚Äôs so silky it‚Äôll cover your whole entire face. It stays on all day and makes you look so smooth. Even though it‚Äôs expensive, the bottle lasts for so long! Definitely must buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this foundation for a long time, and even repurchased it - until I realized that it has been breaking me out the whole time. So I'm back to using my Kevyn Aucoin Skin Tint with no issues, and don't plan on trying Armani foundations ever again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: finally! I found the one for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant on buying this product due to its price but its worth it. I have PCOS so I break out alot and this really makes my face look flawless. I have dry patches, but with this foundation along with fenty hydrating primer you can't tell

reviews.review_title: Unacceptable quality at premiere price point!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying: I have NEVER written a review online before. EVER. But I am so appalled by this sham of a foundation that I have to. I was so excited to finally try this infamously beloved product, which so many celebrities use, which so many make up artists swear by, and which has unilaterally wonderful reviews, but those hopes came crashing down with the first pump.   I tried three application techniques on a prepped and clean face.   1. This has a REPULSIVE chemical smell. I checked my makeup brushes to make sure it wasn‚Äôt them... nope, it‚Äôs a chemical, plasticy, nasty unhealthy smell that made me fear for putting it on my face.  2. The coverage was light but not really buildable. I like light coverage, but you can get $6 light coverage serum foundation from the Ordinary with better quality. Nothing was radiant or buildable about this compared to something like Lanc√¥me Teint Idole or full-covering like Tarte‚Äôs Foundcealer.  3. The texture bothers me the most  .... I want to wash my face because it feels so nasty and sticky! 30 minutes later and it hasn‚Äôt set yet!! I‚Äôm afraid to put more makeup on top because it feels so grimy and I don‚Äôt want to clog my pores. It feels like bad heavy drugstore makeup. Without the coverage!.  4. It doesn‚Äôt apply well over acne scarring or uneven texture! It looks nice on the smooth skin... but I could get that from a less expensive foundation! 5.The only thing I don‚Äôt know is longevity. I will leave it on for a couple hours to see, but it feels so gross in the meantime.  If I wanted a basic foundation that did a basic job, this would work. It‚Äôs not the worst. But this is pathetically low quality for the price point, the hype, the tacky texture, DID I MENTION THE SMELL?? ... I expected something silky and radiant and delightful, and this is none of those. The hype of this is only branding...  go with the Ordinary or Lanc√¥me or Tarte for a better price, and steer clear of this waste of money and resources!!!!

reviews.review_title: Fabulous for a lasting, natural, glowy look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved this foundation for years. I keep trying new ones but keep coming back to this. It lasts well and make you look polished but natural all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Great product, my go-to for now
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to try this foundation on a whim due to the high price point, and all I can say is I am happy that I gave this foundation a chance. As for my oily spots, a little bit of powder helps set the foundation in. Then I end it with a spray of rose water and it all evens out nicely. I am overall happy with this product. I gave it four stars instead of five because towards the afternoon I feel like I need to touch up. I can start to see my acne scars, and a uneven skin tone. Also the price is a bit painful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

Primed with Too Faced Hangover and applied the foundation with a Beauty Blender. It looked amazing for a few minutes but it set into a matte, powdery finish that showcased every fine line, imperfection, and pore (and I‚Äôve got pretty good skin!). Will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Note that I have oily skin This is BY FAR THE BEST foundation I have ever tried and I  have tried them all I swear by it. I did not know that a foundation could be great until I invested in it. Even my boyfriend noticed how good it looked. I dont know if a guy who doesnt wear makeup is a reference but whatever. Put that thing in your basket thank me later.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first foundation I haven‚Äôt hated!! Not saying I‚Äôve tried 50 foundations, but every single one I‚Äôve tried in the past either felt like I had a layer of literal paint on my face, was so full coverage I looked like a piece of paper with no dimension or it was super oily looking (I have skin on the dryer side.) I‚Äôve heard amazing things about this foundation but was hesitant to try it given my past foundation experience.. I received a sample of this in another Sephora order and instantly fell in love. It‚Äôs expensive, yes, but worth it. I only use about a pump and it looks natural while still providing coverage. You can certainly add more to build up your coverage but I prefer a lighter foundation - almost like a tinted moisturizer. It‚Äôs super easy to blend out and have had no problem with it. I also have extremely sensitive skin and have had absolutely no problem. If my sensitive skin can handle it, it can handle anyone‚Äôs!! I once had an allergic reaction and hives from the perfume a store used on a shirt I bought there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is 100% worth it. It really lives up to its hype. Absolutely no oiliness, but it‚Äôs not dry like a matte either. It sets onto your skin like a dream. The price is quite high, but if it‚Äôs a great quality foundation that you truly love, do not hesitate! I guessed my shade online and it turned out to be perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

The foundation is buildable to full coverage and light weight on the skin. You literally feel like there‚Äôs nothing on your face. This is without a doubt the best foundation on the market.‚Ä¶ And I‚Äôve tried most of them.

reviews.review_title: Do yourself a favour and buy this

reviews.review_text: I have tried a million other kinds of foundation looking for an alternative with a lower price point. I assure you there are none. This provides a smooth, flawless, skin- like luminous finish that is second to none. Kim K uses this and I can see why

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

I think I was steered towards this solely for the price and not my concerns.  Very disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is a disgrace to foundation. It‚Äôs horrible.   It‚Äôs expensive, you‚Äôve got to use a bunch of product and setting spray and even then it‚Äôs splotchy around the nose, cheek, and lip area after a few hours. I‚Äôve never hated a foundation the way I do this one. I‚Äôve used drug store foundations that were a better quality and a fraction of the price. I really don‚Äôt see the hype at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My staple foundation. The color I use is actually 6.5 but it keeps populating as 7.8 above. I have an olive skin tone with combo skin and an oily t zone, but this is still my favorite foundation to date. I combat the slight oil and touch top with either KVD Vegan Beauty Setting Powder or Charlotte Tilbury Airbrush Flawless Finish in the shade Fair.   I‚Äôm currently giving the Dior Forever Skin Glow Foundation a try since the Sephora location I visited didn‚Äôt carry this brand in their store. I do think it‚Äôs another good foundation option for combo skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely my favorite foundation from Sephora. It is lightweight and natural-looking, great for everyday wear. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail foundation!  Every once in a while, I get enticed by some trending foundation and they just never compare.  I always go back to this foundation.

reviews.review_title: Nice Finish! Sheer to medium coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light to medium coverage foundation with a great finish and easily blended in. I would not recommend this for oily skin. I heard the Loreal Lumi true match foundation is a 'dupe' for this makeup. I've been using the Loreal for a while, and the Armani makeup is not exactly the same, but pretty close! Can't decide to stick with this $$$ or stay with Loreal $.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this was a full coverage foundation since I hear so much about it and how Kim K uses it. Since it looks like she has tons of foundation on, I figured this was full coverage but I was wrong. This foundation is definitely for faces that are blemish, scarring and dark spot free. My face has an uneven tone and a few acne scars but isn‚Äôt that bad to where I need superior coverage. I prefer medium but buildable to full, if needed. This is extremely light foundation. I had to use so much just to get good coverage and even then it was barely medium coverage. There is no way that expensive foundation will last a month. I use foundation almost everyday and the amount I have to use, will deplete it fast. Once it dried, it was really nice and looked so natural. It is definitely a beautiful foundation and it matched really well to my skin tone. It was a little light but still blended pretty well. Definitely luminous to where it‚Äôs transferable. Even with setting powder, it transferred to my shirt. I always place my face on my shoulder just to see if it would transfer and it did. I returned it, not only because I don‚Äôt want it to transfer onto my SO shirt but also, it‚Äôs too expensive to keep buying if I have to use so much. FYI: I am fair, neutral warm color and 4 was pretty spot on. I applied with brush and blender. Both looked good but blender needed way more product to give me enough coverage. I prefer brush application. My face is dry and it didn‚Äôt bring out any dry patches. It was a nice dewy and luminous foundation.

reviews.review_text: This foundation lives up to the hype. I normally stick to the Dior backstage and NARS luminous silk foundation but this has the best full coverage without looking Cakey, I don‚Äôt have to build it up either. It looks like skin and keeps my combo/ oily slef in check lol

I love that it is sensitive skin friendly. For anyone who is allergic to alcohol and Fragrance it is approved by me. But coverage and application, not good. reviews.review_title: 60 shades & not one for this Latina

reviews.review_text: I fell In love with this foundation years ago, to the point I would buy 3 different shades to mix and get ‚Äúa perfect match‚Äù even then it was alittle off. The Armani counter girls even said I just don‚Äôt have a shade in Armani. For reference I am a yellow/golden/olive Latina. In the winter I am Est√©e Lauder rattan, & summer I am fawn. It‚Äôs so frustrating that after all of these years Armani can‚Äôt get REAL skin tones right. All the colors are hideously rosy pink or orange. I would know, I pretty much tried every shade between 4-6. I believe 6 wasn‚Äôt orange but just way to dark for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, I like this foundation.  I have redness and dry skin, and this evens out my skin tone and glides over any fine lines.  The good: The finish is lovely.  It's luminous without being shiny, and made my skin look natural and glowey.  It takes about 2 pumps of product to cover my face, so I bet this bottle will last a couple of months.  Oh! also: I have a huge problem with my laugh lines creasing with most foundations, this one did not have that problem at all.  I didn't see it settle into any fine lines.  It smells like baby powder, which is a plus for me.  The bad: I have peach fuzz on my face, and this is one of those foundations that, if not applied correctly, will enhance the visibility of that.  I have to work the foundation in a bit more, and that problem is mostly resolved.     Another issue is that my match from the Sephora Color Match thing wasn't great.  My other favorite foundation is in shade BR40, and the equivalent for this foundation is 5.1.  The real life color is lighter than the photograph, and is a bit too light and on the cool side for my skin tone, but nothing some bronzer can't fix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

Wanted to love it but it‚Äôs not for everyone.

Researching, I believe it said the LSF gave a medium coverage whereas power fabric is supposed to be full. See very minimal difference in coverage -- just the finish is different. reviews.review_title: HOLY GRAIL Armani you DID that
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of THE best foundations I have ever tried if not THE BEST foundation. As a makeup artist, I like a foundation that applies easily and blends quickly and this does just that. It blends into the skin so well and looks like skin. It feels light and never heavy or cakey. Even after doing several layers, I never find it to be cakey looking. The coverage is medium, but buildable to a more full-medium coverage but I don't think it can get to full coverage. Its easy to play around with how much coverage you want without over doing it. I can even get a very light coverage if used with a damp sponge. There's a light scent which is pleasant and not overpowering at all, I only smell it when first applied and then it fades quickly. I never had any problem with breakouts while using this and I'm very acne prone and have perioral dermatitis that is triggered by a lot of products. It makes my skin look smooth and airbrushed and I have very textured skin so that's saying a LOT. I also have VERY oily skin and with a powder and setting spray I can get 8-hours of wear out of this easily. It does tend to crease in my smile lines but everything does that on me and I chalk it up to my slightly oily sunscreen I use underneath this product. I always get compliments when I wear this, my skin looks smooth and silky and I just adore the way it blends with my skin, almost like a bb cream. Its perfect for all skin types, my sister uses it and has very dry skin and its moisturizing and doesn't cling to dry patches. Try this out, you will not be disappointed. The price is high, but its WELL worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly did not understand the hype over this foundation. It is super light coverage in my opinion and I need to use A LOT of product to get a slightly medium coverage - and I've only used a brush. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Worth the money. Srsly. Wear it to look like you always look this fantastic, you roll out of bed this way. Plaid shirt not included but it should be.

reviews.review_text: WOW! I don‚Äôt normally leave reviews, but I absolutely love this foundation. I finally decided to splurge and switch up from Estee Lauder‚Äôs Double Wear foundation. I didn‚Äôt know it was possible to not look cakey or powdery to a degree when wearing makeup, but this foundation truly looks like a second skin. I don‚Äôt get cakey creases or bunching up around my nose or mouth anymore either. Personally, I‚Äôve only needed to use one pump. I‚Äôve been using the Tarte Timeless Smoothing Primer with this foundation; the two work beautifully together. All in all, I found my new favorite foundation!

Over all lasting power is pretty good as well. I‚Äôd totally repurchase this. Recommend for dry, normal even combo skin with the right primer it‚Äôll work. I have combo skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this. It was recommended to me by a friend who also ‚Äúclaimed‚Äù to have dry skin and this made her skin flawless. Plot twist I think she lied...girl was blessed with a flawless face and this enhanced it for sure. That said, it does just that. If you‚Äôve got good skin, this takes it up a level. But I suffer from dry skin due to hormones, and I found it didn‚Äôt sit nicely, no matter how I applied it. Sometimes my skin was good for a day, and it looked great. Or while my skin was moist (god I hate that word) it made my foundation look flawless...till a few hours later. Unfortunety it also made me break out. During quarantine I changed up my routine and stopped wearing this makeup. Put it on again for the first time ever, and boom, acne a few hours later. My skin was clear this morning. So, if you don‚Äôt have dry and sensitive skin, this probably will make you look so so good. It does a decent job covering blemishes, and really does go on flawless...when you have good skin to begin with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to swear by this foundation until I found some other ones that cost less and work much better for me personally. It‚Äôs a good foundation, but I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs worth $64. I think it could be a better option for oily skin. It looked more like a soft matte than a natural finish on my dry/combo skin. It has good coverage and it‚Äôs pretty buildable. I‚Äôve found that the Dior Forever Skin Glow is a much better medium coverage foundation for my skin and it‚Äôs $12 cheaper. It‚Äôs a good foundation and better than most that I‚Äôve tried. It just didn‚Äôt really live up to the hype or give me that ‚Äúlit from within glow‚Äù that everyone talks about. It‚Äôs pretty hit or miss depending on your skin type. If you have oily skin, it could potentially be a really good option though!

reviews.review_title: great if your skin is flawless

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I read reviews but rarely write them. This is the best. THE BEST. I used to hate foundation. I opted for mineral powder. Tinted moisturizer. I just didn‚Äôt like the feel or a mask like quality that can happen with foundation. Since I turned 40 and the goal is of course...to keep looking youthful; I started trying different brands and formulas. I like something that looks like I‚Äôm wearing nothing but I have flawless skin. Btw I do not. When I take the Sephora tests for skin product recos I could check every box except acne. Finally at 40 that cleared. So there‚Äôs evidence some faint evidence of prior issues. My pores are big. I‚Äôve got one on my nose so big it looks like I used to have a nose ring. Anyways...this is the most expensive by volume there‚Äôs a reason for it. It‚Äôs absolutely the best. Sometimes I have to layer in spots because it‚Äôs not really full coverage by I like the result. I have tried pretty much all the luxury and mid range brands. Nothing compares to this. I also wear NARS sometimes but it‚Äôs very heavy and has that mask like quality that works great for a FULL face look with heavy eye makeup but I don‚Äôt like it for every day. This is THE bomb foundation and worth every penny.

reviews.review_title: WHY CAN'T I FIND A PROPER SHADE MATCH?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me just start by saying that I love this foundation. Why three stars, then, you ask? Because I can't find my SHADE! I wore 6.5 for years, although admittedly it was always a bit 'off'...a bit too dark maybe? A bit too...something lol. But I wore it anyway because I ADORE this formula and everything about the foundation. Then, I decided to purchase shade 5.75 thinking it would be a better match--no dice. Still too much pink in the undertone.   Last week, I was bored, *thank u isolation*, so i decided to purchase a new LS...I decided, after studying EVERY shade swatch image and video available on the internet, to try shade 6 *blindly*. Well, big mistake. It is far too green for my undertone to handle, and once applied, my skin looks literally grey. It's horrific.  NARS Radiant creamy concealer in 'Macadamia' is my perfect shade match. I rarely wear foundation, so i dont really have another reference. I'm not sure why I can't find a match in LS... Maybe I have to go directly to Armani, since their website offers waaaay more shade options than Sephora.   If anyone reads this, and cares to help me with a shade recommendation, I would love that so much.
