reviews.review_title: There's a reason this is a cult favorite product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for about 8 years and it's my only foundation in my drawer now. I went through a makeup hoarding phase during my 20s but nowadays I'm not such a fiend for the stuff. I don't wear makeup most days but when I do, this is the foundation I keep on hand. I'm very curious about the expanded color range. I've used shade no. 2 all these years but I may try 1.5 next time I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Somewhat luminous coverage while not being tacky on the face. Not too dewy, not too dry. Looks pretty natural. You need to blot a lot more with your damp beauty blender, otherwise it drags easy and leaves splotches if you aren't careful. Overall I wish I had bought this sooner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give this foundation a million stars I would, Ive used it since I was 16, I found at that young age it was far to expensive so I switched to Twofaced but immediately went back to Armani, it is worth every penny, I struggle with acne, but you would never know wearing this foundation, absolutely obsessed with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My go to foundation, very natural and silky. Doesn‚Äôt break me out either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loooovvveeee! This is perfect for a no make up/makeup look. It‚Äôs a beautiful thin luminous finish. This will sit right next to my Pat McGrath foundation. If your looking for medium/ full coverage this is not for you. I think I‚Äôm gonna get 13.25 as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For my mature, combination skin I‚Äôve had a difficult time finding a foundation that didn‚Äôt leave my skin looking dry and over emphasizing my lines and wrinkles...this foundation had been my holy grail. It‚Äôs lightweight, doesn‚Äôt set into wrinkles and fine lines, and it doesn‚Äôt make my skin look dry.

reviews.review_title: Good product, a lot of work to build full coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great foundation, but if you are looking for full coverage this is not it. You definitely have to build and layer for a full coverage look and one layer is pretty thin. If I‚Äôm paying that much for foundation, I don‚Äôt want to put that much effort... lol. But I think if you have beautiful skin naturally that isn‚Äôt uneven and you wear sheer to light coverage already, you would LOVE this! Again, not a bad product‚Äî it just depends what your expectations are. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have bought this over and over again. The holy grail in my opinion. Never thought I would pay this much for a foundation but it last awhile, has easy packaging, and is just so worth it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this a while back because of all the rave reviews on it, and I will admit I purchased it because Kim Kardashian uses it, and I think her skin always looks pretty good, even though I don't care for her much.  This will not make your skin look like silk, or make it luminous.  For over 60 bucks, if you don't get the shade right with the undertone, it will wash you out, and than you will rather have to use it, throw it away, or hope you can return it.  It is definitely more on the matte side.  So if you don't like a matte look at all, don't purchase it.  I also thought it made me look ashy, and I have cool undertones to my skin. Again, for the hype, I think there are other products that are better for cheaper, or even ones that have a similar price point that make you not looked washed out and like death.  Very disappointed.  If you like a flatter, more matte look, than it may be worth a try.  Definitely get a sample and wear it before you spend over 60 bucks on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shade matched perfectly and the coverage was great! Also, it was long lasting. Definitely will repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has flawless beautiful coverage that is incomparable to other foundations. However....  this breaks my skin out soooooo bad. After stopping use for almost a year, I purchased. After first use, I broke out with tiny pimples all over my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation offered ZERO coverage. I highly dislike it. It‚Äôs too watery and very creasey. It settled into my fine wrinkles and made them even more noticeable. I don‚Äôt get what the hype is all about.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation ever! I have been using this product in color 5.5 for 2 years and it has never disappointed. Does not stick to dry spots or melt off in hot/steamy environments. Buildable coverage but definitely on the lighter side - cannot get extremely full coverage with this product alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First off I love the shade range! It is so easy to find not only your perfect shade, but also your perfect undertone. It is also a buildable foundation which is something I like because somedays I want a more full coverage day and others I want a more natural look. Has become my everyday foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin with some acne scars and uneven texture, this foundation masks it all and makes my skin look perfect. Love it and will definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After trying a few samples of the Armani Luminous Silk Foundation and absolutely loving the finish, I finally decided to take the plunge and purchase the full size bottle. The foundation has a natural finish and buildable coverage that blends seamlessly into the skin and is very long wearing. Every time I wear this foundation, I always get compliments on my skin. It‚Äôs amazing! I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: FAVORITE FOUNDATION hands down. This foundation is like any other! I usually have to purchase 2 to stock up. The name is perfect silk foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love the consistency of this foundation. feels great on your skin. just wasn‚Äôt worth the money in my opinion. if you‚Äôre going to splurge get the tom ford stick foundation. also a drugstore dupe is the fitme dewy foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loveeeee this foundation! Albeit you can only use it on your *good* skin days (or with a heavy concealer on your not-so-good days), as it would be a medium-light coverage for me, but DANG does it make my skin look amazing! Also side note, the colors on the pictures/bottle looks darker, so if you‚Äôre unsure about color just use the foundation match feature.  Lasting power is also great, but all the five stars go towards how amazing this looks on my skin. Unparalleled, and by far my favorite foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this foundation on and off for over 7 years. I would periodically take a break and use other highly recommended foundations, but nothing ever came close to this. Its is somehow both dewy and matte, hard to explain.. but so stunning. And more importantly its very buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not as much coverage as I expected for something marked as medium coverage, but very silky! It doesn't cake up and it applies nicely. For a natural glow, I first apply my liquid Anastasia highlighter and then apply this on top. Def makes my pictures pop and helps with the lack of coverage I usually like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm sure this is great for younger skin. I was surprised how dry and matte it looked, even with carefully prepped skin (moisturizer and primer). I wouldn't recommend it for anyone over 50.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have worn this foundation for 5 years and nothing compares for a dewy, fresh look. Photographs beautifully.  My only regret is that they have discounted the fluid sheer- which I typically mixed with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite foundation! It‚Äôs absolutely worth every penny. It looks flawless on my skin, and doesn‚Äôt break apart throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many foundations with no luck and this one is my absolute favorite. I have been using for about 2 years now and I still absolutely love it. I was never able to find a foundation that made my skin look the way I wanted and I was constantly trying different ones, but when you put this on, it just feels different. You can apply a little for natural coverage or apply more for a different look. I am so happy with it and never switching

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm oily so I put off buying this foundation for years and I‚Äôm so mad at myself for doing that because I‚Äôm in love with it!! It‚Äôs so natural and lightweight on the skin. Just buy it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down, my favorite foundation (and I have tried A LOT).   I have dry skin and most foundations end up looking cakey/patchy on my skin after a couple of hours. This foundation is relatively light and keeps my face looking silky and smooth - it's definitely buildable if you want a fuller coverage. My sister has combo type skin - she has drier skin than me but also has oilier areas and while she doesn't rave about it, she likes this foundation too.   I have been sticking to this since I started using it 6 years ago. There's a few foundations that have come close to this and I still use those occasionally, but this is my everyday go-to foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was the first time I purchased foundation. I had been using tinted moisturizer (Laura Mercier) but found myself needing more coverage as I age and have gotten more sun spots. I felt like this provided great natural looking coverage. It was the perfect transition from tinted moisturizer into foundation. The only downside is the match color that Sephora reps gave me was too light for my skin. I will see if I can exchange it for a darker shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this Foundation! Yeah I cringed when I handed my card to pay but it‚Äôs soooo worth it. I‚Äôm oily and this foundation still worked wonders. My pores weren‚Äôt noticeable and I just put on powder and it lasted the whole day. This and the Dior Backstage are my holy grail foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After 30-plus years of searching, I have found it. The Holy Grail foundation. This is it, I‚Äôm done. I‚Äôve been using MUFE liquid foundation (the original and the newer HD) for a decade, and while it was almost perfect, I have been searching for a foundation that makes me look like I‚Äôm not actually wearing foundation. And I‚Äôve tried everything, every brand. I avoided trying this one because of the price. But... this is it. This is The One. The Luminous Silk is: - a perfect color match - better without primer! Yay no primer needed - lightweight - great coverage but your skin still looks like skin - floats over the skin, minimizing pores, does not settle into fine lines AT ALL - long wearing, does not oxidize - mattifying (and I have super oily skin) - transfer proof This is really it. You‚Äôve done it. I‚Äôd give this 10 shiny stars if I could.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Speedy   Speedy but worth it!  Excellent coverage with just a little bit.  It is creamy and feels rich.  Provides easy, even skin tone after applying.  I‚Äôve used it for years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Used the Sephora color match from my Dior product and the match was spot on. Wonderful natural finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this makeup.  I have older skin and it gives a flawless finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for years, it makes your skin look flawless , you add coverage or give the appearance of a flawless complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING! Looks so natural, applied with a beauty blender! Second time repurchasing and I will continue to! It is expensive but for the amazing finish I cant complain! Lasts allllll day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail foundation. I am so picky when it comes to foundation but this foundation is really good. its glowy and provides full coverage. I recommend this foundation to all skin types because the glow is not over and it doesnt make any face type greasy or oily. it also stays in place for a long time. I do not set it always as my skin is a bit dry and it stays perfectly on my skin for a very long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had to try this after hearing the hype. It absolutely is perfect. it is light but provides unbelievable coverage that matched my skin tone perfectly. The texture is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this in-store, and thought I would love it based on the reviews. Unfortunately, it didn‚Äôt work on my dry skin. I find it cakey and hard to blend, and it feels really heavy on. I tried both a brush and a beauty blender, and neither looked very good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i‚Äôm 14, my mom got me this. i think it rly compatible with my acne prone skin and i find it rly easy to blend and lightweight. gives your skin a wonderful, flawless but natural look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite foundations ever! I love how natural It looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don‚Äôt understand the hype around this foundation. I have bought it twice (years apart) and returned it twice. Don‚Äôt let the name fool you, this is not luminous. It is very dry and matte. Skip it, there are better foundations for less money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation! I use the #6 & #4. I use the lighter shade under my eyes and the darker shade all over. It stays put all day, and it has a really smooth and matte finish. Overall, the quality is amazing and I really prefer this foundation over all my other foundations if I want a really long lasting look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail foundation! I have oily skin and this is one of the very few foundations that really lasts all day and leaves me without shine. It also looks super natural and doesn't get cakey, especially after I've been wearing it for hours which is usually a problem for me with other foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely hate this, was inspired to purchase off YouTube Influencers. I have dry skin and this foundation didn‚Äôt melt into my skin instead stayed on top of the surface clinging onto my dry patches. Made me look. Cakey. The worst especially how expensive it is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite foundation for so many years! I love the coverage it gives my skin with a dewy finish. I always go back to this. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Dry and combo skin will love
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite, favorite foundation. The shade range is amazing too. It's hard for me to find a foundation match because I'm not quite tanned but I'm not white so I'm like this light olive color and 5.75 is my perfect match. The foundation does oxidize though, which I believe all do. The foundation gives a beautiful healthy, vibrant finish. I'm a guy and I wear it every day and most people cannot tell that I'm wearing foundation and compliment my skin, but I guess how natural it applies would depend on how you choose to apply it and how much of it you apply. I also purchased a shade or two lighter and apply that like it was concealer lol! 4 out of 5 stars because the price is a little outrageous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible foundation for oily skin. Extremely disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation is a nice, natural, satin finish. At first when I tried it with a primer I didn‚Äôt like it at all. I didn‚Äôt understand what the hype was. Then I read that someone said don‚Äôt use a primer with it. It goes on soooo much smoother without a primer. Very natural looking, not a lot of coverage.  Nothing that is a game changer for me though, so the price point would deter me from this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don‚Äôt wear foundation but if I decide to this is my pick for fall winter. I received a sample card with an order and decided to try it. Recently started wearing a skin tint which really doesn‚Äôt have much coverage but I‚Äôm good with that. I don‚Äôt like the feel of foundation on my face. So I use the smallest amount of tint to help in giving me a smoother finish like a primer for example but with a bit of tint.  In trying this particular foundation I love that it feels weightless and doesn‚Äôt look like I‚Äôm wearing foundation. It‚Äôs closest to a tint-like but with a little more coverage. Now I only apply minimal. Face looks Smooth, blush applies smoother and gives a dewy look to skin. I don‚Äôt think I would necessarily like it for summer though because my T zone can get a bit olily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I tried this foundation was in one of the free samples they send with purchases. I instantly fell in love and have been buying this foundation for the past 2 years. If I am wearing makeup, I never go without this. It is one of the only foundations that manages to perfectly smooth, make imperfections flawless while letting natural skin to glow through, with comfortable long wear that HAS NOT broken me out. This foundation brings true attention to the beauty that is already your face and simply taking it to the next level. I am emphasizing this because lots of foundations tend to do so. If you haven't had the chance to try this yet, I highly recommend getting a sample either online or from one of the employees in the store and seeing for yourself just how life-changing it is! <3

reviews.review_title: REALLY wish it had worked for me...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, the good. I‚Äôm 65 with good skin. I was oily most of my life with intermittent breakouts but now my skin is dry and I almost never break out. This foundation has a fantastic finish with medium coverage (on me) and the shade was dead on. It made my skin look and feel fantastic. However it does have alcohol in it. I wish I had paid more attention before purchasing. My bad. It irritated my skin for the first 10 minutes or so and then settled down. But then I started to get a few breakouts that I hadn‚Äôt had in years so I had to return it. If it works for your skin, DEFINITELY get it. Fantastic finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation ever! Tried so many, but this is the best. So silky, doesn‚Äôt dry out and looks natural. Lots of shades, everyone can have their colour! Price point is a little up there, but completely worth it!

reviews.review_title: Would not buy any other foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Bought it for my wedding it was amazing all day and I still use it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this makeup, it is amazing on my skin, but it is just not made for fair skin. I've tried shade 2, 3, and 3.75. When they released 1.5, I immediately bought it. I've been worried recently because I was getting more sun and my skin was darker than my normal foundation. I was hoping *this* time this foundation would work. Nope. 1.5 is extremely yellow and was several shades darker than my skin. I am pale, but I run outside every day. I know redheads/fair skinned people with much lighter skin than me so I'm not super pale. Yet again, I'm left disappointed. Please make more shades Armani!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely light weight with great coverage. I'm a product junkie so I will try more foundations, but I will this is a staple. Looks great in pictures.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The. Best.  Point, blank, period! An incredible glow from within look that is truly worth the $$ and the hype. Try a sample if possible!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not really what I expected. Light coverage, dries out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is combination not too dry not too oily  I‚Äôll say more towards dry side. I am 38, I need a medium coverage but not too heavy. Too much to ask.. I found out that my friend from Korea told me this mix is very popular Double wear mix with Armani silk foundation 1:1, I‚Äôve tried and wow it‚Äôs a magic. Not dry, not heavy, good coverage but light.. not too matte.. I‚Äôve tried all most all the foundation but this is holi grail!!! After 10 hours still stay the same. I finally found my perfect foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve tried soooo many different foundations in my life, and they always creased, made my skin dry, or made my skin look textured. THIS STUFF IS PERFECT, my skin looks like silk. I‚Äôm so impressed, I promise you, you won‚Äôt regret buying this. I also accidentally slept with it and on I woke up and my foundation still looked great lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I only write reviews if a product is amazing or completely awful. This foundation, wow. I used the NARS natural radiant long-wear foundation for about a year and a half and assumed it was the best of the best because it was just that good. This foundation trumps all. Just go buy it. Yes, it is expensive for a small bottle, but honestly, I would still buy it if the price went up! It‚Äôs that good. It wears super natural and feels so lightweight. I personally use a beauty blender to apply it and it looks like my skin. I use Estee‚Äôs double wear for everyday looks, but I bring this out when I wanna look super hot. This is wedding day foundation right here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Second time trying this foundation. Seems like it has a hard time sinking into the skin. With a long dry time, I found the product sliding all over my face while attempting to finish the rest of my makeup. For the price, I wanted to love it. And I don't. But the shade was perfect for my light olive undertone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is Stunning! It is a medium, but buildable coverage. It lays so nicely. Is not too dewy, just perfect! The smell is not overwhelming and the pump works just fine! I use about 3 pumps every single day of this, and it makes your face look just like Real Skin that is Luminous, Honestly. You do not look cakey. Just Normal glowy skin! This has been my Go-to for a good 8 months now! Worth EVERY PENNY!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first review ever!!! I absolutely love this foundation, I'll try my best to keep it concise:  -I have acne prone, combo skin, acne scarring ... hasn't triggered any breakouts -Wears super well with my go-to primer: Bobbi Brown Face Base, also works great with the Hourglass Mineral Veil primer -The color has NEVER betrayed me, my shade has NEVER oxidized. Make an effort to match your undertone, and it's soo worth it. -Looks great in the sun!!!! (the most scrutinizing lighting lol) -This foundation dries down to a natural satin-ey glow finish when you first apply it. As the day goes on (of course your natural oils are gonna peek through) BUT with this foundation, I go from satin to a forgiving Glossier model dew -Not full coverage, but she DOES work with you if you need more coverage. -Wear time: she holds up in the New Orleans heat just fine. I am fairly active at work and she behaves. Set her with some translucent powder on those long n hot days tho. -ACNE TIPS: Girl, same. The way that I apply it is: primer (wait for it to set), conceal the blemishes (wait for that to dry down for max coverage), and THEN do my first layer of foundation with a damp Beauty Blender. If blemishes are still peeking through, I grab a mini concealer brush and apply the foundation *only to those spots after letting it dry down a little. This way you get that non-cakey, good makeup day look and it all blends together <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Application: Goes on like any liquid foundation. Not too thick, and not super runny. I usually use a beauty blender to apply, but I've previously used a dense buffing brush (best option IMO), and even a brush really meant to be used for powders. Rating: 4.5/5   Coverage/texture: To preface, I have normal skin eering on dry side, I have hardly any breakouts and am in my mid-20's so I really don't need anything more than light coverage. For me, this is a full face but realize if you have skin issues, you may need more than this. However, it's definitely buildable, and looks great under any powders. I don't feel it creases all that much, but I need a setting powder under eyes with this. Rating: 4.5/5  Color/tone: They have a great shade range for people with similar skin tone as myself. I don't find it oxidizes or changes color throughout the day. Rating: 5/5  PRICE: I really like this foundation, but I bring it down to a 4 overall because it's expensive, and there are other foundations for far less cost that will do a comparable job. Nothing about this particular foundation really wows me enough to justify it for $65 before tax.  Like, it's good, it's fine, but would get a 5/5 at $45.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I want to have a great skin day then this is the one I reach for. It looks really natural on the skin and provides the perfect amount of coverage. I find it best applies with a damp makeup sponge. I keep trying other foundations, but always come back to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favorite. Light wear, with the perfect natural finish. Coverage is easily buildable. Most importantly the foundation looks great even after 12 hours+!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Don‚Äôt be fooled by all the rave. It‚Äôs an okayyyyy foundation. If u have perfect skin it‚Äòlol probably work for you, but it Deff gets oily and breaks up. I have acne prone rosacea skin. After putting about 3 layers it looks amazing however in about an hour I‚Äôm oily and in about 2 it‚Äôs already breaking up and coming offf. Doesn‚Äôt last long at all.

reviews.review_title: No Coverage, but possible skincare alternative
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super sheer. Great as skincare but provides zero affect on coverage. Would be great if you have a tan and just want a dewy, fresh sheen or if your skin is already blemish free. Disappointed because I purchased it when I went into Sephora and asked for an SOS assist for an important meeting that night. Needed to cover up a blemish and washed out look I was sporting from working an overnight. This happened the same weeK the product was launched. Feel as if it was about pushing the new product and less about meeting the need I had. Took it back and am trying a Nars product instead. So far, so good.

reviews.review_title: Not as great as it seems!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone was emphasizing how amazing this foundation is. I'm thinking huh maybe it is worth it. I was so hype when it arrived at my door I tried it out. After just a regular day, it's like it sucks all your skin up. What a shame! Literally drugstore foundation and not the good kind! Don't be fooled by what people say.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation! For years I used the smash box BB cream and wanted to find something with more coverage. Love the consistency of the luminous silk foundation. Doesn‚Äôt look oily or dry on my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE the look of this foundation! It‚Äôs perfect for a light to buildable medium look. Very natural, not greasy looking, but not matte. If you‚Äôre looking for a ‚Äúyou‚Äôre skin but better‚Äù this is your guy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the look and finish of this foundation. It is a bit on the dewier side, even though it claims to have a natural finish. I occasionally mix 8.75

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not what I had expected. Very light coverage, almost bare. Would be perfect if you‚Äôre going for the no makeup look or a natural look. Would recommend for people with already perfect skin that are just looking to add a dewy finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Heavily dependent on the primer being used. Without using a good quality primer, it does not glide well, isn't the most buildable, and does not give the skin a glow. With a good primer it will glide well. For the price, there are better options out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sits on top of skin and settles in to fine lines like crazy! I bought the #4 color not sure why it won‚Äôt let me choose the correct color to review- will show dry skin you didn‚Äôt even know you had - too thick and peels off looking patchy by the end of a work day! Returning this! Does not oxidize and good color only reason it‚Äôs getting 2 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok application kinda thick formula- by the end of my work day has settled in to fine lines really bad! I could rub it off as well- patchy looking by the end of the day! Good color match

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING! The color match was perfect. This goes on so smooth and light, but it gives me amazing coverage. I'm totally enamored with how my skin looks with this foundation. I only need to use a small amount each time, so I think this is going to last me quite a while, which balances out the cost. Love, love, love this foundation!

reviews.review_title: Holy grail- figured out how to perfect application
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used Estee lauder for years and years. When I first tried this one I was underwhelmed.... not full coverage, very dewy, etc.I have acne scars on my chin that I want to cover up.  I figured out how to PERFECT this application. I apply with NO primer. Use a damp beauty blender and apply all over the face, let it dry for 1-2 minutes then go in with a SECOND coat over the areas that you need more coverage (for me, my chin). Then I top it with Charlotte tilbury flawless filter on my cheekbones and forehead. It makes you look like you have the most perfect, glow and dewy, freshly botox-ed skin. I've never gotten so many compliments. It lasts ALL day. I teach kindergarten and I have this foundation on from 6 am - 8 pm each day and it looks perfect every day all day NO touch ups with powder or anything. I will also mention I have extremely breakout prone skin and oily skin and this doesn't cause any pimples. Love love love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation I have ever used. I love that you can build coverage. Does not dry out my skin and lasts all day long. I use 2-3 pumps for full coverage and the bottle lasts for at least 6 months.

reviews.review_title: It has a very natural look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I first tried this foundation, I absolutely loved it and I thought that I may have found something I liked just as much as the Est√©e Lauder Double Wear foundation. It didn‚Äôt last on my face quite as long as the Double Wear, but it lasted long enough for me.  It has a very natural look to it and I got several compliments on my makeup when I started wearing it. It‚Äôs not very full coverage, but it can be built up to be full coverage easily without looking cakey. When I built the foundation up, I did notice it settle slightly into my smile lines, but I didn‚Äôt notice that happening with a lighter amount on my face.  Unfortunately, after wearing the foundation a few days in a row I started having a few small, red pimples on my face. I don‚Äôt typically have pimples, so I was really disappointed. Overall, it‚Äôs a great foundation if it doesn‚Äôt break your skin out. The picture on the left is right after I applied my makeup and the picture on the right is about 9 hours later.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very $$ in my opinion, so it should live up to my expectations. My go to foundation is Estee lauder double wear I also really like the anastasia luminous but still prefer to wear the estee. Iet me just start by saying i have tried SO many foundations. Fenty, Dior, Becca, Makeup forever, Tarte, estee, anastasia, marc jacobs, huda beauty and now this armani one.  I was very excited to get this!  It is very lightweight does not feel cakey. I noticed right away that the coverage is not quite as full as the estee double wear, but i can live with that.  When applying it did take a little bit more work. Used a brush to apply/ buff and then needed a beauty blender to kind of blend those difficult areas around the nose and hairline. I also used benefit hydrating porefessional  as my primer It was an OK finish. I paired it with my huda beauty concealer... right away i noticed that it all started to look HEAVY.  I always set my makeup with powder and finish with setting spray.  By the end of the day this had settled into all my pores, and  my pores looked white and shiny . I thought maybe it just doesnt go well with this primer and concealer. 2nd try tatcha primer and too faced concealer. sadly the same thing happened again.  I wanted to love this. It just does not work for me. especially @ this price .

reviews.review_title: I really didn't want to love this $$$$$
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I finally gave in and splurged on this foundation. I'd give this 5 stars if it wasn't for the price. It a very thin consistency and goes on so lightweight. At first, it feels like it doesn't have any coverage, but throughout the day I would look at myself and think my skin looked incredible. Not cakey, luminous, and just overall fresh and youthful. It seems to wear really nicely over longer periods of time, maybe a bit greasy for oily people. I think it photographs well. I would also like to say I have very sensitive and acne prone skin, and wearing this 2-3 days in a row did not clog my pores like some other foundations do (like Dior).   Now, I haven't found anything quite like it at a lower price point, but a part of me thinks this totally does not need to be 80$CAD and I'm certain there's another foundation out there that is similar (and if it's not, please makeup gods make one because I cannot love and keep purchasing this foundation).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve always purchased  the double wear Est√©e Lauder foundation and decided to buy this to try, it goes on very nice and is super lightweight it doesn‚Äôt feel cakey at all, but it like doesn‚Äôt stay on the skin I always use a liquid highlighter for my nose and face and it always separates on my nose when I apply it, it‚Äôs super annoying. Even if I touch my nose it comes off and I do use a setting powder. Overall for the price I wouldn‚Äôt say it‚Äôs totally worth it, it‚Äôs pretty expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you‚Äôre looking for a high quality, looks-like-your-skin-only-better foundation, this is it! I‚Äôve always been a full coverage girl and I‚Äôve tried almost every big name foundation on the market, but I got so sick of how heavy even the most ‚Äúlightweight‚Äù full coverage foundation looked on my face after a few hours. I tried lighter coverage foundations but all were designed for people with already awesome skin. I have moderate adult acne/oily/combination skin, so I wasn‚Äôt sure this product would work for me. Boy was I wrong!  First selling point: the color match is the MOST perfect I‚Äôve ever had. The color itself plus the fact that it blends seamlessly into your skin makes it the perfect match.  Next selling point: it is so VERSATILE. You can wear a light coverage like a skin tint over your moisturizer, or build it up to a higher, customized coverage for a more full-faced look.  I will concede; the price is hefty for the fluid ounce size, but if you‚Äôre used to dishing out the usual $40-ish for other cult classic foundations on the market, I‚Äôd say this is definitely worth the extra $$.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really happy with this foundation!  Have tried many and would repurchase this one.  All that being said, the coverage is a bit light so sometimes I mix with my IT cc cream for more coverage.  Only four stars because it‚Äôs a little pricey

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation is stunning, it‚Äôs comes a little sheer but can easy go from sheer to full. When I wear this I feel like there is no product on my face. The price is high but worth it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation!  I have combination skin so was unsure how this was going to work for me.  It is now one of my favs!  I love it in warmer weather as it is light and makes my skin look amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't live up to the hype as people made it to be.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don‚Äôt find this that spectacular, it‚Äôs a bit patchy and sheer. It also gets a bit oily on me even though I don‚Äôt have oily skin? L‚ÄôOr√©al drugstore foundation for an eight of the price outperforms this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This provides really, really light coverage.  Works best for almost perfect skin with minimal discoloration, pimples, scars, pores.  Choice of primer is key as this works best with fluid, gel or oil base primer so foundation glides onto skin.Foundation has no sunscreen so have to prep face with that as well and a heavy, creamy sunscreen would make foundation difficult to apply.  Having said all this, the foundation is invisible on skin and doesn't transfer to clothing and lasts all day in all places including T-zone.  Given price and everything else, I'm not sure I would repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried every foundation brand from high end to drugstore. This is the only foundation that looks natural on my combination skin. I don't feel like it is medium coverage though. It is buildable but still looks natural. I also LOVE that the this color matches my skin tone perfectly. I kept getting the small bottle bc of the price but finally chose to purchase the bigger size. If you're thinking about it or unsure, purchase the smaller one and see how it works for you. I don't believe you will be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have heard so many raving reviews for this foundation, but I just don't think it's all that great. I have combination skin, yet this product made my skin look very dry without any sort of luminosity. I don't think it's worth the price tag at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite liquid foundation ever. I just recently discovered this product after years of using MUF and other cushion foundations. I've always used setting powder, but I realized it made my skin look dry so I wanted to try a foundation that wouldn't require setting with powder. This fits the bill. It's matte enough so I can use it without a setting powder, yet still gives a nice glow and seems to reflect light as if I have a very light dusting of highlighter.  Its coverage is buildable but for the most part, it is 'light coverage' IMO. If you have flaws, they will show but that's ok and normal! As much as we like perfect skin, no skin is really perfect and the more you try to hide, the thicker and more unnatural your makeup gets. This foundation may not have thick coverage, but it more than makes up it by making skin look beautiful and natural.

reviews.review_title: Wouldn‚Äôt buy this specific product again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely light coverage. Not what I expected, but would be good for anyone who is just looking for a natural glow or to even out the skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish this product wasn‚Äôt so expensive (the only reason for 4 stars) but I still continue to purchase it over and over again for years. It is definitely a lightweight dewy foundation but it gives your skin the look of perfection without a makeup look. I use 4.5 and 5.5 and occasionally mix the colors as well. I‚Äôm addicted and always get compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I resisted buying this for years because of the price. I could kick myself for that now that I've tried it! Worth every penny, and then some. It makes my skin look amazing and the color matches my skin tone perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new holy grail! Although it‚Äôs winter now, I‚Äôm hopeful that it will hold up just as well in the warmer months. Used with Fenty primer and it held up wonderfully in cold air and sprinkling rain....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to every day foundation!  It applies perfectly with a damp beauty blender when I want a more sheer coverage or I use my Sephora collection 47 brush when I want more coverage.  It wears beautiful throughout the day without settling in my fine lines or pores!  I never use a primer before this either and I always get compliments when I wear it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: shade 7 is a perfect match for me. I am usually the shade nars Barcelona. With a brightening concealer this colour is a perfect match. The finish is beautiful and does not emphasize any dry areas. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation I have ever used. Not too thick, glides on the face so smooth. Dries flawlessly. My skin looks baby soft!! Lasts me about 3 months. I use about 5x a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I typically use Double Wear from Est√©e Lauder and wanted to try something new. I love how Sephora will give you a sample size of the product to try, and I‚Äôm glad I did instead of buying the whole bottle. I will say the color match was great. I used the shade finder on the site. I was excited to try my sample so when I got home I washed and exfoliated my face, put moisturizer on and primer. Then I used my foundation brush to apply it. I found the product to be on the dry side and it wasn‚Äôt going on evenly. It left blotches in certain parts of my face. I waited about a minute to see if it would even out once it settled and it didn‚Äôt. I‚Äôm disappointed because the color matched perfectly with my skin, but the texture wasn‚Äôt smooth and didn‚Äôt provide the silky skin coverage I was looking for. For those that want to try it out, go to the store first and ask for a sample size before splurging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the money... this is making my skin very dry. I use very good moisturizer first and it‚Äôs making it dry and doesn‚Äôt have an even coverage and doesn‚Äôt cover blemishes or pores well and (I‚Äôm 29 years old) i feel like makes what wrinkles i do have look worse and my pores actually more defined. Very disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm using this foundation for over 2 months now, I love it! It provides a natural makeup look, although the coverage is not very strong. I just love it‚Äôs so smooth!! I used 24hour Ysl foundation before, but it love this one better. And I‚Äôm combination to oily in summer time, combination to dry in winter time. This works perfect for me!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is definitely not fragrance free but not issue for me. The coverage is buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do NOT understand the hype. Lousy coverage. Like really lousy. I know it is supposed to be like-skin but it looks just like my skin...but not in the awesome -no-makeup-makeup-look kind of way but in the I just woke up and got run over kind of way. Too expensive for nothing. Also unfortunately made me breakout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like it, but I don‚Äôt love it. I did have high expectations since I heard so much about this foundation. I have dry skin and this sits nicely on it, and looks natural. I usually wear EL double  wear, and I don‚Äôt need any concelaer. With this foundation, you need to add layer(s) if you have any redness or use concealer. I think this is a good makeup for summer when you‚Äôve gotten a little tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite foundations ever!! Makes my skin glow and is very natural looking. Its very lightweight and a little goes a long way. Stays on all day long. Foundation is a little expensive but definitely worth buying. Iv been using luminous silk foundation for about 5 years and havent found anything better that makes my skin look so amazing!!! Love it will be buying again.

reviews.review_title: Not worth the price for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve heard about this for years and always wanted to try it so of course when Sephora launches this in stores I jumped on trying it. It blended beautifully and is buildable but it has a slight odor to it and I definitely feel like I‚Äôm wearing makeup when I do. I could‚Äôve kept this and been ok with it but for the price it was not worth it; I absolutely decided to return it when I realized they test on animals. I was under the impression they didn‚Äôt but I was wrong. That‚Äôs a hard no for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. I use one pump and sheer it out for a light coverage look when my skin is behaving. I use two pumps for extra coverage if my skin is acting up and I have some breakouts. Regardless of how much I use it never looks too heavy or mask like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: when I used the tester in the store it was perfect for the whole day but once i bought one, it was a diffrenet undertone (?!?!) and started breaing on my skin in less than 20 ,imutes... maybe I got a bad batch

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Totally worth buying ! Matches my skin perfectly (I tan so it‚Äôs harder to find a good match) got so many compliments on how my skin looked and I love how it felt like I wasn‚Äôt wearing any heavy foundation! My new favourite

reviews.review_title: Do not buy if you have sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: Online the product claims to be fragrance free, but it is not,and is written on box. Broke mine and my daughters skin out badly

reviews.review_title: Fountain of Youth in a bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love, Love, Love!! Dewy, buildable coverage that completely smoothes out the texture of my skin, while at the same time feels like I am only wearing moisturizer. I feel 10 years younger with it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been in search of a good, full coverage foundation that doesn‚Äôt settle into lines and doesn‚Äôt look like it‚Äôs sitting on top of your face. This is my new favorite. Worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! So silky smooth, great coverage with a natural look. The raves are well deserved.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It‚Äôs amazing I love it. It‚Äôs worth buying it. My 2nd time buying this one to be exact

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So natural looking, looks like real skin. Very very nice lightweight foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! The foundation is full coverage and very light. it doesn't feel cakey and lasts hours, even on the busiest days. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: they seriously match you perfectly and the formula is beautiful and buildable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to try this foundation for a long time but I was not encouraged by my skin type which is  combination to oily but i went ahead and try it and I LOVE IT SO MUCH looks just like a second skin so beautiful and lightweight gives you a super beautiful finish and a light to medium coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with dry skin, I absolutely love the Giorgio Armani Luminous Silk Foundation!!! You can have light to a solid medium coverage depending on how much you use. For the most perfected finish, I enjoy using the YSL Instant Moisture Glow Primer underneath and I set the foundation with the Laura Mercier Translucent Setting Powder. For application, I first apply the foundation with my IT Cosmetics Love is the Foundation Brush and then I smooth out everything with my Sonia Kashuk Makeup Blender sponge. When I follow these specific steps, I get a flawless finish and my foundation lasts all day. And I always set my makeup with my Urban Decay All Nighter spray and the Morphe Setting spray. Love love love! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Matches my skin tone better than any foundation I've used so far. Feels like a second skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a Rouge member and Play Box subscriber, I've had so many samples of foundations sent to me over the years.  I try them all, because, why not? This formulation has been my HG for many years and nothing has ever come close. I am 44 years old, so my skin is losing some elasticity, is still acne prone, large pores and oil slick within a few hours. However along with a good non-silicone primer and some setting spray this foundation allows my skin to shine through in a good way yet provide enough coverage to make me feel put together for about 10 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used about 7 of these bottles overall. This is by FAR my favorite foundation!! It's obviously pretty pricey, but it's the only foundation I've used that would cover my acne and skin discoloration while simultaneously not looking cakey or fake. I usually use it with the NARS creamy concealer and TooFace Hangover Primer it's a perfect base consistency for my dry, acne-prone skin.

reviews.review_title: Like it, but the color wasn't quite right for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Soft and silky, and goes on smooth. I have hyper sensitive skin, and usually don't wear foundation because of how it generally feels (like a heavy layer of *something* on my skin), but this one was lighter in feel than other foundations I'd used before. It's not the lightest, but it does a great job of covering imperfections with a near flawless finish.  I only returned it because the one I got somehow didn't match my skin tone as well as testing implied it would, so I may try again with a better color match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is fantastic. There is a good range of colours so I was easily able to find my exact shade. I normally like a sheer tinted moisturizer but now that I‚Äôm 40  I wanted something with a bit more coverage..I can always thin it out with some moisturizer if I want to go lighter. It looks quite natural..super happy with my purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the way this foundation preformed but it breaks my skin out SOOOOO BAD!!!! The only foundation that‚Äôs EVER broke me out and it takes weeks for my skin to get back to normal

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this being so very excited to finally try this out since so many people online rave about it...disappointing!!The foundation on my skin not dewy at all, looked actually matte and when dried had a grayish tone to it. Foundation wears off quickly too. Don‚Äôt waste your money on this, was a huge letdown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many foundations, and I always come back to this one.  Yes, she's pricey.  But I've never used a foundation that worked in the dead of winter on dry skin, and in the middle of the summer when you're oilier.  It's not full coverage, but it's not trying to be.  It's just a beautiful, lightweight, comfortable, and medium coverage foundation that looks like a filter.    She's so worth it.  You will not be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve been using this foundation for about 1 1/2 yrs now. I‚Äôd tried so many before finally reading great reviews on this one and ordering. I got really lucky color wise and used the online tool, if you wear this shade in such in such brand then you‚Äôll take 3.5 in this. Worked like a charm! I only have Sephora in JC Penney by me which doesn‚Äôt carry it. Before I‚Äôd always have issues with my pores showing no matter which primers I used and which foundations. With Luminous Silk my skin looks the best it ever has! I‚Äôm 52 years old and get compliments on my complexion. I don‚Äôt even mind the price, although it‚Äôs nice to get it when I have a coupon, because it lasts me so long! I use it sparingly and about 6 months ago added Luminous Silk Compact Dual Use Powder that I just use as a light finishing powder. Beautiful combo! Highly recommend this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LIVE for this foundation. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after trying several others - I had finally found my perfect, holy grail foundation in MAC's pro longwear and one day they discontinued it. I needed to find something medium-ish coverage, good for dry skin, an gave me a healthy skin look... not too glowy or dewy but just a healthy/refreshed look. This is it. What I love most is that it is so light weight that I almost forget I am wearing makeup on my face at the end of the night (until I look in the mirror and see how flawless it looks). I do wish it had just a TAD more coverage, like my pro longwear did, and it is really pricey... but i just can't find anything else to replace my beloved pro longwear. In all, this one is beautiful, I just wish it was a little less pricey and had a tad more coverage but i'll just sub more concealer for now and hope MAC brings back my old fave. Will definitely keep using this in the meantime though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I usually have problems with finding a foundation that matches me perfectly it always shows and never looks natural I purchased this in a 2 and for the first time my fianc√© was like omg your foundation is the exact color of your skin it looks so natural I prefer a lighter weight foundation this one is perfection dosent settle wears beautifully and just a nice light to medium veil on the skin I know it may seem expensive but instead of buying a bunch of different foundations that weren‚Äôt quite right now I just purchase this one which ends up saving me money In the long run this is the only foundation I need in my life I‚Äôll even include a raw image doing a beauty editorial using this so you can see just how beautiful this foundation is it‚Äôs a must have and 100% worth the investment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews, but I feel that this needs one.  I have tried a LOT of different highly rated foundations, some even more expensive than this. I had debated on going with a 4 because my skin is so fair, but the finder kept telling me to get a 5 based on my previous foundations.   It was completely correct. As one reviewer said in her review, you may have to go up a shade in this as it runs lighter than what you'd expect.  Try it!  You'll be amazed!

reviews.review_title: Simply the best foundation (esp for aging skin)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve tried numerous foundation brands over many years for (1) curiosity and (2) cheaper alternatives; nothing compares to this product.   It covers imperfections extremely well, doesn‚Äôt accentuate pores, doesn‚Äôt crease or augment lines, has excellent staying power, will not aggravate sensitized or acne-prone skin and lends a flawless canvas for the day.   No heavy-make- up look if blended properly (less is more w/ this product).  I use a simple beauty blender.  Love the smaller bottle as it‚Äôs purse friendly.  I use shade 5.25 on my pale skin to give me a healthy, sun kissed complexion and somehow this is the only foundation with which I can do that without looking silly (my face is always much lighter than my body as I avoid the sun).  Highly, highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: While I am a makeup and skincare lover I don‚Äôt often have time to write reviews, but this Rockstar deserves a speech and standing ovation. I have tried every foundation Sheer,full coverage,powder,cream,liquid you name it and I‚Äôve tried it..From the Tom Ford(love it though) to L‚ÄôOr√©al Pro Glo and nothing compares to this foundation. It is the perfect consistency to go from the look of perfect skin or to add another layer or two to achieve the most natural skin like full coverage you have ever seen. It is the only foundation that has ever stayed on my nose(I apply with my fingertips in super thin layers on my nose and around my lip and Cupid‚Äôs bow. It works best with a stippling brush and then a light go over with my beauty blender. It stays in place well when applying my cream products(although I prefer to under paint my face and let my cream products shine through) It gives you a perfect canvas to work with. Also I don‚Äôt use a heavy setting powder just the Charlotte Tilbury finishing powder works perfect. In fact sometimes I just use my UD all-nighter and I‚Äôm good to go. If you are struggling with the price just do it, you will save money in the end because it takes such a small amount. I ended a two year and an ungodly amount of money foundation hunt when almost by accident I found this beauty. I would recommend getting shade matched as they have a wide range of colors and undertones. I would have never picked something that said w/rosy undertones.  Go now to your nearest Sephora and grab the bottle that‚Äôs going to have you living your best makeup life...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hated wearing makeup altogether because I could never find a foundation that didn‚Äôt look like I had mildew on me. I tried luminous silk about 4 years ago, and I‚Äôve never felt more beautiful. The coverage is very natural glowy. I look like I‚Äôm emitting a natural radiance. The color is an exact match, and it is the only foundation that doesn‚Äôt make my eyes water. I wasn‚Äôt a huge fan of makeup before this foundation because I could never find the right foundation so I‚Äôd just go natural, but after having discovered this, I experiment with different looks a lot more. This gave me confidence in my skin looking right. I will never buy another foundation, not even La Mer. Luminous Silk is hands down the best foundation ever to exist.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this foundation, especially considering the price. I've been in the market for something higher-end than my BareMinerals Matte that I've been wearing for the better part of a decade, and I also wanted something with a natural finish.   First, it's easy to apply an even layer. I use a beauty blender and two pumps. It looks great after I apply it, and coverage is medium and not cakey. I do have to pair it with concealer, though, for my problem areas. I use Hourglass Veil mineral primer before applying.  A few hours into wearing it (probably 4), however, it starts to look really splotchy and uneven. It begins to seep into my pores! It also moves extremely easily even after being set with Laura Mercier setting powder, and I have to be careful not to touch my skin with anything or I'll have a handful of makeup. Keep in my mind that my skin is pretty oily, so people with dry or combo skin might not have this issue at all.  It also has a fragrance, and it broke me out. I'm still recovering from this now! I really wanted to like this foundation, but it's just not for me.

reviews.review_text: This foundation was not dewy at all. It was matte. It is also hard to find the right shade. I chose 8.5,8.75 and 9 all were just off. Looks great when first applied but then it goes down hill from there.

reviews.review_title: Not all it's cracked up to be

reviews.review_text: So, I went to Sephora to get samples of the foundations I'd been dying to try. I got Dior Forever Hydrating, Fenty Hydrating, and this. I have desert dry skin with some lines and wrinkles on my 53 year old skin, but I take care of it like gold with a great skincare routine. I had such high hopes after reading and seeing so many HG reviews on this product. I tried the Dior the first day. BEAUTIFUL coverage that hydrated all day but did not last past 4-5 hours. It made me sad and the coverage was so gorgeous I'm going to try it with a different primer. This was the second day (today). Awful from the get-go. Sank into every single crease and continued to dry out over the day. By the end of my work day I looked like a Halloween creature which, given the season, is apropos but so disappointing.   Long story short: sinks into creases, drying, doesn't last.

reviews.review_title: Look no further for the best foundation out there!

It‚Äôs not dry, and it blends like a dream.  2 pumps is enough to cover my whole face.

reviews.review_title: The Best foundation with my freckles!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best foundation i have EVER used. I have combo skin, usually use a mattifying primer in my t zone, and mac fix  over that, then this foundation, I have freckles all year, I like having a lighter foundation so they peek through but enough coverage to cover redder areas. I have never found a foundation that works as best as this one, yes I've tried other luxury brands and drugstore, hands down the best. Its pricey but you don't need a lot to get the coverage. I use a beauty blender, and just blends out to buffed perfection. Highly recommend, I can also just use the foundation, I use concealer for when I'm going all out, but it is not needed for every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It isn‚Äôt full coverage but it‚Äôs great if you want the no makeup look. Love it, just wish it wasn‚Äôt so expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product blends so well...!!! It gives you the perfect finish. I would recommend this product to everyone. Although, I wish it had more coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Light weight and flawless!! I can‚Äôt believe I waited so long to make my purchase.... love this foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, somewhat aging skin that is very sensitive. I am also extremely picky about how a foundation looks and feels. I was using Urban Decay Weightless Naked Foundation for years before they discontinued it. Their new formula is awful. This started the dreaded search for a new foundation. I have literally tried almost all imaginable. They either made me break out, were too heavy, were too cakey looking, too matte, did not come in the right color choices, too thick, could feel them on my skin, looked like a face of makeup vs simply enhancing my own skin, etc. etc. I had honestly finally given into just using a tinted moisturizer calling it close enough but not really satisfied. I was in a Los Angeles Sephora with a friend waiting, and I walked  by this foundation. I knew it wouldn't work, either, but while waiting I started playing around with some of the colors. I found two that were close, and it felt relatively good on my skin, but I still just noted the colors and moved along my way. Especially after I had seen the price. For a couple of months, I thought about ordering it and giving it a try. I finally did, and I am so glad I did! It is perfect. It is light, but buildable, stays on all day over my primer, matches my skin perfectily, feels like nothing on my skin and does not break out my skin. I have blonde hair, green eyes, and fair skin. I get a lot of redness from having such sensitive skin. I feel this foundation does run a little on the light side. I ended up in a 5, and it is perfect. I highly recommend it. The price is not my favorite, but I am really in love with the foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Because of the higher price, I didn‚Äôt want to love this stuff, but, oh well!  I don‚Äôt wear foundation every day, so I went ahead and splurged. Shade 3 practically disappeared into my skin so I couldn‚Äôt even tell which part of my face had the foundation on it, but it magically looked kind of perfect. This stuff is awesome!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

Good buildable coverage, no crease, and no pimples. Less is more with this foundation. I use it over SPF cream and thats all I need to look natural and glowing. This bottle will last for many months, and I ll keep buying it.

reviews.review_text: I have used many many foundations and this is my all time favourite. I love the glow I have when I put this on, and it works wonders for my dry skin. I use 1 1/2 pumps and it‚Äôs the perfect amount for my face and neck. I use this and the Nars radiant concealer together and it‚Äôs an amazing combo. Also, I know the price is steep, but I‚Äôm on my second bottle now and the first one lasted me 4 1/2 months!

reviews.review_text: I have tried many types of foundations over the years, both western and Asian ones, and this is definitely one of my holy grails.  It‚Äôs very hydrating and gives a nice natural finish.  This is also fine to use during the fall and doesn‚Äôt accentuate the dry spots in the winter (skin can get very dry in winter in general, even all the masking and skin routine).  I also really like this because it‚Äôs light but gives just the right amount of coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite medium/full coverage foundations.

reviews.review_text: This foundation is so hyped up by magazines and celebrities alike. It is literally cakey and just uneven.  And it‚Äôs oily. Absolutely not worth the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best makeup I‚Äôve ever tried!!! It‚Äôs so natural, not cakey at all!!! The color matches perfectly and feels like I have no makeup on at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation and this is no way a bad review of it. I know a lot of the other 1 star reviews are from people who weren‚Äôt happy and did not work out for them and I understand. I was amongst that last year when I purchased this foundation only to return it. Reason being.. I didn‚Äôt buy the perfect shade match. I decided to give lumionous silk another shot with the help of a Sephora associate who was wearing the foundation at that very moment and we happened to have the same skin shade. She told me to try 3.5 and wow.. perfect match. I‚Äôve never had so many compliments on my skin by random people. Keep it mind that this is not a full cover foundation. This is new medium to buildable. I don‚Äôt suggest this for ones who have textured skin and especially acne prone skin. This would of been almost perfect and I had to deduct one star reason being ... Fragrance! Fragrance in cosmetics can be very sensitizing or co-sensitizing. I believe a lot of the ‚Äúbroke me out ‚Äú reviews is from this very culprit in the foundation. The fragrance doesn‚Äôt affect me in a sense it will break me out but I notice sinus issues when I first apply it. Some fragrances in cosmetics induce an allergic rhinitis for me but luckily the scent wears our Throughout the day the day for me. I wish Armani can formulate this foundation with out FRAGRANCE! reviews.review_text: I despaired of ever finding a foundation that worked for me. They disappear, they oxidize, they settle into the lines and dry patches or slide around my face in the heat and I end up looking a hot mess. No amount of prep or product (I tried them all) seemed to make any difference. That was until this foundation arrived. I researched different foundations for my skin concerns and took a shot, and I am so glad I did. I couldn't wait to try it out when it arrived, and totally forgot primer. It still went on flawlessly. The color is an absolutely perfect match for my skin. The perfect amount of coverage, hides what I want hidden but still looks natural. I put it on, let it dry and then blotted the foundation to remove any residual oils before lightly setting with translucent powder. I was stunned at how beautiful and natural it looked.  I refused to fall in love though, no way it looks this good all day right? wrong! I worked my regular 8 hour shift then I proceeded to move furniture into the garage and then helped my husband reorganize the shed. 2 hours later I walked into the bathroom and looked in the mirror-and it was still flawless!  It didn't settle into the fine lines and wrinkles, it didn't smear or crack or disappear! Mind blown! I could not believe it. It survived my regular work day and 2 hours of sweating in 80% humidity. I am in love with this foundation. It's worth every penny.

reviews.review_text: I have been an AVID Estee Lauder Double Wear fan for almost 10 years and basically refuse to wear anything else.
