The oil sheered the foundation out a bit without disrupting the amazing lasting power of this foundation. On most days I use Bare Minerals powder foundation, but this will stay in rotation for special occasions and job interviews.

reviews.review_title: Great for oily, acne prone skin too!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin with some acne scarring and despite rave reviews didn't even bother trying this foundation out for years because I thought it was meant for people who had near-perfect skin already. I'm so glad that I eventually gave it a try because it's truly phenomenal. It's super lightweight and just sinks right in. A little goes a long way, and I only use maybe 2 small pumps for my entire face. I find it best to apply in VERY thin layers by dabbing a few dots on my face, PUSHING it into the skin using some type of dense flat top buff brush (I use the KA Angled Foundation Brush or a Chanel foundation brush   Sigma F80 combo), and then adding an extra dot for additional coverage only where needed. I've noticed that when too much product is used, or it's just painted on the skin instead of pressed in, it looks cake-y and unflattering.   It's a perfect color match if you're somewhere in the 3y07, 3y08, 3y09 color range (medium to tan skin with yellow, olive undertones). I don't normally go for peachy undertone products but in this case it helps to counteract redness.   Also, it holds up well throughout the day, I usually only have to dab away oil once during the day, and most importantly, it doesn't clog my freaking pores!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I hate that I love this but I do. It‚Äôs pricey but it‚Äôs this great formula that covers up flaws but doesn‚Äôt make me look caked up or textured. It still looks like my skin and its build able.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: 40+ folks, LISTEN UP!  This foundation is THE best. (No I‚Äôm not a paid advertiser; I simply have tried everything out there and I love this stuff.) No matter what new product or technique comes out, I always gravitate back to this foundation and it gives me the most beautiful luminous and flawless glow...EVERY. SINGLE. TIME.  Regrettably, my skin is aging (49) although I‚Äôve always taken super good care of it. My concern with regard to finding a great foundation is to be medium to full coverage, non-drying, be super long wearing, and avoid cakeyness and dryness. As long as I prep my skin properly (which involves regular exfoliation, daily cleansing, serum, moisturizer and a couple drops of rose or argan oil for my driest areas around my eyes), and then use a great primer (my faves are Laura Mercier‚Äôs Moisturizing primer and Becca‚Äôs illuminating primer), I apply this foundation and once my entire face is done, I hit it with a great setting spray. The look this foundation gives me is GORGEOUS, and it stays on literally all day. And I get so many compliments on my skin when I wear this!

Shout out to the Sephora team in Burlingame, CA for convincing me to do this. You guys ROCK.

reviews.review_text: This is truly the best foundation I have ever used by far! I have dry/sensitive skin and the finish is absolutely perfect it‚Äôs not drying and it isn‚Äôt too shiny ! The coverage is medium which is perfect for me! 12/10 would recommend this foundation to everyone I know!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It‚Äôs not the worst foundation I‚Äôve tried but this is definitely now worth $70. Ridiculous. It‚Äôs not even medium coverage. It also broke me out. There‚Äôs nothing luminous about it. I used this for a bit over 2 months straight before coming to the conclusion that I wasted my money. I‚Äôm giving it two stars because it‚Äôs not the worst foundation out there and it can look nice but not $70 nice. More like $20.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Originally I bought shade 3, but it was too light (Mac NC20) shade 4 suited me much better. I have oily skin and did not like this product at first. I loved the flawless look it gave me to the point others ask me what foundation I was using because it looked amazing.  It looked great for 2 hours until it became so oily and nasty looking. I could not blow my nose or wipe my mouth without wiping off all the foundation from that area even before my oils came through. I then began placing baby powder after my primer and before my foundation on my oily areas. I set the foundation with the Laura Mercier translucent powder applied with a beauty blender after the foundation application and it has changed everything! I love it! For my oily skin this has helped. If I am going to be gone for a long amount of time (more than 12 hours) I use the urban decay all nighter setting spray. I love this foundation and the look it gives my skin. Other products blend perfectly with this foundation. By setting it with the Laura mercier powder on the beauty blender it prevents transfer when I blow my nose, but there is still some transfer.  My oils can be seen around my nose if looked at closely but it doesn‚Äôt look like oil, it is more of a glowing or dewy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a 5 but what ruins it for me is the price. I have been purchasing this for over two years, I have mostly clear skin and not much is needed for coverage and it is really beautiful and radiant especially through the summer months. I always receive compliments when wearing it. It is definitely worth it my only wish is we got more bang for our buck meaning more oz. But this is the only foundation I have ever repurchased. It gives me a radiant dewy but not oily looking but natural finish. & The color match is perfect but go into the store and try it first because it is tricky finding the perfect shade & recently more shades were added!!

Really wanted to love this foundation because it comes so highly recommended and you expect to be blown away with a price tag like this - but it really didn‚Äôt do the trick for me. Dried out my skin and didn‚Äôt work well with any of my primer products. Definitely try it out in store before you invest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS! I get so many compliments when I wear this!! It looks just like my skin but better because it sits so nicely on the skin and has a beautiful finish. I don't use a primer and I have had no issues with this product. It also has not broken my skin out which is a plus!! Will definitely repurchase!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful foundation! This gives me a great amount of coverage but still looks natural on my skin. Pat McGrath actually developed the Giorgio Armani makeup line back in the 90's so I'm not surprised with the quality of their products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite foundation of all time. I have oily/combination skin and this foundation just works perfectly for me. It is so light weight but gives a perfect medium buildable coverage and a flawless finish. It leaves a dewy look but can be set with a powder for more coverage. I don‚Äôt like thick cakey foundation but love good coverage and with this I can achieve that. The foundation is watery in consistency but leaves a great luminous glow. I think it‚Äôs worth the price for all the benefits of this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not recommended for oily or aging skin. My T-zone does get oily throughout the day. This foundation would disappear entirely in those spots. It also creased terribly. Probably would work wonderfully for young dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product based on the reviews but it just wasn‚Äôt doing enough for my skin. And considering the price, I wasn‚Äôt impressed.

reviews.review_title: Not great for my dry areas
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the powdery, silky feel of this foundation, but overall it makes my skin feel lackluster and a little ghostlike (even though the tone perfectly matches my skin). It also really highlights any dry skin I have on my face, especially around my mouth, even if I moisturize well beforehand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shade much lighter than expected. There is nothing luminous about this foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sadly this foundation did not work for me. It is highly rated by several others but it does not work for me. I couldn't find a color to match. After being natched in store, I went home to try it full faced and I looked ashy. When I went back to get a different color, I tried the new color on my full face and it really highlighted my imperfections. Yes, I need a primer. However, my other foundations without a primer were not this bad

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Totally worth the money! I exchanged the Nars foundation for this. It gives great coverage and looks natural, never cakey. I think this is my holy grail! Why did I wait so long to try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Believe me when I say this is one of the best foundations I have ever used!!! Do not let the price of this foundation scare you away because it is worth every dollar!! I have normal to dry skin and it give you such a great dewy skin like look. Even if your oily you can always just set with a powder and it still looks great. A little goes a long way so this foundation is one to last. Looks great even after a full 6-7 hour wear!! Holly Grail of foundations !!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is worth the price.  I use a pore filing primer and with this foundation I have a smooth complexion.  I am past my 50's and this really sets nice on my skin.  Doesn't sink in to my lines and creases.  Will definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not like this foundation at all. I have combination skin and this foundation was very very oily. It made my skin breakout very badly and a week later I'm still recovering from it. I've never had such a bad experience with a foundation. I typically use MakeUp Forever - which is heavier - so I thought I would be fine. I would not recommend this to anyone. It looked beautiful while it was on - I'll admit that. But it was not worth the lasting effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is extremely lightweight with light coverage. It quickly became my everyday foundation because of the soft look it leaves you with, but with consideration of the price, it's not worth the money.  I have some depigmentation and scene spots so 2-3 pumps won't cover these blemishes. The coverage is buildable, but you will go through the bottle FAST because I would use 4-5 pumps to cover my entire face twice for the medium coverage look.  If you do not mind the price, the layering and you have near perfect skin, then this would be a good choice because it is beautiful on the skin and doesn't look cakey.   I will not be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best foundation ever, after trying IT, Bobby Brown, Bare Mineral, I am hooked on this foundation. Lovely smooth coverage, even my husband commented how beautiful my make up looked the first time I wore it. Please don't discontinue

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation itself is a great, medium coverage foundation. Applies flawlessly whether you use a brush or blender. Literally looks like skin. Blurs pores and evens out skin tone. Downsides: not buildable to full coverage, and after about 3/4 hours of wear, your face begins to look oily. Even with touch ups and setting powder, it still gets quite shiny. I think this foundation would work best only for dry or normal skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin looks beautiful in this foundation.  The finish is great.  Light coverage but build-able.  It stays on great, but I use a primer and a spray to keep everything in place;)

reviews.review_title: Color choice might be a hassle..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Color may be much lighter than in pictures. Blends well and gives a luminous finish. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This Product was definatly worth the splurge! It blends so easily. It gives of such a beautiful finish and feels very light weight on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my favorite foundation, and I have used many different ones.  The color of the foundation stays close to what you put on the morning of.  It gives you that smooth flawless look and also natural at the same time.  The price is high and I am trying to find one comparable to this quality but has yet to find one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fabulous !!!  That sums up of the coverage shade ranges

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is a reason this is a cult favorite - easily the best foundation I have ever used.  Full coverage that makes my skin feel soft, but looks natural and not too matte or shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Currently my favourite foundation. I have combo skin, with an oily t-zone and temples and VERY dry patches on my lower cheeks. This is a medium coverage foundation with a beautiful natural finish. Worth the splurge, will repurchase. The shade match is great for me but the range is not ideal for deeper-complected people.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Overrated, drying, patchy on my skin. Not enough coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really didn‚Äôt want to buy this bc of the price and the hype. Well, I hate to break it to you but it‚Äôs worth every penny. This is one of the most beautiful foundations I own. I don‚Äôt believe that it‚Äôs supposed to be long wearing but it lasted all day on my weird combo skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing coverage but still light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a doublewear fan through and through, but I wanted something lighter and more radiant to wear at my upcoming wedding. My color IQ stated I should purchase shade 4.5 (which was too dark for my winter skin). I ended up purchasing shade 2 (still too light; I plan on purchasing 4.5 to mix into it in the near future). I wanted to try Luminous Silk (LS) due to the claim that it does not crease, and that it covers skin issues seamlessly. I have tried almost every foundation sold at Sephora, and I must admit, LS is one of my top 10. I have combination skin with acne (oily forehead, dry patches everywhere else). I also have VERY deep creases in my forehead (that all other foundations seem to highlight more). I tested this foundation for 12 hours. It was applied with a damp beauty blender, on top of Bobbi Brown vitamin enriched primer, and finished with UD setting spray. PROS to LS: 1.This is one of the only foundations that does not excessively crease in my forehead wrinkles/smile lines. 2. The finish of this foundation is gorgeous! It literally looks like skin. 3. I did not feel like I had foundation on; it‚Äôs so light and breathable. 4. It applied and blended with ease; no streaks or patches on dry skin areas, no breakage on oily skin areas.  5. The packaging is gorgeous AND the foundation has a pump!  6. Although some did transfer, the foundation still looked present/intact at the end of the day. CONS: 1. Price, not accessible to everyone.  2. The shade range is less than satisfactory. LS did not have a true match for my skin tone (2 was too light and a bit too neutral. The only other shades available that slightly matched were very yellow, not golden like my undertone). 3. I used Laura Mercer translucent powder to bake on my oily areas on top of LS. The powder did cause my forehead creases to stand out a bit more. 4. LS will transfer. Not terribly, but it does move. 5. This is not a full-coverage foundation. It did not cover my acne (2 layers).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation overall is pretty good. It has medium coverage and an almost dewy finish, it doesn't show any dry spots as I myself have dry skin on some areas of my face. It is buildable to almost a full coverage foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This breaks me out terribly. I don‚Äôt think this makes my skin looks as amazing as it claims. I bought this because of all the hype and I am honestly disappointed. People rave about the texture. I find it to be too liquidy. You have to use a TON of powder to set it or you will be transferring over everything all day long. If I touch my face while wearing this, it comes right off on my hand. This is during cold weather. I can‚Äôt imagine how it would melt in warm weather. I actually find it harder to blend my bronzer and blush into this foundation than other foundations. I will use it up but won‚Äôt buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, where do I start? I have been watching review videos for quite some time now. I have also read through hundreds of reviews online. Money is not a barrier when it comes to great, long-lasting foundation. I finally made the decision to purchase Luminous Silk Foundation. It was the longest week of my life waiting for it to arrive.   I was so happy when it finally got here. I put it on that night just to see how it looked. It looked GREAT! I was so pleased. I took it off 30 minutes later so I could go to bed. BIG MISTAKE!!! The next morning I put it on and I was feeling myself, lol. When I got to work I had meetings all morning. After my meetings, about 3 hours after application, I went to the restroom. I looked in the mirror and was MORTIFIED. It was broken up all over my face; it looked HORRIBLE. I was so embarrassed that I immediately took it off, in the restroom, at work and just went natural the rest of the day. Going natural was not a good look because I am pretty red.   I did not understand why this happened. I was determined to make it work so I waited until the weekend and experimented with it. It did the same thing on Saturday and Sunday. This foundation DID NOT look good on me; at all.   DISCLAIMER***This foundation seemed really watery. Maybe I got a defective one??? I don't know, but the one I recieved was HORRIBLE. It is going to be returned tomorrow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best medium to low coverage foundation I have ever used. If you don't need too much coverage and have dry skin this can be your everyday go-to foundation.

reviews.review_title: GREAT FOR DESERT DRY SKIN, BEAUTIFUL FINISH
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: NEW FAVORITE NATURAL FOUNDATION! I finally splurged and bought this foundation! At first I was EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED... When I first applied it was very sheer defiantly MEDIUM coverage. It looked WAY TOO DEWY for even my DRY SKIN. BUT, once I applied the rest of my makeup and the foundation dried down and settled, IT WAS THE MOST BEAUTIFUL FINISH I HAVE EVER HAD WITH A FOUNDATION. It looked like I was GLOWING FROM WITHIN! I had to go over some acne spots twice with this coverage but that doesn't bother me! It WORE BEAUTIFULLY ALL DAY! I'm dryer than a desert and normally get dry flaky patches on my nose after the FOUR HOUR mark. BUT, I WAS FINE ALL DAY. The only part that wore off was around my mouth from eating and I have a bad habit of resting my chin on my hand so ware was expected there. THERE WERE NO OXIDATION ISSUES WITH THIS FOUNDATION. OVERALL I would recommend this for DRY skin and IF YOU'RE OILY You may not love this but you will defiantly have to set it! IS IT BAD I ALREADY BOUGHT A BACKUP?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super product!!!!!!!!!!!! Amazing

reviews.review_title: Not worth it unless you have great skin already
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Product: 6/10 Colour: 4/10 Not the best shade range Blendability: 8/10 Coverage: Medium, slightly build-able Finish: Demi Mate Price: 3/10 Packaging 10/10    I really wanted to like this product because everyone absolutely raves about it but it was NOT for my skin. This is my review for dry skin, slightly acne prone slightly texture skin.  The colour on my skin was wack, I have light skin with rosy undertones but this looked like white out on my face.The next shade with my proper undertone was for medium skin.   Foundation blends pretty good but come on its medium coverage, how thick can it be if its mostly water, alcohol denant and cyclopentasiloxane  Coverage was disappointing if im using a 70$ foundation i want it to cover at least some of my redness and dont want to have to use multiple layers.  The finish is what threw me for the biggest loop, i know some brand like Nars will have foundation names that suggest quite dewy but are more mate or satin but this was medium coverage marketed as luminous so i thought it would have a bit more of a wet look. nope looked quite powdery and drying on the skin  Price is expected for a prestige brand but the value isn't there because of the need to build. The packaging is vanity candy though,it just says i'm boujee  Overall i'm disappointed and quite surprised because of all the hype, would probably work best for someone who uses a brush for their foundation ( I used hands and brush and brush looks best ) I'd be wary to us with a sponge because its watery and again this is $70 foundation that needs to be build a bit so you'd want all the coverage you can get. I'd suggest this for someone with more normalized oil levels which already has quite smooth skin and little acne and discoloration. The BEST way i got this to work is by mixing some facial oil in to counteract the mattifying effect, spot conceal redness and imperfections with a concealer either before or after and stipple on a layer concentrating on center of face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly the best foundation I have used! Looks BEAUTIFUL! Love this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Why don't they have the shade 7 and 7.5 in Canada?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing look and feel. I have oily skin and this does not make me oilier. I only use this for weekends because it‚Äôs so pricey but it‚Äôs the best foundation I‚Äôve ever used and does not cause my super acne prone skin to break out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this foundation for prom last year. It looked great in pictures and held up great for the most part. It has great coverage and looks very natural on the skin. However, it started to fade slightly on my skin throughout the day when used for everyday use. For the price, I thought it would be more bomb, that's why I rated it a 4/5. It has lasted me a long time, and overall I think its a great product if setted correctly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Applies very nice and looks like you‚Äôre not even wearing foundation. Not as much coverage as i would like but it is a nice foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a tinted moisturizer/cc/bb cream kind of gal, but recently, I have been wanting something that provides a little more coverage and doesn‚Äôt produce a flashback in photos; something that has sheer to medium coverage and leaves a dewy finish because I have dry, sensitive skin. I looked high and low for a product with said qualities, and finally, I tried this foundation. The first time I put it on, I literally looked in the mirror and said, ‚ÄúOh, my goodness.‚Äù I couldn‚Äôt believe how beautiful this product left my skin looking. My flaws were covered, but my skin still looked like skin, rather than a mask. My skin was hydrated and glowing. The rest of my makeup, both cream and powder products, sat on top of this foundation beautifully.   I see why this foundation has such a positive reputation. My favorite way to apply this product is with a Beauty Blender (BB) because it leaves a flawless, airbrushed look. It takes me 2-3 pumps to cover my face and neck. Yes, the product is thin and the BB soaks up some of the product, so you may prefer to use your fingers or a brush, which also work well. This product builds beautifully into a medium coverage foundation, so don‚Äôt be afraid to apply a second layer. The finish is in between dewy and satin, and can be adjusted based on the type of primer you use and whether or not you use a setting powder. With a primer (I use BECCA‚Äôs purple primer or Josie Maran‚Äôs Finishing Balm), this foundation lasts me eight hours or more. My concealer, bronzer, and highlighter all look lovely on top of this foundation. There is a slight chemical/makeup smell, but it goes away shortly after applying.   This product is expensive, yes, but to me, it is worth the splurge since it is so hard for me to find a foundation that I really like and that matches my skin tone. I am a NC37 (medium with yellow undertones) and shade 6.5 matches me perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lives up to the hype. Very light weight and doesn‚Äôt look cakey at all. Provides light to medium coverage that melts right into the skin. Couple of downsides - the price (but well worth it) and you need to use quite a bit of product for even just medium coverage (but looks absolutely beautiful on the skin)

reviews.review_title: The hype is real! This is holy grail
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing and I am kicking myself that I didn‚Äôt try it sooner. It gives you a perfect skin finish, very natural but with great buildsble coverage. This is satin not dewy and makes for a lovely even smoothe canvas that powder products go amazing over. I‚Äôll never use anything else again. This is similar to Koh Gen Do aqua but with more coverage and IMO better finish. The price isn‚Äôt expensive when you break down how much you use and how long it‚Äôll last and the fact you won‚Äôt need to waste money trying so many foundations. This is HG and I can see why so many MUA and celebs use it. Amazed. It looked like my makeup had been professionally done. I wear a very light layer of it on my everyday makeup and set with Laura mercier powder which seems to pair so wonderfully with this. I have very dry skin and it‚Äôs hard to find something that works and does well with that. This doesn‚Äôt cling to any patches or show texture, the colour stays true and it‚Äôs weightless! Love this. I‚Äôve tried over 1k foundations this year trying to find something like this. Impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally wanted to love this SO much! While it‚Äôs the prettiest foundation when applied- I am worried it caused more acne on my chin! However, I won‚Äôt give up on it yet because the natural finish looks so natural and dewy! Will say though, if you have sensitive skin, like me, be careful of the alcohol denatured in it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's fine, but I definitely didn't have the wonderful reaction that others seem to have had with it. I have very pale, dry skin, and the lightest shade still wasn't quite light enough for me unfortunately. Worse, I have dry skin so the luminous finish sounded lovely...but I end up with a powdery finish every time! Not the most flattering look for a dry skinned gal. Not to mention it sank in my pores - I never considered my pores a problem spot before this foundation. It's fine, and the coverage is decent, but definitely not worth $65.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really thrilled with this product. I tried a sample of it in my pursuit of a new foundation. And I love how this feels and covers the skin, it‚Äôs beautiful. Buildable, but doesn‚Äôt feel heavy. Definitely going to purchase!

reviews.review_title: HOLY GRAIL and my skin is DRY
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my HOLY GRAIL!! I lovvve this stuff. I have really dry skin and this is not too matte but not too dewey. I just always have a great makeup day when I wear this. The only bad part is the price but its worth it to me I just opt to not wear it everyday to save it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had such a difficult time figuring out my correct shade, so I really hope this helps someone not have the same troubles!!  lol  If you are an NC25 then you might want to try this first in the 3.5 shade.  I received a sample in 5.5 and loved the finish and texture, but knew it was too dark (like the type of dark where you know you could wear it in the summer but can't pull off in the winter).  So I made my purchase in #5 without testing it first.  #5 is definitely too neutral and light for an NC25.  In fact, it's almost pinkish or perhaps just too beige.  I never tried 4.5, 5.75, or 6, but I've heard 5.75 is darker than 6 and that 6 is for NC30 olive skin.  So, just to organize it:  3.5= NC25 4.5= maybe a more neutral NC25 ?? 5= beige NC20 5.5= somewhere between NC30 and NC35 5.75= maybe NC35 ?? 6= NC30 olive  As far as the foundation itself, I love it.  I have combo-dry skin with acne scars and I think this does a great job blurring acne scars/ acne pits aka pock marks.  It's not a miracle, but I think it does a good job.  You will need to set with a powder, but the finish is very skin like and natural.  Dry skin will love this.    Those with oily skin might want to sample before purchasing.

reviews.review_title: Luxury Foundation Worth The Price Tag!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this foundation! It's expensive, but so worth the price tag! I love how this foundation wears on my skin, and it isn't too dewy or too matte. My favorite way to apply it is with my beauty blender, and it plays well with all other products on the face. Will be a Luminous Silk lover for life!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best foundation I have ever tried! Doesn‚Äôt transfer, doesn‚Äôt get patchy. Lightweight, looks like photoshopped skin. I‚Äôve tried Laura Mercier, Dior, Clinique, Kat Von D, Tarte- none of them even come close to this one! I put my face on around 7am, by the time I get home from work is usually 11pm and my foundation is still in place like when I put it on. It is pricey but definitely worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this foundation! It's so light feeling that it's incredible it actually covers your imperfections too. Makes your skin look so lovely and refreshed. Feels soft on skin. Was using Laura mercier for years and my skin was looking dull and dry each time I used it the last few months, so I listened to a friend who recommended this... I'm in heaven. It seems to blend into my skin tone to make a perfect match. It's pricey but worth it. Lasts very well with a setting spray (I use urban decay).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was persuaded to try this product after hearing so much about it from beauty influencers, but I was hesitant due to the premium price. However, I was not disappointed by the quality and performance of this product. The formula is similar in consistency to the Too Faced Born This Way Foundation but wears better and longer. The product yields a medium to full coverage that is extremely lightweight and slightly buildable. I have textured skin and I find that I can pack more product into certain areas without the foundation becoming cakey or patchy. I love the finish and it is one of those products that gives you the my skin, but better glow. Will definitely be keeping this foundation as a go-to product!

reviews.review_text: This is a favorite of mine in high-end makeup. I love the weightless feel and fantastic coverage luminous silk provides. Because of the expense I mix it with other more affordable foundation brands in a 1 to 1 ratio and it really extends the life of this product while still offering stellar coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! East to blend, and so natural. I used two pumps, but I could‚Äôve got away with just one! I‚Äôm usually iffy about foundations.. I‚Äôll read up on them, YouTube some artists, buy them, hate them. But this is certainly a keeper, I just had to shut my eyes and ignore how pricey it is. I love my Hourglass Vanish, and my MUFE HD, but my hand will immediately gravitate to Armani.   What it did - Covered all my redness, and truly did look ‚Äúluminous‚Äù, and natural. Usually I need to go in with concealer around some of my breakouts, didn‚Äôt have to with this foundation. Didn‚Äôt set it, and I still looked bomb during the end of the night. (Maybe because I‚Äôm not oily). My mother even liked it, and she usually hates my foundations LOL.   What it didn‚Äôt do - Didn‚Äôt look cakey, cling onto my dryness, no patchiness, bring out some of my bumpy texture, harsh smile lines/forehead lines/between the brow lines, move around with the rest of my products, transfer onto people.  TRUE this is a bit pricey... but we spend god knows how much on our skin care, and eyeshadow palettes that sometimes just sit there. So why not spend an extra few bucks on a foundation that is seriously a god send. - Just pay your rent first! LOL.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is not the type of foundation I would normally choose. I have extremely oily skin. Oil peeks through within an hour, and by midday, my face is a glazed donut. It doesn't matter what type of foundation I use-powder, liquid, cream-my base will be sliding off my face by the end of the day. I've always bought matte or long lasting formulas to delay the inevitable, but what I find is that many of those type of formulas end up looking heavy. I've begun trying luminous formulas to achieve a more skin-like finish. Now that I've tried this, I'm not going back.  Do I get shiny? Yes. But that would happen with any foundation (it's been a long road to acceptance). The difference is that this foundation makes my skin look SO good. I have redness along my cheeks and nose, it evens out those areas effortlessly. It leaves a satin finish that looks like you're not wearing anything, just soft, glowing skin.  I have to use a loose powder to set (Laura Mercier, Kat Von D and Ben Nye all work well), and I do have to blot later in the day. It gets me through the workday, but if I'm heading out after work, I definitely need to touch up. That's not bad, considering how oily my skin is.  I have light medium olive skin. In general, it's difficult to find foundations to match my undertone. Armani foundations lean more pink to neutral. I use shade 6.0. It has a golden undertone compared to the other shades, but I wish they could make it just a smidge more yellow, because it does lean neutral. I'm being nit picky, because the shade works, most can't tell that the undertone is slightly off. That's the other thing! My coworkers thought I had stopped using foundation, they thought I had perfect skin. The biggest con is the cost. It is expensive, and I danced around the thought of buying it for a year. I got a couple samples to find the right shade. Then I waited for one of the VIB sales to purchase. But this is worth every penny, I would buy it at full price.

The price point is on the higher side but this foundation outscores all others if you're looking for amazing quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was, of course, hesitant to purchase this foundation online (I live pretty far from the nearest Sephora).  I tried to match my shade as best as I could and just crossed my fingers that I would get it right.  Well, I got it right and ended up finding my HOLY GRAIL of foundations.  I don't need full coverage, but I sometimes like something with a little more coverage than my everyday tinted moisturizer.  This is the perfect foundation - it is medium coverage, but can build easily.  I have had complete strangers come up to me and compliment my skin and makeup.  This has never happened to me before.  I know not every product works for everyone, but this one is a permanent staple in my makeup kit.  I could not be happier with this foundation.  I have light skin with a normal to dry complexion, but occasionally get oily on my chin and forehead.  I wore this for 8 hours and it still looked just as good as when I put it on initially.  Amazed.  It's worth the hype - it's at least worth getting a sample to try out.  I hope it works for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I waited a long time to try this foundation. and I LOVE it. The consistency is silky, smooth, and makes my skin look luminous (all just like the name). The color is perfect, and with the range available everyone should be able to find your sole mate color. I use this foundation on days when I don't have any redness or major skin irritation (which is about 4 days out of 7), because while it is buildable it is thinner than other foundations I have used.  I am not a fan of heavy foundation or patient enough to layer, layer, layer thin coats on in the morning. Also, the packagin mans that I don't touch the product and thus what's in the bottle stays clean, lasts longer, and keeps its color and texture. Bonus! This is the Holy Grail of foundations.

It doesn‚Äôt completely cover a couple spots of pigmentation(scarring) that I have on my face but I don‚Äôt mind it because of how gorgeous it looks on the skin. It has such a pretty finish, not ‚Äúdewy‚Äù but it‚Äôs definitely radiant- in a very non-artificial way. I have nothing bad to say about this foundation, it‚Äôs incredible. I don‚Äôt have nice skin by any stretch of the imagination- I have a LOT of scarring and pigmentation and sometimes active spots & acne, but when I find a product that makes people stop and compliment me on my skin, I take notice! I can‚Äôt stand how expensive it is compared to other foundations I use, but the price won‚Äôt stop me from buying it. It‚Äôs the best I‚Äôve ever used!

reviews.review_title: I don't say this lightly: Holy. Grail.

It lasts the entire day (I use primer under it, but I used primer under all the others, as well) and keeps my blush, bronzer, and highlight looking fresh as well. I'll definitely be coming back for the full size bottle when I'm finished!

It is Buildable but only to a medium coverage, if you have acne marks like me, you will need to spot conceal. Over all I'm happy with my purchase and this will remain a staple product.

If you don‚Äôt mind taking a bit longer with your makeup then go for it but if your morning makeup routine needs to be complete in 30 minutes then keep looking. I felt like for the price I paid it should work with any primer. I‚Äôm sticking to my other cheaper foundations that apply better and look better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is magical. Granted, this is the first time I've spent this much on foundation (I used to get mostly drugstore foundations, and the most I've ever spent on foundation before this is $24), so I kind of expected it to be (or maybe it's a placebo effect, but I'll assume it's not because that's always a consideration with makeup). It doesn't dry out my skin (or at least it doesn't worsen patches that are already dry), it's decently glowy/dewy-ish, and it has very noticeably good coverage without feeling like you dumped a bucket of paint on your face (in fact, it doesn't feel like you're wearing much foundation at all). It also just so happens to match my face color, which is a plus (I used to have the issue of not being able to find a foundation that wasn't too light or too dark or too rosy).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had to get a new foundation when my Too faced Born this Way foundation got a little too dark for me. I didn't want to get the same foundation in a lighter shade, I wanted to try something new. I saw great reviews about this foundation and wanted to try it out. I got the travel size, cause I didn't want to invest in the big bottle since I rarely go through a whole bottle. This foundation is amazing!! Now I know why there were so many great reviews on it. It is not cakey and it looks natural on my skin. Love this foundation!!

reviews.review_text: I LOVE this foundation. I have dry skin  and this foundation makes my skin have a healthy glow but it doesn't make me look oily or too dewy. The color match is also perfect! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: This is my fav foundation! I am shade #6 when i‚Äôm tan

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had been waffling on this foundation for months, but I am glad I finally gave in. My previous go-to foundation was the Hourglass Vanish Stick, which I still do absolutely LOVE, though I find myself grabbing this more often. This foundation makes my skin look so pretty and natural. I love the dewy, lively finish that it gives me. It makes my skin look so fresh and awake. I find that the shades are true to the description. I will say that I gave it four stars because it claims to be very easy to build up from a medium to a fuller coverage foundation, and no matter how much I apply, I do not find it to be particularly full coverage. However, a very minor complaint, and I use concealer to cover the areas that need a little bit more love (under eye, around my nose, chin). I absolutely recommend this if you are looking for a young, fresh, clean skin look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation was a game changer for me. I've worked with hair and makeup for many many years and have never quite found a universal full cover foundation that works for every person I use it on (me included)! Also, for someone who struggles with problem skin (helloooo cystic/hormonal acne!), this product saves me.  It is a serious confidence booster.   Coverage is buildable, which is nice.  If I do a light layer, you can still see some freckles popping out- great for the natural look.  A little goes a long way. Tones are versatile and mix well.  I have a light complexion with golden undertones  (4 is a good match). Absolutely worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Looks amazing on the skin but if you have oily skin, not a good option. I love the packaging.

reviews.review_text: Love it , looks like my skin not cakey at all blends well

reviews.review_title: Wish they had it in store
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely a holy grail, ride or die foundation. I have to caution though, to get shade matched you definitely have to try them on in store. It would seem as though shade 2 is the lightest, but in reality 2 and 3.75 are both fair, with 2 being more yellow toned and 3.75 more rosy toned. Numbering system doesn't really make sense. Despite it being a super popular item, most Sephora's don't have them in store, the closest store to me that had it was 100 miles away (and I live in a major metropolitan area). Go get shade matched and ask Sephora to start carrying them in store!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried sooooo many foundations over the years- liquid, powder, mineral. This is the best liquid foundation I have ever tried. I think all skin types can use this foundation. My skin is oily so I use a primer (Hourglass veil primer mixed with LM radiance primer) and then set the foundation with LM translucent powder to make it last. I have to blot at some point, but I have oily skin so I always have to blot. The foundation is lightweight, has medium coverage and a semi-matte, slightly luminous finish. It does NOT accentuate lines or pores. It is gorgeous and photographs well. Perfect wedding day foundation.

reviews.review_title: Might be good for perfect skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this and returned it within a week. I read so many amazing reviews about it and I was left disappointed. If you have perfect skin - this is probably decent. I have oily skin, the texture of my skin isn‚Äôt flawless, and I get the occasional pimple here and there. This made me look like I had dry patches everywhere. There‚Äôs better foundations out there for less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation, but one thing I notice is that there is not enough product inside. I use it very rarely and I am already at the end of the bottle.

If you are a skin person you will love this foundation. I am always striving to achieve a natural look with foundation. Something that gives you the right amount of coverage without being cakey or changing the texture of my skin. This is one of my everyday foundations (and the tarte water foundation). The Armani is very similar to tarte but it's a little more high end.  This foundation I would put around the light to medium spectrum for coverage. It is buildable depending on how much you use, and I use it for more medium coverage. I have some texture and discolouration issues with my skin, and luminous silk gives me enough coverage while keeping my skin natural looking.  The formula is very thin and dries in an average time so no need to do your face in sections. I place it in dots around my face and blend with a beauty blender. The only thing I will say is if you have breakouts it won't cover but you can go on with concealer to touch up those spots. The packaging is glass which is what I would expect for this price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best foundation I have used and I have tried them all. It does not oxidize at all like so many these days do, Luminous Silk remains the color it was when you initially apply it. No sudden orange face 2hrs later. I have super dry skin and do layers of moisturizers and serums day & night  just to stay hydrated so finding a foundation that looks like natural skin after 2hrs has been near impossible. A few BB creams on the market work but they lack the coverage I sometimes want for covering red areas around nose and chin. I wouldn't say this is hydrating and you could skin moisturizer but it's certainly not drying at all. This foundation is beautiful, looks natural like skin - it doesn't settle in pores and it doesn't get cakey. I apply using a wet BeautyBlender but have also used the Sigma F80 on days my skin is a wee more hydrated than usual. I was mixing it with tinted moisturizer at first but have been wearing Luminous Silk on its own and I am constantly having people ask how I have such an even complexion and they don't believe me when I say I have foundation on. They right there makes this a win!
Love it! Natural and provides a radiant finish to my skin!

So pricy but so beautiful! I find that it just feels so luxurious on my skin every single time I wear it! Be sure to get matched for your color though! There‚Äôs a lot going on and without the help of someone in store, I would have chosen completely the wrong shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin

It's also lightweight which is what i liked about it, I just wish it worked better for my combination/oily skin.  I'll probably use this in the winter and see how it goes.

reviews.review_text: You guys if you are on the fence about trying this foundation, JUST DO IT! It is one of the best, most beautiful foundations I have ever tried. I have tried many luminous foundations and just hated them, but this one is GOLD! You can check out my video here : https://youtu.be/IQKZEGDXOR0

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is absolutely phenomenal. If you're looking for a foundation that is your skin but better then this is definitely for you. It lasts all day and wears beautifully.

I was a little hesitant because of the price but I decided to splurge and I'm so glad I did. I applied this with a beautyblender and it was more matte than I expected, but it was a really beautiful and natural matte that blurs my skin texture and pores. I do have combo skin with some pretty gnarly dry patches depending on the weather, but this didn't accentuate it at all. Because I have an oily tzone, I was scared that it wouldn't work out, but I feel like this foundation really gets better throughout the day. It doesn't look shiny or greasy, and I actually found that my semi oily skin gave it a nice dewy glow. This lasted for my 13 hour school to work day and I only had to minimally blot every 4-5 hours. It doesn't feel like I'm wearing a medium coverage foundation, and didn't look cakey when I built it up to cover the acne scarring on my cheeks. Overall, I'm super impressed with this foundation and if you have the money to splurge, DO IT. I did take one star off, however, because it states that it's for all skin types but if you have oily skin rather than combo skin, I don't think it will last the same way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

His foundation is great. It feels like I'm wearing nothing! It's perfect

Holy grail foundation! I have dry skin, and this foundation gives me a hydrated, healthy glow. It's full coverage but not thick or cakey.
Buy it ! Flawless absolutely flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the longest time I've been looking for a great foundation for my skin type and I came across this and it was SO worth the money! I love a dewy look and this does wonders, very long lasting and looks amazing whether my skin is extremely dry that day or not. It glides right over it and doesn't get caught on dry patches!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this foundation and was hesitant to try it knowing it's a pricey foundation. I decided to go for it anyways and it was such a good decision. This foundation is honestly amazing. I am going to be buying a full size because it works so well on my dry skin,

reviews.review_text: This is my favorite foundation at the moment. I was a little nervous to try it because it is luminous, and I usually avoid illuminating products due to my oily skin. However, I have been pleasantly surprised by this foundation! The finish is absolutely beautiful, and it's so easy to blend.

After seeing almost every beauty blogger on social media rave about this, I was still super hesitant to try it for myself because of the price point. However I got this as a sample for an online order and it was in the shade 5.5 which just so happened to match me perfectly. After having it on a full day I was sold, i quickly ordered the half size and seeing how well it lasted both on my face throughout the day and also the product itself lasted months I decided the full size was well worth the price. It's very lightweight yet still covers any imperfections for a nice smooth base. Being that it's luminous, my skin does tend to get more oily with this in the summer but cover fix perfect setting powder solves that problem easily. Does not make me break out and does not look bad in pictures even with flash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair
reviews.review_text: I got the shade #4. I'm combo skin. This foundation looked so natural and refresh at the first few hours, but then it started being patchy and not looking good. not shiny but not perfect, need touch up. It's better if I set it with setting powder

reviews.review_title: Must have and worth the money!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to foundation! It is truly amazing and makes my skin look amazing. I have oily skin, and it does not make my skin oily, even though it is so silly and smooth. This will forever be my favorite. I wish I could give it 100 stars!

I think this may be my favorite foundation of all time. I have very dry skin, and most foundations show off my texture. This gives me a beautiful glow, and doesn't look patchy or dry on my skin. The only downfall is sometimes it can look too greasy. I also wouldn't call this full coverage, but with two pumps you can definitely get the coverage.

reviews.review_title: Ideal and perfect foundation for normal-dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing foundation! It has really good coverage, it's buildable, and leaves the skin looking smooth and even. It covered my old acne scars so well that I didn't even have to spot conceal. I like a natural, radiant, glowy look as my skin is normal to dry, so it works for me. But it might not be ideal for those with oily skin. The foundation lasts on my skin for around 12-14 hours without breaking apart and looking cakey. Although, after a long day, I do get oily in my T-zone so I have to powder those area to keep them from looking too oily. Overall, it really is a great foundation ; it's long-lasting, has a smooth and radiant looking finish, great buildable coverage, and a really great range of different shades for different skin tones.
One of my favorite foundations I have combination skin more on the oily side and this looks amazing on my skin. I wish they carried this in the Sephora store by me. Also got the powder as well
My go-to always! I've tried others but this is flawless and my favorite part is it's buildable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looks flawless on my textured skin and it's not cakey. Worth the money!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried to write a review on this a long time ago but it got cut off for some reason haha I just realized! so yeah I've never been a foundation person because never found one that matches me - they were always too pale, too yellow, or too pink. But I had a hunch to try this in fair skin with neutral undertone. I ordered it online so it was just a guess. & perfection!!!! This foundation is seriously a lifesaver for me. on days when my skin is broken out, I put alot of this on & my skin is flawless!!! Never thought I would find a foundation that perfectly matches me & looks so perfect!! it makes my skin flawless & glow. In photos it looks airbrushed. It is so perfect, do not hesitate to buy!

I love wearing this foundation on my days that I don't need to be wearing a full face of makeup. It's beautiful, natural looking, and doesn't emphasize my dry skin, lines and pores. It's not full coverage, more light to light/medium at best but can be built up around the areas that need more coverage! Leaves my face smooth and flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation! It leaves my skin matte but still has a luminous finish. Ive fallen asleep with this on before and it has never broke me out. This ones a keeper! I use it with my BB for a flawless finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite foundation of all time. Perfect amount of coverage and extremely lightweight, it lasts me a whole day and does not oxidize. Obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is one of my all-time favourites, if not my absolute favourite. It works so well with my dry skin and provides a luminous finish while still having great coverage. This foundation does everything it says it does. Definitely worth the splurge!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite foundation of all time. No matter what foundation I try I always come back to this one. I have dry skin and this keeps me moisturized, doesn't get greasy, and covers everything perfectly. It's  not heavy at all and probably medium coverage at best. It's luminous but not glittery or too much. It looks super natural. I wear it in the color 5.75, I have medium skin with golden undertones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for combination skin. Does not cling to dry patches. Dries demi matte finish which will become more dewy throughout the day if not set with powder. Doesn't not crease into smile lines. Little to no scent. Shade range is good but I wear two colors mixed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is runnier than other typical foundations and I suppose that makes blending it easier. However, I don't get a great glow with this foundation. Rather, my skin looks a little dull. It's a decent product but my Makeup Forever foundation is still better. I think I will be returning this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best foundation I've ever had. So lightweight and looks just like natural skin when I put it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this foundation! My skin is quite dry and this makes me look so nice and glowing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a WOC I struggle to find the right shades that look natural on my skin while providing full coverage. And this is IT! Super velvety smooth application, glides right on for a beautiful dewy look and glow. I can see this being bothersome to those with oily skin, but my dryer skin soaks this right up! Just a few drops and my skin is fully covered, my blemishes barely noticeable. It also lasts the entire day even through these intense heat waves in LA. So happy with this, I will be switching to this for my summer time foundation look! I received this product free for testing purposes courtesy of Influenster.
Perfect, flawless coverage, very pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation feels really good on my dry skin. It is definitely light-medium coverage because my freckles still show through.
Absolutely amazing. Name speaks for itself. Gives you a silky finish. I have tried a variety of different foundations and this one has to by my absolute favourite.

I was wanting to purchase this for awhile, and once I did I was so amazed. It truly is a beautiful foundation. Quite possibly better than any other brand I've bought (Mac, LM and more). Yes the price is high but honestly a little does go along way.  I have quite dry skin, and this is the only foundation I've found that has helped with my dry spots. Will defiantly be repurchasing!!

reviews.review_title: The best foundation I've ever tried.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Opting for a relatively natural and carefree look these days, foundation seemed way too much of a hassle. Most formulas either felt really gross on the skin, had a bad scent, were full of chemicals and just not worth it or masked my natural skin or worse highlighted more imperfections!   This formula is so smooth and feels almost gel-like on the skin.   After more than 8 hours of city wear, it still feels and looks fresh! My favorite thing about this silk foundation is how natural it looks. The skin really glows through! For me, it enhanced the natural rosiness of my skin rather than cloaking it in way too yellow, thick and heavy foundation. Truly a luminous base!

I have combination skin and I really wanted to try this since everyone raves about this. I love this foundation for my skin in the winter time, as my skin is more dry then oily at this time. I don't like it for summer time but that's just me! It has good coverage and is very build able. I probably won't repurchase due to the fact that I only like it for winter time but that's just due to my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I bought 4-5 bottles already and keep buying it. The texture is good. The coverage is good too. I bought many colors and mix it to create my own shade coz my skin color always change.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used sooo many foundations over the years. Chanel was the favorite until I found Luminous Silk. It blows everything out of the water. I have acne prone skin and this does not cause any flares. It also has such a natural finish but does well with coverage. I always am told that I have porcelain skin when I wear it.

Hands-down the best foundation I have ever used, even after reading so many great things and waiting (and waiting) to purchase, setting myself up for disappointment. Luminous Silk made me recognize dissatisfactions with other foundations and BB creams I'd been using that I didn't even realize I had. It applies smoothly and feels weightless, provides good coverage, keeps my mildly oily t-zone in order with minimal morning powder, and has a beautiful satin finish that emanates health. It's not too oily or too tacky and sets to a natural feel relatively quickly‚ÄîI find a flat foundation brush and short, quick strokes works perfectly over a liquid, brightening primer (tried another day with a mix of oil-based highlight and silicone hydrating primer with less luck). The shades can be difficult to match online (and the product difficult to locate outside of urban areas), so I recommend the shade match tool on the Armani site.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This looks beautiful after applied, however it does not work well on me with oily skin. It is very buildable! I really want to love this foundation so I will be trying it in the winter time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation. So sillky, soft and perfect fit wow wow wow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation consistency is very watery. It does not apply well and it overall was a total disappointment in application, coverage, wear etc.. I expected far more from a price point and a brand like Armani. My daughter (16-years-old) and I (34-years-old) both were let down immensely.

I got this online since it's not sold at my local Sephora. I purchased based on the colour IQ but the foundation was too dull/grey against my skin. I'd give this a try again if I tested it out at another Sephora carrying this product, but right now it's not a repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Finally tried it! and I love it
reviews.review_text: This foundation has a really nice luminous finish. Does not stick to my dry patches. I did get matched at Sephora, the color is was given oxidized and looked very orange on me. However, I mix it with my MUFE stick foundation and it's my perfect shade. I love the combo and I don't mind mixing foundations just because I've always had issues with my undertone. If you are choosing to buy this foundation, I would probably test it on your hand to see if it oxidizes against your skin tone as you shop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When I first bought this foundation back in december I hated it. It wouldnt cover my reddness or breakout at all, after being on accutane and my skin is now clear I LOVE how it makes my skin look luminous and just beautiful. With that being said, if you have trouble with your skin dont expect much coverage but if you have good skin go for it. I will repurchase it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely surprised and in love with this foundation! I want to start by saying I only gave it four stars because this is a first impression review and have only worn it once. That being said I did test it for a full day. As the name states, this foundation has a gorgeous luminous finish. I have combo skin and was worried it would make me too oily but it didn't at all. It didn't control my oil but did not make any difference or get oilier than I usually am with any other product. The coverage is good in my opinion, not completely sheer but not thick or heavy. I would say it is medium and buildable but perhaps not for those looking for absolute full coverage. I was wary of the reviews that said the foundation would slide off and not last since it is so luminous but that was not the case for me. The biggest impression it made on me was the way it looks on my skin. It looked so smooth and perfectly natural, not at all cakey. I felt like I was glowing. I didn't think it would be worth the price but for me it was. Very satisfied with this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite foundation! My go to was the Nars All Day Luminous, but this one tops it! It's a semi-matte/satin finish and color 7.5 is perfect, I don't give it 5 stars because I look to oily for my liking after 8-9 hours but otherwise it's perfect.

Omg I love it! Finally found my shade. The last one I ordered was too yellow, I took a chance and this shade definitely matched my skin. Goes on so smoothly. Love the light weight feeling. Was so worth it. But now I have to go and return the other shade that didn't match.

I heard great reviews so I gave this a try but it didn't work for me. It was too dewy and didn't last very long or give me the coverage I wanted, but it felt nice on and it didn't irritate my skin which was my biggest concern.
THIS FOUNDATION IS AMAZING!!!!! Put it on with the Gurlain primer and you'll crack some necks with how many heads you'll be turning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new go-to foundation. I was looking for something that made me look polished but still natural, and this one delivered. It's very creamy and easy to blend, and feels as though you're wearing nothing. It makes my skin look and feel fresh and dewy. I'm a fan for life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has been deemed holy grails by many people regardless of their skin type. I have dry skin and the promised radiant finish had me intrigued. After trying this foundation, it has amazing qualities that I love. But it's not the best foundation for me for a couple of reasons.  I wear Shade #4, which is light with golden undertones. This was the best colour match I could find from reviews and comparisons to other foundations I wear. #4 is a tad too light and not yellow enough for me, but it can still work with something mixed in. In the picture below, I mixed in Cover FX Custom Drops in G30 to warm it up. I'm about an NC20-25 for reference.  The finish of the foundation is supposed to be radiant and silky. I agree that it is silky, but not as radiant and luminous as I thought. The finish is not dewy, it's more of satin finish and matte in my dry areas (nose and cheeks). I was able to achieve my preferred dewy look with a hydrating primer and setting spray. But, what is strange is that the foundation gets really shiny throughout the day. I love when foundations turn dewy after it warms up on the skin, but this was too much for me in the short period I wore it. The foundation felt tacky after 4 hours, so expect to blot if you have oily skin.  Even though the foundation starts off with a satin finish, it doesn't emphasize any dry areas. My nose is always a problem area, and it didn't look gross after application. The product sits great on the skin, I won't deny that. After I blotted and powdered, it still looked great.  I think this foundation would be better suited for normal skin. If not, you'll have to maintain it throughout the day which might not be suitable for people. It's not my favourite foundation mostly because I don't have the best colour match, and the amount of maintenance I have to do when the foundation is $68 CAD is definitely a con. I do like the foundation, I just have a true holy grail foundation I prefer more.
It's so light weight feeling. Like I DON'T feel like I'm wearing foundation.

Im asian with combination skin. I noticed that this doesn't suit me. It only highlights the dry areas of my face and its very cakey. It creases and after sometime i feel like my face texture is like a plastic that is try to absorb the foundation.This product feels like a grease on face and doesn't give any coverage. I was just curious about this so I tried.

i loveeeee this product. It's super lightweight, feels great, and has really good coverage. The only thing is....im in the shade 4.5 and I recently just bought a second bottle in the same shade, but when I put them side my side the color is different and looks a little different on my skin as well. Good thing that the new shade actually looks better on my skin, but I don't think the shade being noticibly different is supposed to happen. Other than that it's perfect!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for a couple of years, my only regret is that I didn't know about it earlier, my coworkers asked if I use any foundation and they were surprised that I do, because it looks flawless!!! To be honesty, I've used other drug store brands, and they totally destroyed my skin with closed acne and flakes, I couldn't use anything but toner for a couple of years until I got Armani, it's very gentle, lightweight, gives flawless skin without any burden, I also got Armani fluid sheer, Mastro bronzer and Smart moisture serum, all of them are great!!!

I have dry/acne prone skin with lots of scarring on my cheeks from acne. This foundation doesnt cover any of the discoloration what so ever. However if you have a clear complexion this is a great foundation, its light weight and looks like your skin but better. One downside is that I feel like its not very long wearing
Been using this foundation for a long time, love it. Find the perfect color. It fits for dry skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with this foundation. I apply it with a beauty blender and it gives the most natural, flawless (medium) coverage that is so easy to build to full coverage, and never looks cakey. The price is quite high, but in my opinion totally worth it. My skin looks great with this foundation, even at it's worst. It also lasts through the whole day. I Would definitely recommend this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been wanting to try this foundation for a long time, but I was put off by the price. I finally tried it when I received a beauty insider 20% coupon and I'm so glad I did! The luminous silk makes my skin look flawless and it feels wonderful...barely there. This is my new 'go to' foundation and it's worth every penny. You don't need much and it lasts a long time.

This foundation is the best foundation I have ever used in my life!!! It looks so natural and it photographs really well! The foundation made my skin look flawless and was the perfect coverage. Definitely not full coverage but a nice medium! It also works well with multiple powders and really holds all day!
the color variety for dark skin literally doesn't exist
I use good foundations irregardless of brand names.  This foundation is obviously good for my skintone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product however it is not long wearing, i tried it under a number of primers and it would not stay.
This is one of the few foundations that works well with my combo skin and doesn't come off of my nose in an hour!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how buildable this formula is. I typically use 2 pumps in the morning for my work day. If I am wearing this in thev evening, I'll build it up a bit more. I prefer applying with a brush and sometimes smoothing over with a beauty blender. It even goes on great with my fingers.

I tend to switch foundations.. a lot...which may be an understatement. I enjoy trying new ones to achieve different looks. This one, however,  quickly became my go-to foundation for daily use. I was introduced to this actually by my mom (57) and adores this foundation, I'm 23, and love it as much as she does! It's a beautiful texture and lasts through a hectic work day, it has a beautiful finish and is not messy. The only problem we have is the closest places that carries it to us is Toronto, I wish Armani was in all Sephora stores!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a habit of switching my foundation every time I go to the store since I started wearing foundation. Until I started using this foundation. I normally want a heavy coverage so when someone recommended this foundation I wasn't convinced that I would like it. I was clearly wrong. This foundation creates a beautiful glowing finish and it feels incredible on my skin.

Luxurious, light, blended well. I have normal/dry skin that's sensitive and gets a bit oily in summer. This was light and didn't feel masky at all. Everything everyone said about how lovely this foundation is is true. Love it.

I received this product complimentary in Exchange for my complete and honest opinion! I ended up loving this product! I was worried since I read some of the other reviews but I didn't have any issues! It went on smooth and I loved how my skin looked after!

This foundation other than me getting the shade a tad to light it slid everywhere. It would not just stay put. I tried with dofferent primers and without and still it slid everywhere i could literally move it with my finger then put it semi back in place. Soo weird. I didnt think it was silky or anything. To mee it was pretty matte but like slippery under. It caught on to the sides of my nose and in between my eyebrows and my chin and it was cakey in those spotss. Just overal weird. I returned this.
I hate it when I like an expensive product. I bought the smaller size to see what it's like..and it's good! It looks so good on my oily skin. I'll probably be repurchasing.
A flawless foundation which is so light but also delivers great coversge. Also a great glow. Love it.
