reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly was expecting to fall in love with this foundation, but i didn't. I've bought drug store makeup better than this... had no coverage and looked too natural (literally looked like i did before and could see all my freckles etc.) I applied with a beauty blender and it was not easily blendable.

I bought the smaller version of this, just to try it out. My shade is a bit light on me so that is my fault not the foundation, I have to mix in something warm with it to get the shade I like. It is fresh light and has a pretty dewy finish. That's all. Can't say I'm in love or dislike it, but my favorite foundations usually are full cover glam, however I do where this often.

Not really the best like everyone says. It looks pretty average on the skin if you ask me. Probably going to be returning it because i feel like its starting to break me out even after only 3 times of using it. I wish it worked for me.

reviews.review_title: beautiful your skin but better finish
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin so it's very hard for me to find a foundation that doesn't accentuate texture And fine lines. I have read over and over that the luminous silk foundation is magic for dry skin. I finally caved and bought it and I must say I agree BUT I think there is better. Now I have never seen anyone reference the Too Faced Born This Way foundation as a dupe for this but honestly I get the same finish from both except fuller coverage from TF. I was not disappointed in the Armani foundation, but I do have acne, so I need something with a little more coverage. I will keep this foundation for my good skin days because honestly, it is beautiful. But I would recommend looking at the Too Faced one as a cheaper option.
Makes your skin look just like the name suggests, silk. Not the longest wear time, but still lasts well. Photographs really well.
didn't work for me. I have acne prone oily skin and it doesn't sit well. I've tried everything to make it work.
I absolutely love this foundation. I've tried TONS of different kinds of brands and this is one of my top two favorite. Definitely try it out. Really gives your skin a silky soft finish!

reviews.review_title: sad to announce this foundation is perfect!
reviews.review_text: I find it so versatile. I can use a make up spray before applying and make it look really luminous. I can set it with powder and it will stay matte all day. Doesn't add any acne to my skin, keeps my oil at bay, in fact I don't think I've ever had a color match me so truly. Perfect so far!

reviews.review_title: Appropriately named, it's like silk. Or buttah..
reviews.review_text: The coverage is a little sheer for my less than perfect skin, but the consistency is lovely, well worth the price. It has a slightly dewy look when you wear it over Glossier's perfecting skin tint, which is my favorite combination and makes me look like I was born with better skin and am several years younger. I just wish they offered more shades in the smaller size because $60 is a lot.

So i read and read through MANY reviews for months on this fab foundation and being that im not much of a matte chick,and all ab the dew/lumi look,you'd think i would have tired before i did..It wasn't even the price that stopped me,it was the review's that said not buildable or sheer,but medium buildable at most. I have freckles that i see most girls are faking now(???) but personally i don't like mine and it takes a high coverage or buildable foundation to cover SOO,my HG has been MUFEs HD stick foundation Y445(the stick i find more dewy than actual foundation) so after reviewing this and earning a badge on Influenster for the many girls asking me ab MUFE stick,someone pm'd me ab the Armani swearing id love it which got me here. Yes i know this is a long review but worth it-i ordered this baby and the SECOND i got it i went straight to put it on..id just ordered a new brush as well w no intentions on using with this so let me shorten up by saying i used with Sephora#47 foundation brush,Tartes Airbrush Bamboo foundation brush,fingertips AND a BB(i hate BBs) and it truly amazes me how much difference in coverage you CAN get just from choosing the right tool!!! If i had tried Armanis Lumi with JUST a BB or reg.brush(did NOT like covergae w BB and 47 did ok,js not as GREAT as the airbrush brush) i still would have given 5 stars so it wouldn't affect the actual foundation review, i hate when ppl do this bc its not always the foundation,sometimes its just using the right tool. In this/my case using with Tartes Airbrush Bamboo foundation brush gave me not only the dew,but a flawless face! The BB ate this bc it is sheer and soaked right up and although my 47 Sephora brush worked well too,my point is you gotta use this foundation with diff tools til you find what meets your goals but all in all Armani Luminous is definitely luminous,and although sheer,it absolutely CAN be as buildable as you'd like using the right tool.I also want to add for the many saying they wouldn't use for all day,my secret that has earned me a spot in a certain magazine (coming out October! yes im excited as i should be ;))is taking Bare Minerals original powder foundation and after Armani dries,take your powder brush,dip and tap off most then very lightly in circular motions add/buff onto the spots your worried about..works like a setting powder but won't take away that Armani Glow we buy this for..  I would suggest testing your color with a sample first before ordering simply bc i bought the #7 and it looks darker online than it came.im a Y445 in MUFE.(i never buy foundation online unless i know my color,that was my stupidity. LOL)..other than that if your looking for a subtle glow to a dewyER glow,w/o packing down your face with tons of product,you will love this and to those who ask if this gives that KimK glow? Yes it absolutely does give that glow,but not hers,embrace YOURS!!! Just remember,if your a BB girl and expecting more coverage,your better off with a brush sweetie! xXxXx

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the foundation I've repurchased the most, even though it's a little pricier than others. I love the buildable coverage and how airbrushed I look wearing it - definitely in my holy grail of products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used enough foundation to know what actually works for me. This is definitely one of the top 3. It is so smooth and silky, it makes you feel like your skin is breathable beneath all the makeup. It actually conceals pretty well for redness and few spots here and there. I don't think it will cover up new acne or recent break out scars. It's very light weight, and covers up any redness or irritation you might have on your skin. However, in terms of coverage for pores, not as good as the Dior foundations.  This foundation does have a pleasant scent and it is really moisturizing. I wouldn't call this long lasting, so if you are planning to go out door in a hot summer day where you know you will sweat than this might not be such a good idea. For daily office work, this is the perfect go to foundation.

Seriously, this is THE BEST foundation I've ever owned. I must always keep this in stock because it's THAT good. Medium natural buildable coverage that has the perfect amount of glow. Every time I wear it I always get asked what foundation I'm wearing. A bit pricier than other foundations, but it's SO worth it. Prior to this, my favorite is MUFE, so if you like MUFE, I'd recommend testing this one out. I've brought this to CMs and the artists never had to use a boatload of pumps to cover my face, one and a half pumps was more than enough to cover my face using a brush. A beauty blender with this gives a great finish, BUT it might eat a little of the product. I use it with a beauty blender anyways. Highly recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only thing I liked about this foundation is its colour. The 3 matched my fair asian skin tone very well. However, it is not luminous at all but drying. It evaporates very fast as well which leaves my skin dry and too matte. Also, it broke me out and caused a lot of little bumps I only get when I use something that doesn't suit my skin so this is for a return. :(

My all time favorite! I've had this product for awhile now and I have not been disappointed. Great coverage, smells amazing and last for a long time. I find that even though I am at the end of the bottle that just by simply unscrewing it I can still dab what I need on my Beauty Blender. Will definitely restock!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this foundation. I was using dior skin nude serum and I loved the light weight sheer coverage that it gave, however, it oxidized and I started turning slightly orange throughout the day. With this, I still get light weight coverage that I cannot feel and it does not oxidize. It leaves my face looking natural, smooth, and it lasts through my 14+ hour work days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably the best foundation I've ever used. I've been a MUA for 5 years (freelance & retail) and this foundation is AMAZING. If you're thinking about trying this, you definitely should. I'm sorry I haven't tried it sooner, it's totally worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure whats with the hype of this, it's not a horrible foundation more like a decent foundation. Coverage is deff a medium at best, no where near full. I keep it and wear it for photos quickly, not something I would wear going out. Won't be repurchasing but I will use what I have.
Though this is pricey this foundation looks so flawless on my face. I have mad acne scars and This foundation is so buildable. Also have dry skin works great
I would not call this full coverage. It's a solid medium, but definitely not full. My face turns to grease immediately with this foundation. Not a winner for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great every-day foundation that can be built to desired coverage. Looks stunning when applied with a beauty blender, need a powder to set if you want it to last more than a few hours. The only downside would be I find it doesn't last the entire day, especially in summer.

I am not a huge fan of foundation, I hate the feeling of a super thick base! however this foundation was everything I look for!! it's lightweight - medium to full coverage, and it just makes my skin glow! I love this foundation so much I will definitely repurchase, worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A very luxurious foundation, Great coverage with a beautiful natural finish. Good for combinational skin. Blends nicely give beautiful glow.

I've tried ALLOT of foundations looking for the one I bought it thinking it might be the one but it was SOOO GRAY that when I took pictures with it my face was OBVIOUSLY gray and my neck was a completely different color so bummed it didn't work out.

I really didn't want to like this foundation because it is so expensive but it is truly amazing. Very lightweight with build-able coverage. I personally love a good sheer foundation but some days I need more coverage and I can achieve both with this. It has such a beautiful finish not matte or dewy but very natural with a healthy glow looks like you have flawless skin! It lasts all day on me and I have normal to oily skin (oily t zone so I set that area with powder). I have a lot of different foundations that I truly love (make up forever, Josie Maran, hourglass, urban decay naked, and NARS sheer glow, KVD) but I reach for this one every single day. I will continue to repurchase this foundation over and over again it's definitely my go to!!

I have used so many different foundations trying to find THE one, and ever since I've started using LS, my search has ended! I have combination skin that leans oily, and this foundation goes on somewhat matte, but melts into my skin so beautifully after a minutes. Coverage is buildable, mostly lighter to medium. It can last nearly all day on my skin with or without primer. It did take a few tries (even with color matching at Sephora, and the GA counter) before I found a shade to match (4.5 for NC25-30), but the shade range is extensive so there is a match out there for most.

This really is a beautiful foundation. I'm incredibly pale (NC10) and this foundation is like a second skin. It's also incredibly buildable wihout looking cakey. However, it wouldn't last the whole day for me even with a primer.

If you're looking for full coverage this foundation can still be for you! I have combination skin but normally I don't deal with breakouts. BUT when I moved the well water was harsh on my skin and I had a major breakout on the side of my cheek. I tried everything under the sun to cover up the spots and redness but it all looked or felt heavy and greasy and just not good. I finally tried putting a very fine translucent powder on the area breaking out before applying my foundation and it work wonders! I'm on my second bottle of this now and will definitely keep buying this.

This goes on very smooth and silky and can get to full coverage. I have oily skin and although it doesn't make me oily more than normal and I do wear a primer, it doesn't last all day. Great for shorter events or photos I think.
I have tried a lot of foundations. This one takes the cake, and by that I mean easy to use, blends nicely and good coverup. Doesn't make my skin dry or cake up. Love it

This is a very nice foundation, a beautiful natural finish that lasts and looks great on dry skin. It is full coverage but I did have a mark that showed through a bit but that goes with a more natural skin look I guess. I've been searching for the perfect wedding day foundation and while this is a contender I'm not 100% convinced it would last as long as it needs to.

I have combination skin and I find it's very forgiving on my oily t-zone and it looks healthy on my dry skin. I have a huge pore issue but this works so well even without a primer. My pores were unnoticable and it made my skin look airbrushed. My boyfriend couldn't tell I was wearing foundation but he just said I look beautiful that day. It lasted me all day and didn't fade weirdly on my skin. I'm running to Sephora now to get a full size. The only downside is the high pricetag and it's kind of hard to get a match for my skin. but I'm willing to compromise for that gorgeous finish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was recommended this to use on my wedding day a few years ago and I'm so glad I did!  It looked beautiful in pictures and blended so well with my skin. It doesn't feel like I'm wearing makeup at all and I'm almost finished my 3rd bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is extremely oily and I easily get black heads from using certain products, but this without primer or anything, lasted all day on my face, did not creased or anything.  Absolute favourite.

I'm obsessed with this foundation. I use it all year long, rain or shine. The coverage is buildable but looks so natural, it's the closest thing to skin even for my combo/oily skin type. It wears all day with no touch ups needed. Im so hooked!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this foundation. The finish is so natural and looks just like skin!  I like spreading a pump of product on the right side of my face and a pump on my left side. I then blend the product into my skin lightly with a beauty blender.  This is probably not a great foundation for someone who likes a heavy coverage though. I get a few hormonal pimples on my chin and do not have major scars to cover up, so this works perfectly for me!
Wonderful! Worth every penny!

Hands down best foundation out there.. Yes it's pricy but I'll splurge any day for the best results & a little goes along way with this foundation. I'm so glad I gave into all the hype with this one.. BUY IT!!!
The only foundation I wear. It's truly beautiful. It's not full coverage IMO but that's why I like it. It's lightweight and looks natural. Worth the higher price point.

I'm hooked on this makeup. Sheer to nearly moderate coverage, light and silky texture, easily blendable. I use a moisturizer with SPF 100 and Giorgio Armani primer and it still doesn't become patchy, rather it lasts all day. I get sheer coverage and an even tone using a foundation brush & one pump. It's great for a natural, 'not wearing makeup look,' as my freckles show, but my skin tone becomes more even and healthier looking. I use a concealer in a few places. For more coverage, I use more foundation to hide the freckles, but I don't think it could ever be 'full coverage' makeup. In my opinion, it is not 'luminous,' drying, 'shiny' or moisturizing. I doubt it will completely hide every flaw, especially rosacea, without concealer. But if you like foundation that makes your skin look healthy and the color even, without shouting wearing makeup, this maybe for you. I guessed the color number the first time (4.5) because it was an online purchase. I wasn't sure I liked it, so I went to the store  and was told I needed 4.75. What a huge difference! If you aren't bowled over, you might have the wrong color. I mix a little Fluid Sheer with Luminous Silk foundation when I want a 'light from within' appearance.

reviews.review_title: I just keep coming back to it;
reviews.review_text: Let's be real, that price tag is ridiculous. And I'm sure there are nicer foundations out there that are better priced; However, I will say this is one of my go-to foundations. It's so light on my skin, I forget I'm even wearing any. Very build-able, without getting cakey. Heads up, this is not a full coverage foundation, so if you need more coverage I would suggest a different foundation. It's perfect for my everyday make-up. It does tend to get shiny towards the end of they day, but setting powder can fix it.
I have fair skin and this product matches it perfectly. it's lightweight, but provides amazing coverage. I cannot recommend this product enough.

Honestly I was skeptical, but this is a beautiful medium to full coverage foundation. It can be buildable and makes my skin look dewy and flawless! I get compliments all the time when I wear this foundation! 100% would recommend to anyone looking for a dewy medium to full coverage foundation

Gorgeous foundation! Applying this product with a brush will give you the best results. It has a very light feel and doesn't cake (if you have dry skin, exfoliate before applying to avoid flaking when applying foundation) definitely on the higher price range but it is worth it if you wear foundation frequently!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Giorgio Armani Luminous Silk has been my go to foundation for the past year. I have combination skin and it wears beautifully, at first i was nervous about the luminous part and how my semi oily nose would react with it, but it was fine there was no excessive shine and my oils didn't eat the foundation off of my nose. if you have severe scarring or acne on your face this might not be for you, you can definitely build up coverage but it takes a lot of product to get there. This foundation is so breathable and feels like you're applying water to your face, I always recommend this to all of my family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Medium coverage, smells luxury. Doesn't make my face more oil or dry, can last the whole day.

reviews.review_title: WORTH EVERY CENT AND THEN SOME
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely the best foundation I have ever tried. If you are hesitant to purchase because the price, I want you to know it is absolutely worth it!! I had this foundation for over 5 MONTHS and I just repurchased it. It is consistently wonderful whether my skin is clear or I'm breaking out. Since switching to this I rarely break out other than hormonally and I find my skin almost looks BETTER and heals faster after a day of wearing this.  It is beautiful and it doesn't cling to ant dry patches or texture. It gives the most natural finish and it's just absolutely perfect. Has a great color selection as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I suffer everytime I need to repurchase because it's so expensive but so worth it! This is my new favorite and I won't change it for anything else! You look beautiful and skin looks healthy. Not cakey and good lasting power!

The coverage of this foundation is great! It has a satin almost matte finish on my skin type. The only thing I don't like about this foundation is that I expected it to be dewy and luminous and it isn't.

So I gave into the hype......and I love this foundation. it applies beautifully with a brush or a beautyblender and it doesn't feel or look cakey or heavy!! It is a hit more mattifying than expected but it doesn't look unnatural. My only concern with this is it does oxidize after a few hours but it's nothing you can't fix with some concealer and baking. Overall, great lasting power and one of my new favorites!
Medium coverage, buildable. Smooth. Smells nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok here let's speak serious. This product is the king of the king for meidum to strong coverage makeup. This is the perfect bad skin day or evening foundation. It covers divinly and it doesn't crease or cakes. The skin looks fresh and luminous through out the day. the colour is perfect for my yellow skin tone so I don't look like I have makeup on my fae even with this good coverage product. Simply the best and a savioir in days feels like a rocky totmato field. ;)
I've tried just about every foundation on the market. This is the very best of them all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfects skin and gives a beautiful healthy glow! I love it because it makes my skin look healthy! It doesn't look like I am wearing foundation, it still looks like my skin! The only thing is I do not think it has SPF or any kind of moisterizers. So you will have to remember to wear your sun screen.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to pick at it b/c of $$ but I LOVE IT!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, I have been a VIB Rouge member for years - I know, I know, I've purchased a TON of product!! I have heard many people compliment this foundation but I thought - this is just too expensive and I can't imagine that it is worth the money. It is. I was wrong. Wow, the finish is just so silky/satiny/dewy and it gives great coverage but feels very light. I. LOVE. IT. It reflects the light real nice. I always use a primer, translucent powder and a setting spray and with my routine, I found it really held on all day. I admit it - I love it and unless someone finds something even better, this is my new go-to foundation! Yes, people, there IS a difference!
I love this foundation and I'm so glad that I tried it!

reviews.review_title: The best foundation I have ever used!
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin and this is the best foundation I have ever used!! It glides over blemishes without looking cakey and you can get any kind of coverage with it. In my opinion it's definitely worth the price tag!
Best foundation I ever bought. I found mine for life! I love the smell the texture is perfect. Amazing! So happy I found this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin tone is both incredible pale, and has weird neutral/yellow undertones, and normally the lightest shade is either too pink for me, or if it has the right undertones, too dark. I love the finish on this; it makes your skin look like it's glowing, and you can build on the foundation without it looking cakey. I will say that if you wear it for like 8 hours, it will start looking shiny, but that's what setting powder is for. Also, Armani could do better in terms of of the darker shades they offer (if Lupita N'yongo can't wear it, then what's the point?), which is why this product gets 4 stars instead of 5.

Medium coverage, dewy finish, and absolutely stunning! Looks like skin. Have not used anything that comes close. UD naked skin is the most similar but even that falls flat in comparison. If you want to splurge, go for it. Great shade options for medium skin tones. Lots of undertones to pick from. 10/10 would recommend.

I LOVE this foundation so much. For the people saying it doesn't last, try a different primer. I use the becca backlight priming filter primer and this lasts all day long. I wore it on a hike and was sweating so much and it STILL didn't budge. It just gives the most natural flawless finish I don't ever wanna use another foundation! I have texture and it doesn't emphasize any of it. I can build it up and it never looks cakey but honestly it's one of those foundations where you don't want to build it up because it just makes your skin look so healthy. Even if you do need to layer to cover up spots and blemishes it will do that beautifully. So glad I spent my money on this I can't wait to run out and repurchase!! I'm around NC40 and I use the shade 7.5.

I really like the brand Giorgio Armani but this foundation is not for oily skin. It already says luminous and so if you wear it your gonna look so greasy just after only wearing this a couple of hours.

I love this foundation for a lightweight more natural look. I have extremely oily skin and it isnt good at controlling oil:( BUT it does not break up on my skin so i just have to blot more. I love to mix this foundation w my EL double wear and it makes it more lightweight and comfortable to wear. I have repurchased 4 times and will continue.  Pros: lightweight, natural, glowy, poreless effect, comfortable to wear, doesnt break up on skin Cons: high price, no oil control
Best foundation I've ever used

Okay, honestly.. this foundation is magical. Thank you Armani for such an incredible foundation that is lightweight and long-lasting with an amazing luminous natural finish. This foundation blends easily into the skin and simply evens out your skin tone by giving it a glow from within look. Definitely a must have. Ladies, just give this a try.. you won't be disappointed.   Of course, it is a bit on the pricey side compared to other foundations, but don't let that stop you! If anything just use it for days/nights you're going out! Also, use a good smoothing primer underneath for the best results <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful foundation ! It gives me a flawless, natural and radiant finish. It's long wearing and doesn't get too glowy. I love setting it with the Armani Micro-Fil loose powder to look extra snatched !

reviews.review_title: hurts my wallet but very good quality
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation and it always makes me look so dewy! I have combination skin and this foundation never breaks up on my skin unless I've been wearing it while sweating in CRAZY heat. I sometimes mix it with my naked skin and it performs beautifully. If sephora is giving a VIB discount, this is the product tO splurge on

I've been using foundation for quite a long time now and have used several different brands with different finishes and formulas. This one truly feels like second skin and it is very easy to apply, blend and build up. I don't even feel like I need much concealer if any at all. Would highly recommend!

This stuff is magic. Looks like real, beautiful skin while providing flawless coverage for all of my skin imperfections. My skin is so oily that my foundation is typically melting off my face by noon -- NO MORE!  This stuff looks better and better throughout the day. Will never stray from this foundation - it is PERFECT!
I'm not a foundation person, I haven't worn it in years because nothing ever matches my skin. I have fair skin

reviews.review_title: Love but will not be repurchasing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this foundation but will not be repurchasing due to the price tag. I feel like I have to use so many pumps of this foundation in order to get a full coverage look. That being said, this is not suitable for covering up any acne or bumps on your face. I have dry and sensitive skin and this never clung to any dry patches when my skin was properly primed and moisturized. It sinks into my forehead lines so terribly. But, it looks airbrushed in pictures, makeup blends beautifully on top of it, and it looks very natural in person. I have found that the Wet and Wild Photo Focus Foundation dupes this foundation for around $5 and with more coverage.

This is the best foundation I have ever used, definitely worth the price. It hasn't broken me out, it Matches my skin perfectly. It Looks so natural, I have dry combination skin oily in the t Zone. I got the shade 6.25. I can't get over how much I love this ... I have tried every drug store foundation... I have tried Urban decay, nars, becca, tarte, make up forever, mac, Est√©e Lauder, Laura mercier, abh stick foundation... I'm so glad I found this.

best foundation I've ever used even though I got the wrong shade but it's okay bc I use drops from the body shop to make it lighter and when I use the foundation alone I make sure that my neck and body's the same color and when I do, it looks flawless tbh. I'm definitely going to buy the right shade soon because it's worth every penny.

Hands down my favorite go to foundation, looks beautiful on the skin, gives such a nice dewy; skin like finish. I have normal to dry skin and this lasts on my skin beautifully for most the day, always get compliments when wearing this foundation, won't disappoint!

reviews.review_title: made me break out! Does not last long!!
reviews.review_text: This foundation looks gorgeous on the skin. Really glowy and beautiful. But of course, it was too good to be true. It is super liquidy when applied and feels like it melts off of your face as the day goes on. It transfers onto clothing like no foundation I've ever seen before. I feel self conscious about hugging people when I wear it because I can always see foundation on their clothing. Even worse, it made me break out like crazy and did not sufficiently cover my acne. This foundation might be good for someone with already perfect skin. Not for me!!

This is the Best foundation on the market! The wear is fantastic, the coverage is perfect and it leaves you with a glow. Couldn't ask for a more perfect foundation! I have acne and an even complexion and this makes it look like I have perfect skin. Not cakey at all. Highly recommend!
Good coverage while looking natural. Great staying power. No breakouts or skin reaction.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for years...probably 5 years and I just purchased my 6 bottle. I have tried other expensive brands and I ended up throwing them away either because they are too cakey or the colors don't match my skin tone. I have very oily skin and this foundation is just made for my skin. The more oily my skin gets, the more natural it looks on me. Magical! It lasts FOREVER. The coverage is enough for the redness and blemishes, no concealer needed. I never use moisturizer or any primer before and it still goes on very smoothly....it just looks beautiful. I wear it as my everyday look, one bottle lasts about a year so the price is not bad--at least I didn't have to throw it away like I did after buying other foundations that don't work for me.

Wasting your money buying a new foundation 3 times a month ? Using 1/2 a bottle . Try this foundation once and you'll fall in love ! I have red pigmentation from acne and it doesn't hide every mark but it makes your skin beautiful and silky and even when you sweat looks flawless, absolutely no caking !

I have been using his foundation for 10  years. The hype is real - for me, at least. I have dry skin on my forehead, nose, and chin. Every other foundation cakes on my face, breaks up, and doesn't last. This formula is the only one that works for me. It lasts all day. I take naps in it and don't need to touch it up. I've even worn it when working out and it stays put (unless you are wiping your face repeatedly with a towel!). I live in the south and this foundation has always lasted in the heat and humidity, whether I'm in Atlanta in August or New Orleans in July. The coverage is medium at most. That's my only complaint. I wish it covered my redness around my nose and cheeks, but using a concealer is worth it because this foundation is a gem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation minus the price tag! I am NW18 in MAC and I bought this foundation in 4.5 and it's perfect.  It is medium coverage so I use concealer to spot correct any spots since it doesn't have full coverage but it is a great foundation!

I really wanted to fall in love with this foundation because so many people are obsessed with it. But, I like full -coverage or at least medium to buildable but this just was a light coverage. It felt heavy on my skin and I looked so oily after a couple hours. I just wasn't impressed. So if you have oily skin I recommend you try the GA Power Fabric foundation instead !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a love/hate relationship with this foundation. It is a bit mediocre in person, but HOLY COW in photos it looks amazing for some reason. Prime and set this foundation well and it will last, not an all day last but a good 6 hours or so. It is not my every day foundation, but I wear it when I know I am going to be in photos.

reviews.review_title: Not worth the money or the hype
reviews.review_text: Disappointed in this foundation. Didn't change my skin routine at all and I'm breaking out because of this product. I have combo skin and this sticks to my dry patches and sits on my skin weird, almost like it has a texture..which is odd for me because my skin is usually smooth and even in texture when bare. The shade is okay but I'm not blown away. Coverage is meh. It's more sheer to medium than I would like and no SPF living in Texas should have stopped me from buying it in the first place. I will absolutely be returning this and going back to my Rainforest of the Sea Water foundation with SPF 15.

I'd heard people rave about this foundation for years, and I never bought into the hype because I always believed people were just paying for the brand. I actually found a packet sample in a Salvation Army bin, so I threw it in my bag.... LOVE IT! I used it for my mom's bachelorette Party, and it photographed so well! I got compliments on my skin all night. Not my makeup. My Skin! I need this in my life now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous coverage! This is one of my go-to foundations for if I'm going out or have a special event. It leaves your skin looking photo finished, ideal. It has significant coverage but is certainly a foundation that is buildable. I wouldn't wear for a simple, every day look but if you are looking for something stronger and full coverage, this product is amazing.

I have tried almost every foundation out there and this one surpasses all. It never clumps, great for baking, never creases, blends amazing, and stays on all day. I have very sensitive skin and I'm pretty pale and this blends perfectly and lasts all day. I tried the dior foundation recently and it was the worst foundation I've ever used and was super cakey, this one does not do that at all.

Honestly, I put off buying this foundation for so long. I was always so hesitant to buy it. Only got it because I had a gift card and everyone on YouTube was raving about it.   So glad I gave into the hype. The finish is such a beautiful satin, skin-like finish yet delivers such a good buildable coverage. The bottle pump has so much control too.   Only con: I have normal to combo skin and I don't feel as though the lasting power is amazing. I get a decent 5-6 hours of wear before it starts to break down on me but for the 5-6 hours that it does stay, it is SO beautiful.

reviews.review_title: Best of the BEST- oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried SO many high end foundations, but have never really found one that I was obsessed with until I purchased this foundation. I always heard others rave about this foundation, but I never purchased it before because (1) I have oily skin and the luminous name of it made me a little hesitant to buy it since I have oily skin. (2) the foundation is very expensive. I typically bought foundations within the $40-$50 price range, but I decided to splurge a little more for this foundation and give it a try. It has been the best decision I have made! The color range is amazing and it seriously looks like your own skin, you can't tell you are wearing foundation. The finish is luminous but it's so beautiful, as someone that has oily skin I've never tried a foundation that made my skin look radiant/healthy glow like this foundation. I do have acne-prone skin and ever since I used this foundation I have noticed that my skin texture has decreased and my skin is getting so much better! It also lasts a very long time and looks great! The coverage is a medium, but can definitely build up to full coverage. I just absolutely love this foundation and recommend it to others!! Yes, it may be expensive but trust me it is worth every single penny. I have never tried a foundation that I loved so much like this one! I will definitely be saving up to repurchase this again as it will be my go to foundation from now on. Please give it a try! I promise you won't be disappointed! Especially for my girls out there with oily skin that want a luminous look but don't want to look TOO oily this is perfect for you!

reviews.review_title: Oily skin - good for winter foundation.
reviews.review_text: I love how it makes my skin look but only when I'm not as oily (therefore I can only wear it in the winter). Of all the foundations I've tried (and that is A LOT. Trust me), this one does the best job at making my skin look poreless. I wish it worked better for oily skin but oh well. Maybe it's for the best that I can't use this year round because it's so expensive and I use about 3 pumps every time so I go through this quickly.

I've tried a lot of foundations and this is the best foundation ever! Hands down to this foundation I have oily skin but only in my T zone but I still use it all over my face and it last all day until I wash my face at night and all I can say is this foundation is the best I will be purchasing it again this is going to b my now foundation ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

I have tried hydrating foundation of many brand: ysl, dior, chanel, and this is the last one. I tried it in winter when my skin is driest during the year, it amazed me! After 4-5 hours it's still very natural, just like my own skin! I will definitely buy it again.
Super sheer coverage have to returned sadly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is amazing! I have extremely dry skin and have had trouble finding a foundation that did not leave my skin looking like the Sahara desert. This foundation keeps my skin looking healthy and glowing all day. It does not  create a matte look so if you like matte or have more oily skin this foundation may not work for you. I was impressed with the color choices as I am a very pale pink person and the 3.75 matched perfectly. Most other foundations are either too neutral and leave me looking like a ghost or are to muddy. Overall I am impressed with the coverage, match, and look of this foundation. The price point is a little high but I think it is definitely worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly? The hype on this product is  WAY over rated. I followed reviews, googled, and youtubed this product weeks before purchase.  Finally I took the plunge...and closed my eyes at checkout... ( Super expensive!!)   I gave it a week to give it a fair shake.   Ladies...truly...Its only so so.  That's my honest and fair review.   I felt the product stuck to all the areas I didnt want it too.  ( dry spots ...lines around nose)  ..And wore off in the key area needing coverage on me ..My cheeks.  It was tacky to the touch..and wore off on clothing. ( I blended the product into my neck..as this brand doesnt make a complete colour match for my skin.  Yes.. I did Beauty IQ work with a  Beauty Advisor.  This went back to the store for  a refund.

When I first ordered this sight unseen, I ordered shade 2 which I worried would be too light, but it matches my neck really well! At first when I put it on it felt just ok and was pretty light coverage from what I'm used too. But after a few minutes it looked really good! By the end of the evening my face looked soft and smooth! I guess it just takes some time to settle into the skin. Very happy with it so far! I used my bye bye redness first to cover up my red patches. After applying the foundation over top it covered surprisingly well!
Not for combination skin. Poor coverage. It is like a bb cream, evens out the skin tone and thats it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great foundation, nice coverage and nice finish. I cut one star off because it didnt amaze me enough for the price point- but if your looking to splurge on a nice luxurious foundation this is a decent one! You can check it in my video below :)

My favorite foundation, worth every penny! I have combination oily skin, medium tan and this foundation is so beautiful, I always get compliments on my skin when I am wearing this! It covers my blemishes and gives a satin finish with a subtle radiant glow.  The lasting power is average but with a shine control primer it is optimal for my como still oily skin. A little of product goes a long way, it works best with a brush for me rather than a beauty blender. This is one of the only foundations I have been able to match my skin tone almost exactly to. Amazing, I will definitely repurchase when I finish my bottle.

This is the best foundation ever. Leaves my skin flawless and not cakey or dry. Perfect match for my skin tone. Big Big thumbs up. I use it with brush for move coverage and beauty blender when i need minimal coverage. Goes with any primer, i have tried over 5 different types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have light, mature skin with redness so I purchased the shade 4 foundation along with the shade 4 powder foundation.  I applidc a color science primer after moisturizing, then the foundation with a damp beauty sponge.  I used the Tarte shape tape concealer in light sand which matched perfectly for me (also using a damp beauty blender).  Then the powder with a large fluffy brush.  It made my skin look smooth and hid my redness and other imperfections.  Applied my make up and then Urban Decay Chill Cooling and Hydrating Makeup Setting Spray.

This is my favorite daily foundation. It sits nicely on my mature, dry skin and looks great for 12  hours with minimal powder touch ups. It works great with the Hourglass Mineral Veil primer and I am excited to experiment with other primers as well. This is definitely in my top 5!
Full coverage and light weight. I like the dewy look that this gives.
This foundation is my absolute favorite. Even though I can't feel it on my skin it makes my face look so glowy and healthy. I always get compliments on my skin when I wear it.

I have combination skin and this lasts all day and looks beautiful. Mind you I live in the tropics and have 13 hour days that include a workout. I set it with the RMS un powder and I'm good to go for the rest of the day.

Absolutely fell in love with this foundation on my acne prone & oily skin. Used the Hourglass Mineral Veil as well as the Becca Ever Matte and it's worked wonders! Only issue is now that I am out of a bottle there has not been a stock in my colour for over a month ! :( Help !
Amazing. Light. Glowy but not greasy. Silky. Does not settle into fine lines. Worth the price absolutely

I love how smooth and easy it is to apply this formula. I think for me this foundation is a lighter coverage and great for everyday wear. I can still see my skin underneath the foundation. Unfortunately, for the big price tag I was expecting way more. It wasn't a wow or amazing foundation.

reviews.review_title: Extremely Light weight. Good for daily use. EASY!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know! This pricey foundation cannot be for daily use. But that's the best you get from it. It's not full-coverage, it does not transform your skin. But it is a great everyday foundation - it feels so light, smells great (mild amber/sandalwood-ish smell), use it everyday still won't break you out, not so long wearing, even if it wears off by the end of the day it won't end up looking cakey or ugly. The quality of the product shows, it's just great. Apply with BRUSH ONLY-that too only tap it into skin, don't drag. Makes the world of a difference on how it looks. It dries to a semi-powdery finish, but not too matte. Layering after it dries is better than 2 or more pumps of product at a time.

I have tried just about every brand of foundation and I have to say that this one is the best. Every time I use it someone compliments me on my skin. I have old acne scars and they seem to fade away with this without it feeling heavy. I totally recommend it!

I was one of those people. The one that said there's no way I'm buying a $62 foundation, it's not work the money. Well boy was I wrong. I have very dry skin and was finding it difficult to find a foundation that wouldn't accentuate all my dry patches. Well this foundation doesn't do that and just looks amazing on my skin. It's super long lasting for me but again I am dry. I loved the coverage, I'm not a full coverage kinda girl. I'm more light to medium coverage and this foundation gives me everything and more. Totally worth the money!

Finally gave into the hype and order this. The first time I applied it the coverage was patchy. I have sensitive skin on the drier side and this foundation showed every dry patch.  I used a beauty blender the first time. Second time I tried it was with a foundation brush same disappointing results. So sadly I returned it.

At first, I was so in love with how it looked right after application. It looked so even, fresh, and dewy. However, after about five hours, it's a mess. It breaks up and settles into my creases, and I become an oil slick, even though I set it with powder. Also, I wear color 3.5 and notice it oxidizes throughout the day.   I think this would be great for people with dry skin, but not combination or oily. Pretty sad because I really loved it at first and it took me a while to admit to myself it wasn't that great.
This foundation looks splotchy on my skin, but it mixes fabulous with others.

reviews.review_title: Formula is nice, shades are not.
reviews.review_text: The formula is great. It's luminous and hydrating but not shiny on my combination skin. The only issue is the lightest shade is still too dark for me. I have neutral undertones and shade 2 is very orange on me. Please make lighter shades!!

This foundation looks amazing when you first put it on, however, it definitely doesn't last through a full work day even with proper base and powder, and with such a steep price, I definitely expected more than a product that lasts no longer than 4-5 hours

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation. Applies well with the beauty blender and provides me medium coverage. The only issue for me is that it causes my skin to breakout. I have normal skin with acne problems on my chin and forehead. After about a month of use, I noticed more acne and even acne on my cheek.

reviews.review_title: I doesn't get much better than this!
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love! Absolutely like silky butter on my skin. Gorgeous color match and finished like a dream. I like a natural makeup look and this dressed up my routine without looking heavy. I hate thick makeup but like semi-full coverage (more than a BB, less than full matte) this is everything and so much more. I will never stray!!

reviews.review_title: Great color match, thats about it...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been waiting years to try this foundation and made it a priority to pick up during the VIB sale. I was very disappointed. This foundation does not blend into the skin seamlessly and it doesn't do a good job covering imperfections. I have hyper pigmentation and this foundation just made my imperfections look worse. I tried using concealer. However, it did not blend well with the foundation. I gave the silk foundation 2 stars because the color match was amazing. I've never had a foundation match my skin color perfectly. Such a bummer it didnt work well for me.

i absolutely love everything about this foundation except for the breakouts. sigh. so so close. perfect match. applied beautifully. gorgeous finish (even on my combo/oily skin). felt so comfortable on the skin. but wow, the breakouts. the fragrance and parabens in this is what did it. had to return it. :(

Omg I literally think I've tried every foundation between Macys , Sephora and Duane Reade!! Yes Duane Reade! I don't know how you did it but this is the Holy Grail every woman have been looking for. My face literally have a glow all day long. I only retouch my nose before I go home. This foundation is applied at 6:30 am and remains EXACTLY THE SAME UNTIL I GET HOME AT 6:30 at night! It doesn't get into my fine lines or smudge . The only problem it's expensive ! But I don't care!!! Yesss! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my top foundations.  I have very dry skin but this works really well for my skin!!  I also love the color - I am neutral undertone with slight pink discoloration.  It definitely has a silky look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am not sure why this is listed as long wearing -- this lasted maybe 3 hours, no more than 4 hours before it was faded and needed a full application.  The color is perfect, the texture is perfect. My skin looks perfect .... for 2.5 hours.  I tried the long wearing version but that is way too dry.  Wish this formula would last me one full day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i got this as a sample on one of my orders tried it and fell in love in a instant love how it looks on my skin and i have combination skin i do set it with powder on my t zone but i love it love it i just purchase my bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the full bottle once before and loved it, but this time bought the travel size one. The coverage was awful and blotchy, it felt comfortable on my skin as it did once before, but it was kind of meh. Not as great as I remembered it being.

This is by far my favorite foundation, I love the coverage and the yellow under tone of this makeup! I use to use Chanel and switched to this. I have not gone back. I will continue to stock my supply of this product because it helps my skin look flawless and hydrated without looking oily.

reviews.review_title: I think this might be HG status
reviews.review_text: This foundation is not full coverage, but it is build-able. The first time I applied it, I put on one layer and then added an extra layer on some blemishes I had. It blended out nicely, effortlessly, and didn't look cakey at all. It lives up to its name because it felt like very silky on my skin. I love that it's not matte nor is it too dewy to the point where it looks greasy, even tho I still recommend setting it with powder. Lastly, it's long lasting; I wore it a full day and it didn't get gross looking. The only thing I don't like is the price so I'll be saving this foundation for special occasions and use my other ones for everyday.
This foundation is amazing it makes my skin look so smooth & hydrated & it last all day!

reviews.review_title: I Didn't Want to Love it...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was a skeptic, I didn't want to love it but I had to try it since I heard everyone raving about it. My skin is pale, prone to redness, it's dry and I have acne scars on my chin. A good foundation is really important to me, so I tried out a sample size. This foundation really goes on like silk, it blends really well to look natural while still giving me the coverage I need. It lasts most of the day and gives a little bit of a fresh, dewy appearance. I did not want to love it, due to the price, but I have to say that when I ran out and went back to my previous foundation, I found myself missing this stuff so much! I also got a lot of compliments on my skin while wearing it, which is a rarity since I have pretty terrible skin. :) I have just ordered another bottle, my skin is happy but my wallet is not!

i got a sample of this thing about 2 weeks ago and i still am not even close to finishing! IT IS SO AMAZING AND YOU NEED SO LITTLE FOR A FLAWLESS EFFECT! yes the price is a little out of hand, but trust me with someone who has tried all the foundation at sephora, this is by  far the best for people with normal or combination skin and not heavy coverage it's the perfect not to fill but not too light coverage, but if you desire more it's definitely buildable, it just blurs out my skin and makes it look FLAW-LESS!

I am not someone that normally wears foundation because it always looks too cakey, and unnatural.. the colors never work with my skin tone.. etc. So I've stuck to BB creams to offer some coverage but still be natural. THIS foundation though has changed everything for me! It melts/blends perfectly into my face.. zero cakeyness and the wide color selection allowed me to find my perfect match! I highly recommend this product. I've never written a review before but I just HAD to after using this product. 100000 stars!!!
I find it very hard to find the perfect foundation. Until now the closest I came was True Match L'Or√©al.. and I've tried almost all of Sephora foundations. By far the best

For a foundation that cost as much as this did...I expected it to help me drop 10 Ibs, snatch my waist, and raise my future child. Sadly, not only did this NOT do any of the above, it just wasn't anything special to me. The foundation didn't really cover up my dark spots well but did do a fabulous job in highlighting/chalking around my blemishes. I have oily/combination skin and this foundation often caked up my face and peeled around my nose. It applies like a dream at first (on clean skin/no primer) but if you are layering any other product on, it doesn't play nice. I'm sad this didn't work for me but a little happy because I won't have to choose between either buying this product again or paying my phone bill.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin. A couple of blemishes, nothing too crazy. I bought this one on recommendation because I was such a huge fan of the Maestro, but felt the coverage was a little too sheer. This one had slightly better coverage, but my issues were: oily by the end of the day, foundation essentially disappeared by the end of the day (so not long wearing), and I just couldn't get it to be as buildable in coverage as others. Overall, I regret purchasing this because the price point didn't match my expectations whatsoever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful foundation. I like how it sinks right into my skin and is so foolproof to apply. The formula is not runny at all, it provided me full coverage right away. I didn't feel the need to build the coverage, so a very little goes a long way with this foundation. I used a beauty blender to apply this and experienced a beautiful silky result. It covered evenly and smoothly, lasted all day great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the BEST foundation. Extremely lightweight and blends very evenly across the skin. I LOVE how you can achieve any look you want with this weather it be light, medium or full coverage. Super build able. Also extremely long lasting--coming from someone who wears this foundation everyday for at least 10 hours! ALSO my skin does not feel oily nor dry when wearing this foundation. Goodbye dry patches and breakouts!
makes my skin look chalky and dry... weird texture.  Like the fluid sheer but this is just odd...returning

I love this foundation it is one of my top favorite of all time! Love the formula for dry skin, cant wear anything else in winter time. It gives a very light glow to skin once applied and doesn't oxidize on my skin. I do need to reapply on my t-zone area after 5~6 hrs have gone passed, but it doesn't smear off in that disgusting patches that some foundation leaves. I wear in shade 2. It also goes on nicely when you mix with MAC strobe cream or armani's fluid sheer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I wanted to hate this so bad when I first got it just because the price is so outrageous, but I tried it and I fell in love !  My initial first impression was that it was so much lighter and sheer than what I was used to. I'm deff a full coverage girl because I have freckles that I like to cover up but this foundation is light-medium coverage but I must say it really taught me to love my skin more without full coverage. It really does look so luminous and radiant on my face especially throughout the day. It doesn't feel like I have anything on. It just looks so fresh like skin. I love applying this with a morphe m439. The shade 2 is so perfect on my skintone too, like I never had a foundation match me so perfect before and it doesn't oxidize at all. Overall it's a beautiful foundation I already repurchased :)
Tried a few years ago, loved but didn't buy one. This time I got both lsf and power fabric, lsf is wayyyyyyyy better than power fabric.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry combination skin. This foundation is very hydrating and it didn't feel cakey at all.But....I have a hard time finding the perfect color for my skin. I am light skin with yellow undertone. I tried 4.5 and 5, which are slightly too pale for me in the summer time. I also tried 5.5, which is way too dark. I think the only way it will work for me is to mix 5 and 5.5 together.

reviews.review_title: Think it may just be me?
reviews.review_text: I've ALWAYS heard such rave reviews about this foundation and decided to test the waters with the smaller bottle. Everyone always says you have such a beautiful radiating glow and it always seems to have a nice finish on and of the youtubers I've watched. The first time I put it on, my face got SO dry and the foundation was balling up on my face after a few hours. It was disgusting and extremely uncomfortable and saw small bumps on my skin. I've never had a foundation do that to me. To confirm it was the foundation I tried it again the next day with a lighter moisturizer in advance and a more hydrating primer. I had the same exact thing happen. It was so bad that the skin around my nose and chin started to peel and I had irritation bumps all over my face. I'm just really baffled. I don't really want to knock the foundation too hard as I've seen the way it's supposed to look. My only thought is that the smaller bottles may not sell as quickly and maybe it was just an old bottle? Either way, I'm not saying don't purchase as I know it can be a lovely foundation, just test it out first if you have sensitive skin.
Makes my skin look flawless!

reviews.review_title: Waited years to try this product...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I felt as though I had seen this product touted by celebrity MUAs for years and definitely built it up as a holy grail product in my mind.  Since it isn't available in store, I put off trying it until I could shade match in person.  I will say that the shade range is impressive and I found a perfect match.  I will also say that using this foundation in conjunction with the fluid sheer makes it much better, much more dewy and natural light finish with some glow.  That said... I did not love the product on its own.  The coverage is on the light/medium side, which I like, but somehow found the finish to be chalky and almost cakey on my skin.  Not the product I hoped it would be.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been to multiple Sephora stores and tried over 11 different types of foundation that I had matched in the store, and none of them worked. I wanted a medium coverage foundation that was slightly dewy and looks like skin. Finally, I decided to just order a couple of shades of this foundation because it had such great reviews and met all of my needs. I got them in the mail today and I am so impressed!! The shade 3.75 matched so perfectly! The formula is insanely lightweight but has such a beautiful airbrushed finish. I suffered from pretty bad acne, and although most of my breakouts are gone, I have lots of redness left on my skin. This covered that with no issues and a second layer covered up any active breakouts. So far, I am in LOVE with this foundation!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: every time i wear this foundation my skin looks phenomenal! its not super full coverage but not what my concealer cant cover. this foundation is worth the splurge

I love how the foundation sets and looks on my face but only thing is usually whenever I wear foundation and go out drinking my red face wouldn't go through but with this foundation u can see how red my face would get.

reviews.review_title: HG foundation for very pale, sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: Enough said - this is amazing. Beautiful, easy to apply coverage, great color matching, all day staying power, no shine and never have to reapply. Looks natural and makes my skin look absolutely perfect. I have repurchased this at least 8-10 times, I have used Lanc√¥me and NARS but have never found anything I love more than this.

reviews.review_title: Natural, smooth coverage for mature skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 47 but look young for my age, despite the fact that I grew up spending long days at the beach with zero sunscreen. I'm just starting to notice changes in texture to my skin. I've always worn natural-looking, minimal makeup, especially by current standards, getting by on tinted moisturizers until last year. I tried several foundations but couldn't escape caking and creasing until I found this foundation. I have some redness (cheeks, around my nose), and the texture of my skin isn't what it used to be. Having said all of that, I absolutely love this foundation and won't even bother trying others now that I've found it. The coverage is perfect for me, even given my age and imperfections. I apply with a foundation brush rather than a blender--it just seems to set better that way. It is expensive but you need so little each time you use it, this bottle lasted me 10 weeks, and I use it daily. I highly recommend this product for smooth, non-cakey, light-feeling coverage.

It has no coverage at all. It can not cover my pore. I have combination skin. However It looks like I have oily skin after applied this foundation for 4 hours. I comes off & patching. The price is too expensive compare to the quality.

reviews.review_title: full coverage, non drying, silky feel
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation- I have dry skin but it doesn't cling on to my dry patches and applies smootlhly and doesn't disappear on my nose through out the day - doesn't crepe up or anything!

Pros: looks very pretty on the skin, sheer coverage.  Cons: I have dry skin, 2h after wearing this foundation my skin kooked so oily and shiny not good shiny. It is sheer and very runny. I returned it I like my Lancome better.

reviews.review_title: All good things come to an end
reviews.review_text: This was my holy grail foundation for years! I loved everything from the variety of shades, to the texture, the fact that it didn't have an odd or overwhelming scent and of course the buildable coverage and how it stayed on my face and looked on pictures. Something happened to this foundation in the last few months I have tried it several times and purchased and returned twice, and that something is called... THEY CHANGED THE FORMULA. It feels and looks so much cheaper. It comes off and gets patchy and makes your skin super oily. So sad!
I could see this being good for someone who doesn't have imperfections. I would say it's a light coverage.

I have tried numerous high end and luxury foundations from Sephora but I find myself constantly going back to the Giorgio Armani luminous silk. I have had a few friends tell me that they have tried it with a beauty blender but were not pleased with it. Personally, I like using it with my sigma flat kabuki brush and using the BB to melt my concealer into the foundation after. It feels great on the skin and is buildable too. Now that the BI/VIB sale is on it is a great opportunity to try it out! LOVE! I've just ordered the Power Fabric foundation and can't wait to see how it compares.

reviews.review_title: You wanted the best? You got the best!
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite foundation. I've bought and returned so many foundations that I think the girls at my local Sephora were sick of seeing me! LOL This is the the one I kept. If you know your undertones then it's easy to pick a color as there are so many options that your undertone/color is sure to be there. I guessed my color and it was right on the nose! I'm a #5 and it matches me perfect. It's at minimum a medium coverage with lots of building potential, yet it's like wearing nothing on the skin. To go cliche I'd say this is definitely my new hg. As good and lingerie de peau by Guerlain (the only foundation that I've ever actually ran out of!).

I used to buy this foundation a lot. I have probably bought this 3-4 times. It gives a really nice, natural finish. The coverage is light-medium but buildable to some extent. It looks great when I first apply it but that's where the great stops. This breaks down on me very quickly and my skin becomes an oily disaster. I used to just think I had super oily skin because of this foundation but after having tried other products this past year, I realize it was the LS foundation that was causing all the problems. It probably has the worst wear time on me of any foundation I have tried. Will not purchase anymore that's for sure.

I love the satin finish but this foundation only works for me in the wintertime. I sweat a lot and my nose and chin are very oily in warm weather. Luminous Silk Foundation will slide off my face in summer if it doesn't get washed away by my sweat first so I imagine this won't work if you're like me or you're just oily in general.

I have tried so many foundations and up until I purchased this, I was using the Kat von D. I was reluctant to try this out since I heard the coverage wasnt that great but it is enough to even out my skin and I have hyperpigmentation and freckles. It doesnt hide my pimples that pop up time to time but its defintey buildable! Its long lasting and I got so many compliments using this foudation. The only reason it lost a star is because its on the pricier side.   It doesnt dry matte but theres not a lot of transfer unless youve been wearing it for a long time. I recommend this anyone if they are willing to spend 70  dollars. My new HG foundation!

My new favourite foundation! Absolutely worth the price. It does not cover up my acne scars but is buildable. The finish isn't that luminous so the name is a little misleading but you are still left with a natural, skin-like finish. For reference, I have dry-normal, acne prone skin. This hasn't broken me out. Highly recommend!

Love this! Because of the price I mix it with my Clinique foundation. As soon as I started using this I got so many compliments on how smooth my face looked. Definitely going to continue purchasing this foundation.
This foundation was ok. Accentuated my dry patches. For the price, I expected a miracle but I ended up using more products to make it work for me. Too much $$$ and time wasted.

I've been on the search for my perfect foundation. I've had Clinique acne solutions, beyond perfecting, and superbalanced, Josie maran vibrancy, Dior airflash, and hourglass stick. I have combination skin that leans more towards dry. I love the Dior airflash, it gives a very healthy luminous look but does break up a little throughout the day and doesn't build as well as I'd like for my scarring. This foundation though is amazing, it's definitely not full coverage at all I would say more medium but it builds soooo beautifully. It literally has the exact finish of skin, not dewy or matte just radiant to where it looks like I have beautiful skin. I do use concealer on my hyperpigmentation to help coverage there because this definitely doesn't conceal them on its own. I usually do 12-15 hour days in this foundation and the only complaint I have is that is fades slightly but even at 10pm my husband says my face looks amazing so I'm happy with it. I will continue to purchase!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this foundation. Literally imparts a beautiful LUMINOUS glow. I'd die if I traveled without this. I love this finish and radiant silky finish. I enjoy trying new products but I will continue to grab this each time I'm out of foundation.

reviews.review_title: Don't know what I'd do without this
reviews.review_text: I grew up in my mom's beauty salon; her and I have tried EVERYTHING as far as cosmetics and makeup. I can honestly say, this foundation is my ultimate favorite thus far. I've been using it for about a year and a half now.   Before I found Luminous Silk, I had been bouncing around between Tarte and several other brands, and not feeling content with my foundation. I am very fair, with yellow undertones... so it's ridiculous difficult to find a company that makes a shade that matches well. Everything is either orange or pink for very fair tones. Nothing neutral or more yellow. On top of that, I am very very sensitive. I usually break out to anything other than the very natural brands... even then, they add oils or talc in their products that make me breakout. I am also combination/oily skin... but not too bad with the oil.   My cousins all wear Luminous Silk, and bought me a bottle in shade 2 for a bday gift, swearing that it would work for me... since they have very similar skin.   First, it matched perfectly... like it disappeared into my skin. (Halle-freaking-lujah)  Second, it was the perfect coverage... looked like medium coverage (I have freckles and still like them, I like coverage, just not so much that they totally disappear), and it was very natural looking. People were thinking I didn't have any on, but my skin looked much more even. Third, it had such a lovely texture. Doesn't melt off, doesn't settle into fine lines or creases, and it has a mild Luminous touch to it, hence the name.  I do wear primer and set it with a delicate powder after.  Fourth, I have never broken out from wearing it. I can tell it has higher-quality ingredients in it, because my sensitive skin has no issues with it.  I will continue to keep ordering Luminous Silk, despite the higher ticket price. For my skin and makeup desires, it's perfect. Not sure anything can top this product. I hope they never change or re-formulate it.

reviews.review_title: honestly my favorite foundation of all time
reviews.review_text: I've tried to like all the super popular foundations the youtube make up gur√∫ people mention,and this is by far he best.I have combination skin and this foundation just makes my face look flawless.It has a beautiful natural/luminous finish which is perfect if you don't want matte,but you don't want to be super dewey either!Coverage is medium and buildable,and a little goes a long way.I will definitely be repurchasing thing when I finish my bottle!Believe the hype and give this a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had my foundation matched in store and this was one of the foundations suggested to me by an employee and *wow*....it's so amazing and wonderful. Hands down the best foundation I've ever worn; they don't call it luminous silk for no reason! The coverage is medium but feels light on the skin. It's not cakey at all, very natural look only *perfect*. A little goes a long way, so it won't disappear in a couple of weeks. The quality of the product is worth the price tag. I was matched to shade 5 and it's so identical to my actual skintone that I was a bit taken aback.

So I knew that colour matching would be make or break as I had gave this ago and the Sephora artist matched me to 4 -and I hated it I just looked awkward. A friend suggested I try the temptalia foundation matrix and it matched me to 2 ( I'm 3.5 in power fabric btw) I gave it another go and it made all the difference.  Many have reviewed it oxidizes so I would suggest this site to get a match. I have oily skin and I don't find it to be too dewy - more radiant. I do need to use a pore filling primer - but that's just the case with all foundations.  I will say I like the Power Fabric a bit more but I find myself reaching for this more lately

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my HG foundation for about 2 years now and I've never looked for anything else. The formula is so lightweight that I never feel the foundation on my skin and because it's so thin, it blends out very easily too. I've used both brushes and my beauty blender to blend out- all methods are flawless. I don't have a lot of acne or scarring to cover up so I personally can't say anything about the coverage. I'd say it's about medium, but I also know that you can always double up on the layers for more coverage.  Seriously so worth the price. I've gone through 4 bottles in 2 years. For someone who wears foundation everyday, I think that is a lot of product to last!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this and really loved it but was hesitant about buying the full size due to the price.  I finally took the plunge and just purchased it after months of longing for it.  For me the coverage is a little too full.  It does go on beautifully and leaves a nice natural airbrushed look but if you bump your face and wipe a swatch off it is very obvious.  I use becca matte primer and i dont know if that is why or not but it seems to kind of just sit on top of my face instead of blending into my skin.  The formula is a little more watery than i expected it to be especially for something with so much coverage.  Not a complaint, just an observation.  I did deduct one star just because as another review stated it does oxidize after a couple hours.  I have the 5.5 and it matches my skin perfectly when i put it on but gets a little dark and just.. off colored, and doesn't match as well.  It isn't a big enough deal that i felt the need to return and get a shade lighter (plus summer is almost upon us so chances are my face will tan up a little anyway) but if i needed to reorder again i would probably go with a shade lighter. All in all happy with my purchase but it isn't perfect for me.

I have combination skin and this foundation doesn't make me oily in my t-zone. It's gives me a luminous full coverage look! I got compliments saying it looks airbrushed! I took out one star because it oxidizes after a few hours. I got a 6.5 but had to return and exchange for a 6 which is a little light when applied, but after a few minutes it blends into my skin! My fave foundation atm!!!!!!!

I have been looking for me a great foundation for years!  I have tried Lancome, Makeup Forever, MAC, Mary Kay, UD, YSL, Estee Lauder,  Burberry, and a host of other foundations and this is absolutely AMAZING! Just a little goes a long way and it blends well! It is medium to sheer in coverage and that is what I like. It minimizes my imperfections but allows just enough to show ME! I hope they never change the formula!
I wear this everyday. I have combination skin and this is perfect. My face is always on point and I never feel it cakey or heavy on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: my skin looks amazing in this foundation its glowy and natural while also giving me the coverage I need my skin is super dry and the colouring is super uneven but this foundation fixed it all highly recommend

Had such high hopes for this after all the hype, coverage is definitely light and I'm shade 3 and it oxidized pretty bad throughout the day especially on the outline of my face. For this price point I thought the foundation would apply itself. deffs returning

For the price I expected this to work magic. I have the shade 2, which does match well initially. However, it oxidizes fairly badly.
