When you're pale with redness to cover, the last thing you want is to look orange. The coverage I would barely call medium with one layer. When I did try to build it up, because I have dry skin, didn't look that great. I mean, the finish on my dry skin is the best I've come across, but it definitely wasn't luminous. Also will come off, if you touch your face at all. I moisturize well prior to putting on foundation.

got a sample of this because i wasnt sure if i wanted to splurge yet. tried it on and wore it for a whole day from 9-9 so basically 12 hours. at first i thought it would work out really well, it gave me a luminous finish without looking greasy. of course i had to set it because of my oily skin. as i wore it throughout the day i was really impressed, i didnt look greasy or oily even and it gave me a healthy glow. after about 6 hours i started noticing the foundation fading and breaking apart. i tried to touch up especially on my pimple and it wasnt working with me. i gave this 3 stars because i liked it for half the day but i wouldnt purchase this. just because im looking for my holy grail foundation and this wasnt it nor worth the money for me.

I will be honest and say I wasn't too sure about this foundation at first. I found the best way to apply this foundation is to stipple it on to get a more full coverage. Once I did that I was sold! I have oily skin but don't like matte foundations. This goes on VERY dewy at first but with a little finishing powder I can get it slightly matte. My oily skin doesn't break it down and it doesn't make me shiny either. I will re-purchase for sure.

I have very dry skin with some old acne scarring, this  covers absolutely nothing no matter how much you use. It got a pretty finish but doesn't last long bc it separated at the end of the day. Very disappointed
Goes so smoothly on my skin and absolutely flawless. Not at all oily or cakey. A bit more pricey but worth it for the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation I've come across so far. It is not heavy and cakey. It looks flawless on the skin. It is my go to foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST foundation I have tried and I have tried just about every one out there as they come out! I keep going back to Giorgio Luminous Silk. I do have the other Giorgio Lines and love them as well but this is by far my FAV! My skin looks so dewy and silky and it lasts all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin, and it highlighted it by just sitting on the patches, I have never had this happen with a foundation. It also has very minimal coverage if you have any redness in your skin. I bought the powder as well, and the colours are completely different, I found the liquid foundation to be too light, and the powder foundation in the same colour name to be too dark..

I bought this foundation after trying about 5 different luxury brands and never found anything that worked for me. I've never used a foundation that settled into my pores and creases more than this one did. It's not long lasting and not full coverage at all. It does have a pretty matte finish, but that's about all. Will not be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got this a couple days ago and i LOVE it. it helps someone like me with dry skin. it applies beautifully and the technology behind it blurring is great

I expected a lot better since the price is obviously $60 or so. I have dry skin, nothing too bad or anything. it applies beautifully and looks nice! it really does get darker the more you wear it. I am already very pale so that doesn't work for me! other than that, pretty nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use shade 2 and it matches me perfectly. This foundation is lightweight and easy to use. It provides good coverage while still looking natural on your skin. I apply the foundation after using the Becca green tone corrector and I find that it glides over the corrector very easily. This foundation does not accentuate my acne scars or wrinkles as other foundations tend to do. I also found this foundation to be long lasting. Definitely worth the price!

I don't know. People are all saying it's great but honestly, for its price, I just don't go well with this foundation. I have combo skin and idk why this either makes me too oily at days or just completely dry me out. It is only perfect for like the first two hours and then it just breaks down. It's kinda annoying. Maybe it will be better when use in winter.  I won't be returning it cuz I want to keep on trying to make it work. Idk, so far it's only three stars
i have tried all the top foundations and this is by far the best i've ever owned. i have dry skin and this gives the most beautiful, natural glow.

I liked the texture of this foundation after I put them in my face, it is dewy and very sheer. I doesn't make my face oily since I have combination skin. Make sure to apply primer  before applying the foundation. It claims to have a light to medium coverage which gives a luminous natural look on the face :) it is pricey, but all worth the money.

Go buy something at the drugstore for 80% less $$. The colour was okay (I ordered #2 because it said neutral and fair/neutral is REALLY hard to find - usually they go orange or pink). It went on nicely, though it's definitely a sheer/light coverage foundation, and I built it up in a few places to cover red marks. I use different primers for different parts of my face because my face hates me :) and it seemed to sit well on each... anyway, I was hopeful. But when I looked in the mirror a couple of hours later, it was ... gone. A few patches here and there, but mostly gone. It looked awful. Returning for sure.

Been wearing for about a month but recently I noticed that I have been getting the absolute worst breakouts. Which was strange since my skin has always been completely clear with only one or two pimples but now I have been getting way over 20 and wider pores. Even worse is how after just a little time it wipes off my nose and looks red on the mid area of my face. However using it in the winter time is like heaven as long as you only use it a few times

reviews.review_title: I need to buy a third bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff goes on beautifully. The colour is great, the smell, the pigment... everything is perfect. This is my all time fav!

I bought this foundation a couple of weeks ago and wanted to love it so bad. I bought it because I hear everyone with dry skin rave about it but it just didn't work for me!! My skin is pretty dry with some ache and pores and I tend to like natural foundations, I use a Hydrating primer with this foundation and it looked AMAZING when first applied but after about 1-2 hours of wearing it. It just looked greasy and too dewy for my liking, it lasted all day though and is very build able if you tend to like a SUPER dewy foundation you may like this.
Highly recommend this foundation. My favorite one I've ever tried! minus one star for being a little too pricey for a foundation! However, I will continue to buy.

I bought This foundation cause the reviews looked good and everyone raves about it .. but the hype totally didn't meet to my expectations..  it's a very Liquidy foundation and didn't cover any of my red spots ..If you want a full coverage foundation . This isn't for you .. definitely will be returning .
Such a smooth finish with a natural glow. Best foundation ever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is light weight but the BORN this Way by TOO Faced works better and is cheaper. Does not stay on all day even with a good primer.   not worth the 64$ I used 4.5

I didn't want to believe the hype but definitely fell for it! I love it.. it makes my skin look flawless.. I have normal to oily skin and it definitely does not make me super oily by the end of the day.. I do look some what shiny but nothing that makes me hate it!
Smooth finish , not sticky .... i love it

I loooooooveeee this product. It stays on forever and it covera absolutely everything making skin look so smooth. It's worth the price. It makes your skin look flawless!! Not dry and not greasy...don't think twice you should definitely buy it
I am on a bottle #6 now. Wouldn't replace it with anything out there. My skin improved after I started using it. Cant live without it , I wear make up daily and this has been a lifesaver.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this foundation definitely applies smoothly and is luminous, as suggested, but unless you have very dry skin you can expect this to become a greasy mess after just a few hours, regardless of primer/setting powder combos. i would say this is a medium, buildable coverage. love the color range. but for the ridiculous price, you can definitely find a better foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 66 with typical aging dry skin.  I have looked and looked for a foundation that doesn't crease and accentuate my wrinkles and finally found this.  It makes my face look natural an does not sink into fine lines and wrinkles.  I am 100 miles from a Sephora so had to purchase online after a lot of internet research to get the right color.  I'm a 5.5 and the match was perfect.  I will never buy another foundation now that I have this.  I use a blurring primer and no longer set my makeup with powder, since it ages my skin, but this foundation doesn't need setting with anything other than something like MAC Fix.  I even use organic rose water as a setting spray and my makeup lasts all day.  I can't say enough good things about this foundation.
This is a lovely foundation, and it does everything my foundation should do. It's dewy, hydratating, buildable, and has a big color range! Don't have anything bad to say except the price tag!

I wanted a new more dewy looking foundation for the winter as my skin is getting a bit dry. Overall I think this is a pretty good foundation. It's very lightweight and it doesn't dry my skin. I have combination skin and I do find that my face gets a bit oily even with a primer and setting it with powder and spray. But overall I do like it and would recommend.

For the price and the brand, I'll admit, I had high expectations. I however was thoroughly and irrevocably disappointed, and would have been had it been something I purchased at the drug store. It was the coverage I would expect from a tinted moisturizer or a random BB cream. I didn't find it was luminous, but certainty light weight. I have clear skin and freckles, I thought it might do nicely to lessen my redness - it did not. I didn't think it lasted, even with my primer/setting powder and spray routine. There are so many better products out there, for a fraction of the price.

This foundation leaves a stunning finish that honestly just makes you feel pretty wearing it.  I give it five stars because it is what it says it is, a lightweight, high end foundation that leaves a flawless finish.   It's definitely shear coverage at the start, but you can build it to medium.  I use concealer underneath to get to full coverage.  This foundation has a way of gliding over things like acne and scars, but if you have dry patches, you will need a very smoothing primer because it does tend to highlight those.    It doesn't settle into lines and lasts pretty much all day with minimal touch up.  Even if you get oily, this foundation has a way of looking good no matter what.   Worth the money and definitely a good choice for a special occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When you first use this you are like 'ehh,if this even doing anything?' But as you add in more and build it up you come to this gorgeous healthy,glowing,photoshopped,youthful skin. If you don't believe what you're seeing,use the back of one hand as your palette then compare the two hands,it makes an extraordinary difference. I just wish it was more blatant instead of having to be built up and I wish it didn't take so much product to get the result,usually at this price range the products go crazy far,but I suspect this might not. It's still very much worth it however.
Looks like skin natural and beautiful!

reviews.review_title: Quite possibly a bottle of liquid gold.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm sure the title gives away how much I love this foundation, but let me try to give a proper breakdown as to why it is so amazing. First of all my skin type is combination/oily and this foundation looks good ALLLL day, literally no hesitation, Second my skin is very acne-prone and this covers my blemishes nicely, by that I mean, even if you have an active or healing blemish this foundation just glides right over it no patchiness or flakes. Oh and the coverage is amazing it's not super full coverage but it is a true medium to buildable full coverage, and let me just say its impossible for this foundation to look cakey so fear not. I love that you can use it with a brush or a beauty blender and it'll be flawless either way. The best part to me is the finish... the finish is just so beautiful. It is not dewy at all it just looks like healthy skin, truly a your skin but WAY better finish. I really can't say enough good things about this foundation all that is left to say is dont be skeptical. If you want a high end foundation this is it. It WILL always be my holy grail foundation it is well worth every penny. Last point I have to make If you're someone who has an oily skin type please don't worry this is one of the rare foundations that actually works on dry skin, combination skin, and oily skin. You. Will. Love. It. One of the best makeup purchases I've ever bought and I am on my 3rd bottle and don't worry each bottle lasts about 8 months to a year for me that's because I reserve this foundation only for special occasions such as date nights. birthdays, New Years etc. etc. So clearly I've been using this foundation for years, I'm only writing a review now because I'm about to buy the Giorgio Armani Luminous Silk powder and thought I may as well let everyone know how much of a great buy this foundation is. I know this review was long but I hope if nothing else it was helpful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been on the hunt for a good foundation for years I've tried a couple of different ones, but Armani I've got to hand it to you, you know your stuff. This foundation leaves the softest finish on my skin, and makes my skin look like skin, it's a little dewy, but for someone with combination to oily skin if I set it right she's good for it. I love this stuff, it's my second time buying it and I'm totally impressed.

I'm really disappointed in this product. I read so many great reviews and was excited to use it but left my skin looking patchy and dry. I couldn't even wear it out and I will definitely not be using this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: its a really good foundation, lasts all day, applies flawlessly. wish it was a little more full coverage. build-able but just was not for me. it didnt leave my face oily or anything.

This foundation has a lot of buzz but I was hesitant to try it because I have a few cystic acne scars that I want covered up. My impression was that I needed a thick foundation to do the job, I used the Tarte 12 hour foundation and instead what I found was that it worsened the problem because of its high oil content. I did not realize this until I underwent research on the skin problems I was facing, the dermatologists and medical spas I waa going to. The real change I needed was with the foundation I was using.   This Georgio Armani foundation has truly been a positive change in my regimen. Without any exaggeration, it has also improved my mental outlook because it has helped me get my skin (with and without makeup) looking amazing. Firstly, the formulation is immaculate (and ladies you do not need a thick formula to give you coverage). It features this incredible blurring technology and luminescence.  The consistency of the foundation is on the thinner side and only requires a small amount of application. The research done on colour matching by the GO team has been amazing and it is literally like a second skin without stickiness, without feeling like you're truly wearing coverage.  My skin actally glows more throughout the day. Who would have that a foundation can do this?   My skin has improved each day with a regular routine of using high quality products.  I feel confident, my skin is clear, I am happy and Georgio Armani has gained a huge advocate for this product.    I am officially obsessed!

I used to be a NARS addict and devotee...and then I tried this foundation! It's so smooth, gives you a dewy-but-not-too-dewy finish and is not too heavy in the coverage department which I love, but I find it is buildable if you need or like a little more! It's expensive but I think totally worth the cost. Even when I wear it daily my skin is still great, and it doesn't seem to clog anything up. Fully recommend

reviews.review_title: i've been waiting for this my whole life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail of foundations. So easy to apply, never cakey, looks natural. Worth every penny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best of the best. Cream of the crop product right here.   Looks the most natural out of all foundations I've ever tried.  Blends beautifully, and you barely need any. Stays put all day. Just wish it wasn't so expensive.

I have to say I've never used a foundation like this before. It's a beautiful bottle and the product itself is just amazing, the bottle is a bit small tho, wish it was larger but it's definitely a foundation you should have in your makeup collection!!!
Amazing, flawless, wow, yasss, thats all i have to say for this amazing product.

I mean, I understand it's Giorgio Armani foundation so it's going to be expensive. I received this as a sample to try but the color was way too dark for my pale skin. However, it seemed to settle into my skin well and lasted a long time. Very smooth but just too expensive. there are other foundations out there just as good for cheaper!!
Love this foundation ‚ù§‚ù§

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My Dermatologist recommended this foundation for my breakout prone skin. I was a bit skeptical at first, but I've been using it ever since. I've had so many compliments on my skin, and not on my makeup which is a win for me. I don't want to look like I have too much on, and this does just that. Someone even asked me if I was wearing makeup, or if it was just my skin! This covers my acne scarring and redness pretty well, and doesn't make me too shiny, but gives an amazing glow. The high price is totally worth it, and the bottle last me ages.
I don't get it...this did nothing for me!  Looked cakey and accentuated dry patches.  I wanted to love this based on so many positive reviews, but returned it. Sigh.
Love this foundation, just wish it was a little cheaper

Foundation is a very personal product. Reviews are so tricky because we all have different needs and expectations when choosing a foundation . I am super dry on my cheeks with a slightly oily t zone . I never have any issues with this foundation staying put or getting too oily . The coverage is med but I can build it up and still looks natural . Overall I love love this foundation. Definitely a holy grail for me

This is definitely one of my top foundations especially when my skin is on the drier side. It doesn't emphasize any dry spots and my face doesn't feel like a desert. I would repurchase. However, I do wish it had slightly more coverage because it does take extra product to build up and this is an expensive foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so skeptical of this foundation because of the crazy price tag, but I have to say it's really amazing. I was in love after using it once!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this foundation, and it just didn't do much for me. It was fine, but it didn't give me the beautiful, luminous, flawless finish I had expected. Not worth the hype in my opinion--especially for the price!

reviews.review_title: Best daily wear foundation I've ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation I've ever used, hands down. Feels weightless on my face with just the right amount of coverage - I'd say it's light to medium, it's not thick and mask-like. If I don't put concealer on them first, my darkest freckles still show through, which I like. It's pricey but it's worth every penny.
I love this foundation so much! This is the best of the market. Make my skin so natural and healthy looking. I highly recommend this product!!!

I was having a hard time making my makeup look flawless and smooth instead of cakey, I use Makeup Forevers mattifying foundation No. 40 which is very neutral/full coverage. I needed some color in my face so I broke down and bought a bottle of the shade 5.5 and it makes a huge difference! My foundation is now so flawless and air brushed. If you need full coverage I wouldn't buy this product by itself as it is very sheer. So happy with this product and I will keep buying it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is one of my favorite, it covers the discoloration on my face and does not give a cacky effect.
I don't even know what to say! It is absolutly amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing texture and comfortable even un humid calid days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful foundation that I use after Boom Silk since I have a rosy complexion.
Can only use this in the winter when my skin is dry, otherwise in summer it's too greasy to use. But love when I can use it leaves my skin flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in shade 6, and it is one of two foundations that I have found to match my olive skin. I like to apply a thin layer of this with my fingers and then blend it out with a beauty blender, and I find that it gives such a beautiful finish. I honestly didn't expect to like this because I REALLY dislike the Loreal Lumi foundation as it just sits on my skin. But I had to try this because shade 6 is one of the few true olive shades on the market. The only downside to this foundation is that it wears off after about 4-5 hours for me. If I set it with a powder then maybe it would last longer, but powders tend to make my face look pink for some reason so I really avoid them.  I know there are a lot of great foundations for people that are less expensive, but seriously no foundations are really very olive. So if you're like me and really need that green undertone then I recommend investing in this guy.
Switched from dior flash spray to this over the summer. I absolutely love this product and the way it applies to the skin. Velvety and smooth application.  Love it!

Absolutely love this foundation! It doesn't break up around my nose and chin area where I have issues with other foundations. I wore it for over 8+ and my makeup still looked perfect! It doesn't turn me oily. I use it with the cover fx setting powder to set my concealer then the luminous silk powder for the rest of my face. Perfect combination and I'm so happy with it. This liquid foundation is medium to full coverage and I wear it for both my makeup no makeup look along with my night time glam.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my skin looking flawless without feeling heavy. I will never go back to any other foundation. Pricey but worth it.

This foundation is the best! I have been using it for over two years and I literally get compliments on my complexion daily! Granted I am 25 and have great skin, this just makes my skin look 10x better!

I have normal to dry skin, lately I've become more prone to breakouts than in my younger years. I'm on my 3rd bottle of this foundation. It is undoubtably amazing. Applies smoothly, looks like skin, buildable and the finish is gorgeous.  After trying multiple different foundations I always come back to this. Luminous silk has been my favourite foundation for years, it has done me good through all of my skin changes. Yes yes yes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is beautiful and has very build able coverage. You can achieve a pretty full coverage face if you use 2-3 pumps (which I don't mind doing). It has a really nice finish and lasts throughout the day without needing to touch it up.

First, Let me start off by saying that I have OILY acne prone skin and I absolutely LOVE this foundation! I usually use a moisturizer for oily skin prior to my foundation. I tend to skip primers because with acne prone skin too many products = disaster! Then I set with the Lanc√¥me foundation powder or the cover FX translucent powder. I can get about 7 hours of wear before I need to touch up. This foundation does give a naturally dewy Finish so if you don't set with powder or want something mattefying this product is not for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been reluctant to purchase this for so long because it's so expensive. I had used a small sample a while back and remember thinking wow, my skin looks amazing and really wanted to buy it, alas the price. Several months later I am throwing my hard-earned cash for this. Back when I had been wearing the sample, I remember my husband distinctly saying Wow your skin looks beautiful and he rarely compliments my makeup, so it meant a lot. To justify, I am at the end of my tube of Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer and had just bought some L'oreal Pro-Matte foundation that is long-wearing, but too matte for me, so ordering the Armani Silk foundation was in order. And you know I can't just get the foundation; I have to make sure I re-up on my primer and setting powder too to make the whole ritual fun!...Ah, well my paycheck took a dent this time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is excellent. It is light, but with buildable coverage. It can truly give you super-light coverage OR super-concealing coverage, depending on how you build and blend it. I appreciate that versatility. I have dry skin, and it doesn't dry out on me like other foundation. The price tag is high, but I find it lasts 2-4 months at least, and I use it every day (often 2-3 pumps). Good value for what you're getting in the long run. Gorgeous semi-matte finish. Great for building your own shine with highlighters if you prefer a more dewy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to try this foundation because its such a cult product and so many people adore it! I have extremely oily acne prone skin, by the way.   When I first applied it, I honestly felt like my skin has never looked so good. Its a nice glowy finish, not too sticky.   However, within 20 minutes, I was so oily and greasy I couldn't even be in public. I kept wiping off the oil and it kept coming back.   So I guess the moral of the story is that its a beautiful foundation for people with dry skin. It really is. But if you have oily skin, this just is not the foundation for you.

I am so in love with this foundation. It's dewy, hydrating, and matches my skin tone perfectly. It stays on all day and doesn't look cakey. Not sure if I'd repurchase due to it being so pricey - but it's worth it for now :)
Makes my skin look flawless!!
Not the best coverage wise but makes skin look AMAZING!!  For more coverage I like to mix it with the Too Faced born this way or the Kat Von D Lock It Foundation

I tried this a couple of years ago when on retin a and it was horrible. I had tons of little flakeys from the retin a and this showed every one of them! Now I've been off retin a for about 8 months, and this is very beautiful on me. I love it! Natural finish and a bit glowy on my combo skin. Definitely try if you don't have shedding skin. I would avoid it if you have shedding skin.

I had herd so many good things about this foundation so I decided to try it, I have tried maaaannyy foundations and this one by far is my new absolute favorite !!! It literally melts into my skin and leaves it looking so fresh and dewy!! Like I barely have any foundation on at all! The color matches my skin perfectly (6) and feels like i have nothing on my face whatsoewhat so ever. Love it!!!!!!

reviews.review_title: Not so great for dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was so hyped up. I was told this was amazing for dry skin and that it lasted well on the skin. It's very thin, too thin; it settled into pores I didn't even know I had! The coverage was very poor. My concealer lasted longer than the foundation, even after trying different primers. I was surprised to say the least, after this coming with such a high price tag.

Used a sample, love it more than most foundations, but I may not purchase because I did not think that it was as long wearing as other foundations , probably because of my very oily skin. But it is a very nice foundation

Honestly I was in tears after my sample ran out...I never thought I would find my holy grail foundation after years of looking! I have severe adult acne all over my cheeks, but I can't stand the feeling of full coverage foundation. After the tiniest bit of color correcting this foundation went on so smoothly! Covered all my redness, which is what bothers me the most. This doesn't cover my textured skin, but I can ignore that...that's just my personal preference, this is perfect coverage for me!  It lasts all day with a primer, and doesn't oxidize. It has a beautiful natural finish and I'm OBSESSED. It's expensive, but it's worth every penny! I bought a bottle before my sample was even gone!!
I received this as a sample and was impressed! It's very lightweight and covers minor flaws great. My only complaint is it doesn't work very well on acne coverage.

I have sampled many foundations, but nothing gives a more weightless or natural look than this.   This mixes effortlessly with argon oil or just about any other product I use or have used. It blends beautifully, as well as leaves your skin looking hydrated even after it dries down. This is the most expense product I use. With that said, any inexpense product use, such as Wet & Wild highlighters and bronzing powders, it seems to enhance them leaving a flawless finish.   At 30 years old, I find that this product is perfect to minimize fine lines, pores, and other imperfections. If you're starting to see signs of aging, I recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, it looks smooth (like airbrush finish). It last all day without turning oily/greasy.
Great pigment but may not be best for the winter months. I have normal to oily skin and this dried out my face.

I love it looks relle beautiful I can't believe people say it doesn't work for their dry skin bc I truly thought it had a more watery /liquidy base but everyone's different I'm 25 female with pretty flawless skin I'm very lucky my pores are not the best but using Est√©e Lauder's idealist pore.  Minimizing skin refiner which has really helped me out to

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best semi mate foundation I have ever used.....and the list of foundations is long. The finish is flawless, smooth and soft. Normally I hate this type of finish, I am all about dewy and glowy finish because of my dry skin. In addition foundations need to cover rosacea and blend with multiple freckles on my fair skin. This foundation addresses all these problems, blends with my fair neck, builds up over my rosacea and blends with my freckles without making them appear gray! For ladies with dry skin: It is semi mate yet not drying, which often has been my experience with that type of finish. Generally I cannot pull off anything other than dewy/shiny finish for more than two hours even with lots of skin prepping. At the end of the day (even up to 13-14 hours) my tiny wrinkles are not emphasized, and my face does not looks like a dry paper. Granted LSF wears of somewhat, but I still have remnants of the foundation when I clean my face at night. I would describe the coverage as medium at application to light at the end of the day. It is buildable, great plus as my rosacea is worse on the left side of my face.  Applied best with sponge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture of my skin after I put this foundation on, it is super smooth and silky, with a no makeup feel. I would classify the coverage to this foundation as light unless you are using more than 2 pumps. To be fair, this foundation can be built up to a medium coverage one, it just requires effort. All in all, great every day foundation that holds up for quite a while, but certainly not something you'd want on a full glam day. For reference, I'm currently wearing a shade 5 in this foundation and have dry skin.

reviews.review_title: medium to light coverage. needs good primer
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and I am using shade 4. I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5 because of the price. Otherwise I rate the product a 5 for its class - light to medium weight foundation.  It's a very light weight foundation. Smooth and lovey texture. Doesn't clog pores. Provides good color tone coverage if you are looking for something to last 6 hours. But a good primer is necessary with this product or its impact will not be felt. I saw the huge difference with and without a primer. Without a primer the foundation feels like it's eaten up by the skin. I had to apply so much more to see any coverage. Once I applied smashbox's primer, I used a lot less foundation and it spread on smoothly with my fingers.   This foundation is high quality but it is very expensive. If budget is not an issue I would recommend it. Otherwise I would go with Toofaced foundation (thicker coverage) or Makeup Forever HD (heavier coverage too but not as thick as Toofaced).

This is the first time I write a review after four years membership of Sephora. Still in love with Armani lsf which is also my first purchase at Sephora. I've tried this foundation on any weather occasion and foundation applier one can think of and all works well. But do apply with a beauty blender. It's will give you a perfect like bone flawless skin look.

I have oily skin and this melts away after about 6 hours even with MUF primer, UD setting spray. When it is first applied, it is absolutely gorgeous. The best my skin has ever looked. And I get tons of complements. I really really wish it lasted longer, then I could give it 5 stars. Medium coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have to give credit where credit is due- to the PR and marketing team at Armani beauty. I have heard about this foundation in just about every magazine, every beauty blog, and every celebrity interview in what feels like a decade or more. Maybe my expectations were too high when I decided to finally bite the bullet and buy it in last year's beauty insider sale, but I have found this product to be... totally average. It's not that it's a bad foundation- it goes on smoothly enough, has buildable coverage, mostly lasts through the day- it's that it's not really a standout product to me. I'll continue to use the rest of my bottle but don't see myself repurchasing in the future.

I love this foundation! The colour matches my porcelain skin perfectly, which is hard for me to find! I love the way it wears through out the day, and that it doesn't get cakey. Very blendable with buildable coverage. Wish it wasn't so expensive, but the price won't stop me from buying it again! I'm hooked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: amazing foundation!! love the finish it gives. Makes my skin look glowing and healthy, without it looking oily. Lasts all day as well.

I'd been wanting to try this for a very long time, and I finally got a sample of it in what seems to be a decent match for me.   If my skin is pretty balanced to dry, this foundation looks great on me with little to no effort. I like how quickly I can apply it and not get streaks or uneven coverage. It's lightweight, non-irritating to my sensitive skin, and the scent is mild but pretty. I end up with a not perfect complexion, but very pretty and soft.   However, if I don't make sure my moisturizer is COMPLETELY absorbed into my skin, or if I use a heavier moisturizer for my winter dry skin, this slides all around my face, sinks into every pore and crease, and actually turns LIGHTER than my skin tone. It actually turns lighter and more grayish pink than my neck, which is bizarre, since I have mild rosacea, and my face is always red and blotchy while my neck is a pale yellow and pink. It also does not seem to give me a medium coverage unless I apply two layers.   I'm truly on the fence regarding the product. I feel like it is a bit tricky to use in terms of hey, is it going to look amazing today because my skin is dry enough, or is it going to look horrendous because my skin was too dry and I needed to moisturize heavily. Considering it also seems a bit drying, I don't know that it makes a good winter foundation, which is what I am looking for, but can I wear it in the spring knowing I may be sweating at times? Seems like a pricey gamble, but I'm tempted to take it because the finish IS so pretty.   Finally, getting a perfect match can be tricky. The numbers for the colors are all wacky, with five being my match (I usually am at about a 3 in the winter), and I was matched with a neutral undertone, which usually turns me gray. I noticed if I apply one layer, this match is perfect, but two layers DO turn me gray. My impression after a week of use is that I'd like to purchase it, but only after I find a better all purpose, every day foundation for winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It looks incredible, long lasting and is great value because this stuff lasts.

I originally got this as a sample when I purchased (the wrong shade) of KVD foundation. I fell instantly in love with how nice the finish looked and how weightless the formula is.   Makes you look radiant. Super blendable and buildable. Doesn't cake or look unnatural. I use with Est√©e Edit Pore Vanishing Stick and Too Faced Primed and Poreless. Lasts me all day and I work in a hot kitchen!
I wanted to like this so badly but it honestly did not wow me whatsoever. I'm still on a hunt for the perfect foundation.

By far the best foundation used. I've tried many others, but keep going back for this; nothing compares. Easy to build up, no creases, and you don't feel it on your face!!! A little on the pricey side but def worth a try!!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful finish, but difficult to find a match
reviews.review_text: Super lightweight and feels like I'm wearing no foundation, but with medium buildable coverage. It looks less luminous than I expected, but still has a natural skin-like finish, not matte.   However, as someone with light-medium skin and strong yellow and olive undertones (for reference I'm half Mexican, half Caucasian, and always wear SPF so I'm not tan), finding a color match was difficult. I tried 3.5, 4, and 6; 4 was too light, 3.5 was a bit too dark and pinky-orange, and 6 was definitely too dark. Ultimately I had to mix 4 and 6 (both with golden undertones, although 6 is much more olive), but together they're a perfect match. I imagine other lighter-skinned Hispanic and maybe also Asian women would also have a hard time finding a match without mixing.

It is the best foundation I have ever used, medium coverage with a lot of shades to choose from, I would say it's more for normal to dry skin like myself, it may not be a great choice for oily skin unless you do a good job on priming.

Best I've ever used. I am in looooove. My face has never looked sooooo good. It looks great throughout the day, if not better. Does not oxidize!! Super lightweight. Applies smoothly. Doesn't crease either. Definitely worth every penny and I will continue to repurchase. This actually lives up to the hype.

reviews.review_title: one of my no fail favorites
reviews.review_text: I have oily t-zone combo skin. I'm 41 with medium skin tone. This and the Kho gen doh foundation are my no fail favorites. Believe the hype people.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For years I had always played around with different foundations, but many broke me out and it wasnt worth it anymore, i was basically paying for terrible skin, but then one day I saw this bad boy and idk it just sounded so luxorious and looking at that price tag i was like well it better be,and it really is. This does not break me out at all, it feels amazing, no one can ever tell i have foundation on. I bought it when i was a shade darker than how i usually am and everyone asks if i got a tan, not knowing its just my make up hehehe but wow. i really urge anyone interested in this foundation to give it a shot. AMAZING

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this foundation about three years ago and I can't imagine ever going back. IT IS LUMINOUS! It is rather expensive but it takes me a long time to go through a bottle. 9 months-1 year before I need to replace. It goes on so smooth (I don't even use primer) and stays on beautifully. Comes in so many shades. Has good coverage but never feels heavy. I can't recommend it enough.
This is so good I cry every time I use it on my skin (combo oily)    It does magic even just with fingers and a few drunk mindless strokes

This is a beautiful foundation, definitely makes your skin look hydrated and luminous but it is not long lasting... I normally wear Est√©e Lauder double wear foundation or Mac Prolong wear so maybe I'm just used to a super long lasting wear? It transfers super easily too, so I would be super careful with it! I love this foundation and will be keeping it but it's not a super reliable all day product (even with setting power and spray) ...I do recommend trying it out though. I'm nc20 and I wear shade 4 :)

Bought this for the first time, honegstly it's really all about your skin type. Really didn't make my skin feel silky and smooth. Didn't really see a huge deffranve compared to other Foundation brands I used that were a little less money. It did cover my redness on my face, I just thought this Foundation would make my skin look more flawless looking.and the only real reason why I returned it was becouse it $65 bucks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Even though I have oily skin I love this foundation. I get oily no matter what products I use but of all the dewy foundations I've used, this gives me the best wear throughout the day. It looks like skin and it doesn't break me out. I am extremely acne prone so that's essential.   I use shade 9 in summer and mix shade 8 (too light) with custom cover drops (N70) in winter. Love it! I prefer this formula to literally every other foundation I've tried because it makes my skin look so good and not too makeup-y. The coverage is sheer to medium. I don't find it very buildable past that but I don't mind, that's what concealer is for. (nars tahoe/cadiz; mac nc44/45)

reviews.review_title: Alright, but not the best I have tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have gotten a few samples of this and it does very well with my dry skin. The coverage is light-medium at most with a satin finish. I applied it with a beauty blender and it looks very natural. It covers any redness that I may have but it does seem to fade pretty quickly over the day. I prefer a medium-full coverage foundation with a dewy finish. It is a nice foundation, but for the price point and the end result i'll pass.

I've been wanting to try this for EVER because of how jefferee starr raves about this foundation so a couple days ago I totaly splurged and bought it and I HAVE BEEN MISSING OUT MY ENTIRE LIFE FOR THIS AMAZING FOUNDATION. I have combination skin, a little bit more on the oily side I guess. This foundation not only feels soooo smooth going on it actually makes my face softer and I feel I'm not wearing nothing on my face. I was scared to try it because I heard if u have oily skin it doesn't look good but no they are wrong. My face looked beautiful all day and night and I even had men compliment my skin on my face that has never happened to me before. And this foundation stays on forever  anyways if u have been debating whether or not to get this, DO IT ITS WORTH THE MONEY <3

I got a sample of this with another Sephora order and was not expecting to love it bc I have been using bare minerals powder foundation and have combo skin. Usually liquid foundation has me looking greasy in an hour. This was the perfect texture and felt lovely on my skin all day without smearing off. The sample shade was perfect, but I can't figure out what shade it is. The little pouch and my order doesn't have the shade info!! I can't afford $64 for a foundation product, but I thought this was the best foundation I've put on my face.

not really for oily skin. The foundation goes on very silky and smooth & looks great, but after awhile it tends to look greasy and separate on my oily skin. Bought thanks to the YouTube hype but probably won't repurchase. I'm sure it's great for normal-dry skin though!

I was hesitant to try this because I have oily skin, but I'm glad I did! The color match is spot on. This light coverage and will need concealer, but that's good if you want a lighter, more natural look for daily use.

I was looking for a new foundation to change up my routine and stumbled upon this product through one of my favorite YouTuber.  Now let me start off by saying the price of this product is a crime, but the quality makes it worth it to me. I watched a thousand reviews on this foundation and read even more honest reviews b4 I purchased it. Once I tried it out for myself I was hooked. It applies flawlessly and the coverage is light-medium. I have never broken our from this product and as crazy as it sounds it has improved my skin. While it is not very illuminous, it is very flattering and long lasting. Will purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I heard a lot about this foundation so when i finally got it i was pleasently surprised on how amazing it is. one thing i don't like is the color selection. the shade that matches me best is 13 and its a little too light for me but 14 is extremely too dark so i have to mix it with my makeup forever ultra hd foundation to give me the perfect shade. other than that a little goes a long way usually need about 4-5 pumps of other foundation but this one only takes 2, is super lightweight and has beautiful coverage! my current favorite foundation for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I apply with BB and foundation brush.  Can use for light coverage or buidable.  Does not dry out skin.  Love the foundation.
I tried this foundation with brush first but it didn't work so I switched to beauty blender and YES!!! It worked really good. I am feeling nothing on my skin like naked.

I love how light it felt on my face. it didn't feel like I was wearing any foundation, and I loved how I looked when I first put it on, my skin look so flawless and silky and smooth, but after 2-3 hours, even after using a setting powder, and setting spray, I got so greasy!! I want to love this product because I'm obsessed with how it made my skin looked! But I'd rather find a different foundation that doesn't make me look greasy through out the day

I recently received a sample of this to try because I have heard such amazing things. It is extremely lightweight but provided ample coverage on my oily, acne prone skin. My skin was glowing! My only issue is that the fairest shade is still annoy too dark for me. This will for sure be my summer go to once I have more color!

If you are even considering the purchase of this foundation.. do it! I can't believe how beautiful my skin looked, even better as the day goes on. Absolutely gorgeous, light weight and buildable. I want to use this everyday!

So I'm in my room... just got this foundation.... I had just cleaned my face so I'm like, let's put this bad boy on. I had high hopes for this obviously it's expensive and very very popular.. I'm on my college winter break and had been slacking on the skin care so I had a lottttt of dry patches... put it on.. my first thoughts were well this is good but is it $60 dollars for one ounce good? I could see all my dry patches but every foundation clings to them cause makeup only looks as good as the base you put it on.... I kept it on and went about my business and I looked in the mirror like 15 mins later.... idk what it is but my flaky skin looked totally smooth. It's seeming to get better the longer I have it on and let's just say I don't think I'll have to return this like my wallet was hoping.

This is not my everyday foundation. It's far too expensive to use 7 days a week so I save for my evening kit. It is so silky and smooth and the coverage is great. My favorite foundation. I only wish I could use it more often!
This is the best foundation I have ever tried, I have been using it for a year. It's very light but can be built up and it has wide shade range

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not enough coverage for me. I took the shade 3 but it was way too pale. It's felt greasy. I don't like to feel my foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Please bring in the missing shades for us dark skin girls. Missing the shades 10-12. Product is amazing just couldn't find a colour that matches me. Really disappointed

I mix 4.5 and 5 to get the closest to my skin color! I have to say i have never see much silky and smooth coverage with any other product i have used. I have tried so many and this is by far the best that i cant even compare to the other ones... ahhh u will love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many different foundations, and this is the first one to wow me! I have very dry skin due to being on accutane, and this makes my skin look amazing! I still have acne scarring that is very red, and this actually covers my redness even though it is pretty sheer (I consider it a medium coverage though). It makes my skin look so natural and luminous, and it is definitely lightweight and breathable. I've gotten so many compliments on my skin today already (I'm using a sample I received from the store), and people have asked me what foundation I'm wearing and where I got it! It definitely feels so good since I've struggled with acne for so long, and being on accutane has been a lifesaver, even with the extremely dry skin! But I used the FAB coconut primer (which I don't really love) underneath this foundation today, and I'm feeling really good and comfortable in my skin! I've been wearing it for 6 hours now, and it still looks great and just applied! Hoping it still looks good by the end of the night! Definitely going to get the full size bottle as soon as I get to a Sephora store :) LOVE!!!

I've tried every foundation out there for dry skin and this is amazing! It's by far the most natural looking finish and feel. Such full coverage too so you barely need any product. I will forever be buying this foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For someone with redness in my skin I usually tend to wear fuller coverage foundation.  I heard so many awesome reviews on this product but it was more sheer than I expected.  If you're looking to cover redness this probably wont do the trick.  If you're looking for a sheer coverage, this is for you.
I've been using this foundation since it came out! I've bought a lot of other foundations that are really good,but not like this one! This is my ride or die foundation!

i was a little weary given the price of this and it wasn't matte but it is hands down the best foundation i've tried. if you're oily get a good primer and you'll love it. i have textured, oily skin and large pores so trust me...i know.

This foundation is amazing - I've tried several high end ones (Chanel, Guerlain, Burberry, Metier de la Beaute, Chantecaille, Koh Gen Do, etc) and Armani Luminous Silk remains my favorite. The finish is dewy/glowy but doesn't get oily (although I do have drier skin type) and one pump is enough for the whole face with pretty decent medium buildable coverage. Good wear time as well. It's pricey but imo worth it because it lasts a while (I used my last bottle over a year). Overall amazing foundation that has coverage but still looks natural - I'm on my second bottle and would recommend to at least try it! Also for shade reference I'm NC25/30 with warm undertones and I'm 5.75 in Luminous Silk.
I love the colour but that's about it, its sheer and very streaky. In some lighting it looks ok but most lighting it looks horrible.

This is such an amazing product I can't even begin to describe the beautiful finish that it gives you. I was very hesitant to pay $65 for a foundation but this is definitely worth every penny . Very lightweight on my skin and great coverage !!!
I LOVE this foundation! I've been looking for That foundation. The one I could stick with forever and I think this one is it! My only issue is it's smaller amount than I thought it would be.

i have extremely oily skin and was hesitant to try this foundation. i finally gave in and this foundation is great for my light natural everyday makeup. it evens out your skin tone without getting rid of dimension and gives you a glow. i personally have to set it because of my oily skin and it stays on very well. when paired with my mufe mattifying primer, im not oily throughout the day!

When I use this foundation all I really need is a few drops. It has great coverage and stays on all day even after I go to the gym !! And I can finally say I found the perfect color for my fair skin . Love it !

I wanted to love this product but as much as I convinced myself to try & love it I just couldn't. I primed, baked, and set my entire face and STILL after that it was gliding off. I'm so sad because I heard many good reviews and it didn't work for me.
AMAZING AMAZING FLAWLESS PERFECTION

So before I committed to the giant bottle i bought the smaller 18ml sized one. I watched video reviews on this foundation, I read reviews and I had mixed feelings but I really wanted to love it and try. And I'm sadly disappointed in it. My first problem was ordering it online, I ordered the 4.5 color and it's a little to orange for my fair skin. But I decided it wasn't to bad and I would try it out for a few days. So I've applied it with a beauty blender, a Sephora foundation brush and also a

I've tried many foundations from drug store to high end and I can easily say this is one of the worst foundations I have ever had. The coverage is amazing however this foundation was not luminous at all if anything it's a soft matte. I have dry skin but even after exfoliating, moisturizing, and priming the foundation stuck to spots in my skin that weren't even dry making my whole skin look like a cracked desert.

I bought this foundation while in a rut. I had been struggling with foundations making my skin too oily, breaking out or feeling cakey. I previously had been using Born this way foundation and I loved it but it was too yellow for my skin tone so I decided to take the step and get this. IT IS AMAZING, it makes your skin look airbrushed and flawless and feels weightless it's now my holy grail really worth the money.

Maybe it's just me but I splurged and bought this after reading the great reviews. It's so matte and settled into my fine lines and (to me) made me look older. I'm 49 and don't look it. I have good skin and few lines (ok--wrinkles!). I just didn't like how it looked. It does last long though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Best Foundation Ever.  I have oily skin and it wears so well and looks so natural.
This is my absolute favorite foundation!! Can't live without it. The packaging is just as gorgeous as the product. Awesome product & worth the $$.

I have oily skin and I can't live without this foundation. It applies beautifully and stays on my skin. I will never be without this foundation. It gives me gorgeous coverage without looking like a mask. It's light and skin like and while I do have to touch up about once a day depending on how long I'm wearing the foundation, it's worth it for how glowing this foundation makes my skin look without making me look like an oil slick. Luminous Silk and NARS Sheer Glow are perfect everyday foundations. My holy grails!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: What can I say, this is a great foundation that does't cake up on me or cling to me dry patches. However, it does slide off before the end of the day.

This is a buildable full coverage foundation. I'm used to using illamasqua rich liquid foundation and was surprised that I had to build this foundation up, that being said this is the first time ever I haven't had to buy two different shades (and yes I'll spend over $100 on high end foundation) to match my skin tone.
It goes on beautifully after about two hours I was oily and after maybe 4-5 hours didn't look like I had much makeup on. Don't see the hype
Best foundation for flawless, luminous coverage. Blends well and does not look cakey at all. Photographs well too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has changed my life... its dewy...luminous...airbrushed..and divine! This foundation will make you look ten years younger! Ladies and Gentlemen you need this in your life...if you love the dewy look then this is the foundation for you!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has a beautiful finish and actually feels as nice as it looks on me. I used to have super oily skin, but since starting topical acne medications, my skin has dried out. This is my first non-matte foundation and it's amazing. Although it is expensive, it really is worth every penny! I would say the formula is medium coverage but can be flawlessly built up to full coverage.

reviews.review_title: Shade numbers weird no staying power
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First I got shade 5 for my nc 25 and mufe 118 skin tone. It was wayyyy too light and pink. Then I was suggested going down a shade to 4.5. Color match was great but after about two hours the foundation had faded completely. So disappointed. This never happens even with my cheaper drugstore cushion foundations. Going back asap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My number one go to holy grail foundation, you wont be disappointed trust me, such a beautiful finish leaving you looking flawless with still making your skin look like skin, i combine this with my a dior airflash and its probably the best combo

This foundation is amazing, it's my holy grail! I have fair, normal to dry skin and I have yet to discover a foundation that can top this.  I first tried the colour 3.75, but it was way to rosy for my skintone, right now I am wearing shade 2 and it's just the perfect colour match. The finish is magnificent, it is not as dewy/luminous as I thought it would be, but in combination with the Becca backlight primer it's absolutely wonderful. I would say this has medium coverage, it covers redness in my skin and it still looks radiant and natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've gone through so many foundations, but this is by far my favorite! It's totally worth the price. I have combination skin and tend to get very oily at the end of this day and this makes my skin look flawless. I love how light the formula is and if I need more coverage, i just add another layer.

Had heard about this foundation and had to try. I love the way it feels on and color matched perfect. The only thing I have been using an oval brush to apply and seems not to glide on as well as when o use the beauty blender. Other than that love it.

reviews.review_title: i wanted it to work but it didn't :(
reviews.review_text: I was so excited for this foundation. The colour match (i am 6.5, olive golden undertones, south asian skin) was perfect. I loved the feel of rhe foundation and the sligjt fragrance. Buuut in the end it just wasn't what I expected. It had absolutely no staying power and it didn't sit on my combo skin very well. In recent months my skin has gotten more oily so I think that's why it didn't work. I think for this to be good you need to have pretty clear and almost dry skin. I have since exchanged for a fuller coverage foundation which suits my needs much better.

reviews.review_title: Luminous...if you don't have dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation was recommended to me by a makeup artist. I applied it in store and it was gorgeous. Let it set and you are luminous. One thing to note -- I have dry skin and in the winter it's something I need to take extra care of. I used it with the Too Faced Primer and it helped (the Smashbox wasn't strong enough) but there was flaking around my forehead and inner eyebrow/eye area. I switched to Caudalie's moisture rescue cream and this allowed the foundation to sit beautifully. I highly recommend. I almost returned this twice before finding the best combination for my skin and love it. I use it with a kabuki brush which gives medium coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Really love this foundation, but Sephora CANADA is discontinuing shades 7 and 7.5 which is really unfair! To clarify, the company will still carry these shades, as will the USA, and other countries, but Sephora Canada will not be carrying these shades any longer. What a shame. There are many men and women who are this skin tone. Will have to purchase from Holt Renfrew or The Bay.  Foundation gives a very silky, skin-like effect, good for dry skin.

I thought about purchasing this foundation for some months and finally did after I ran out of my old foundation. I bought this with a coupon and was super excited to try it out because I've heard so many good things about it. It's watery as heck.  It took four layers to produce good coverage and it looked green on me. Four hours in it would crease and crack and patch off. Nope. Nope. Took to back after four uses and went back to old trusty. Don't believe the hype all the time.

Based on the reviews I thought this would be amazing. I got a Pantone colour match by Sephora and I got whatever was suggested.   Well let me tell you that this definitely makes my skin look orang-ey.  It is definitely a light coverage that is only good if you have perfect skin or use a lot of concealer.   It may work for you, but this isn't for everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Matches my skin color, no dry patches, i love it! This is an investment.
This foundation is everything. Must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this foundation. I was hesitant to buy it because of the price, but I've heard it recommended so many times that I just had to try it, and I'm SO glad I did. It's leaps and bounds better than any other foundation I've tried and leaves my skin looking so flawless. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I do not have oily or acne-prone skin, and have never in my life broken out as the result of a product, but after using this I developed pimples across my entire face. I stopped using it for a few weeks until my skin cleared up and then tried it a second time, just to make sure this was where the issue was coming from. Surely enough, at the end of the day I had a face full of pimples. I loved the natural finish of this foundation, but it is definitely going back.

Having dry skin I thought I was going to love this foundation, but it foundation does nothing for my skin. The name implies that it's going to be luminous but instead it's just sits on the skin and makes it look so dull, it gives a medium coverage, and I would say it's a satin finish. I thought it was going to be glowing and luminous like sheer glow but that's not the case. Very disappointing and not worth the price tag.

It looks super natural and doesn't crease on the skin! I have combination skin and my skin looks perfect even though I actually have some redness and decent sized pores! You also don't need a lot of this product when applying! Looks best with a thin layer! Definitely worth the price:)

Too expensive. It lasts less than 5 hours and all shades are incredibly pink. I tried all of them and they were too pink. This is the only foundation I have ever tried in my life that is so pink. I have a medium-golden toned skin. I am shade SAND in the too faces new born foundation. I cant believe people do not talk about how pink this foundation is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What I love about wearing this is that, you have it on your face but you don't actually feel like your wearing a foundation. It feel so smooth and looked so natural when I have it on my face. The coverage is very good too. I love using this with Make Up Forever primer foundation. Its a very good combination on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It is a truly silky smooth texture that doesn't feel heavy or overdone.  The only reason why I gave it 4 stars is because of misleading color patches/description.  I chose light with golden overtones for my white but easily tanning skin.  It was WaY too light!   I looked like a ghost.  So unless you are extremely pale, go a shade darker in the same tone or maybe even 2 shades.  I am keeping mine for those dark circles under eyes but I am planning to get the right shade next time.   Awesome product!

I was VERY disappointed in this foundation. I've been wanting to try this foundation for years but always hesitated due to cost. I finally decided to splurge and get it. I am not impressed. My skin does not look dewy and luminous as promised. I find it drying on my already dry skin. The only way I can use it is if I put a beauty oil under it or mix it in. Not impressed.

This foundation rules. I have pretty dry skin with some discoloration, and using this makes it look so flawless. I mix it with two drops of Cover Fx Hydrating Neroli Oil and it stays flexible and beautiful all day long. The *only* reasons I took one star off: color matching is a pain in the you-know-what. I am around an nc25 in MAC. My middle eastern skin is very olive toned and most of these shades I have tried lean very warm! I tried #'s 5, 5.5, 6 and ended up settling with 3.5; which is a touch warmer and darker than 4, which is old and yellow (makes no sense). Extreme pain to find your exact match, but if you can figure it out, is lovely. It's also expensive... bummer. I bought it with Sephora's holiday VIB offers. I'm almost upset I love it so much because now I know it will be repurchased several times at full cost! Needless to say, go get your sample and try it. It's magnificent and the hype is real!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I hate wearing foundation and bought this for my wedding. Its super light and feels like clean skin, not sticky makeup. I now wear it 1-2 times a week, and have gotten lots of complements.

reviews.review_title: I came back to the GA fold...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ... and I'm so glad I did!  I've used Giorgio Armani foundation in the past, but I strayed, trying out other products.  One of the problems?  The SPF in the other foundations made me look like Casper the Friendly Ghost in pictures.  Enter GA Luminous Silk Foundation, with NO SPF.  I've gotten more compliments than ever before on my makeup, which looks just like it's my own skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a bit of a foundation-phobe. I don't like feeling like I have anything on my skin. This is really light-weight, coverage is awesome and I like the neutral/pink/yellow options. Oxidizes just a little on the lightest colors so I just made sure I picked a less pink shade. I also avoid the oily parts of my face as it does get a little slick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this. I'm on the search for a holy grail foundation, and the finish of this one is my favorite out of many that I've tried (very luminous, glowy, yet natural), but the coverage didn't do it for me. I have many acne scars that I like to cover up when doing a more full face, and I had to use almost 4 pumps every time to build up enough coverage--and I wasn't even trying to create a full mask, just medium! For how expensive this is, I was using way too much per use for any kind of value.   In short, loved the finish, but not enough bang for my buck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I heard a lot of good comments about this foundation which is really expensive so I decided to buy it. At the end I felt something disappointed because my skin didn't look as I saw in the tutorials of the beauty junkies. Luckily I bought the travel size.

I bought this online after hearing great reviews from friends and Instagram people. I honestly love it so much. It makes my complexion radiant and even. I'm very pale and 2 worked great. I am also dry and this foundation doesn't  accentuate it. Worth it!!

I purchased this Foundation after seeing some of the reviews. Honestly, because of the price I wouldn't recommend. The foundation itself is very lightweight and has a soft feel. Unfortunately, it had a dryng effect on my face and wasn't as much coverage as I prefer. I needed to build the foundation to get the best coverage. This may go rather quickly compared to other foundations I have used but much more expensive.
The best foundation I have ever used. Makes my skin look beautiful without looking cakey or dry.

I went ahead and splurged on this wonderful foundation and I'm glad I did!! I wear 11.5 and a little goes a long way. When I first put it on looked a bit darker but after a few minutes the color blends in beautifully with my complexion.
I have normal to dry skin and this foundation is amazing! It leaves me glowy and everyone compliments me on how amazing my skin looks, my go to foundation that does not settle into my laugh lines
This is a very nice foundation with good coverage. However, if you have drier skin this may not work. It really clinged to my dry patches. It may work for me in summer.

I love this foundation! For the last year, I've been wearing the  Est√©e Lauder double wear foundation, at first I loved it, but it would leave my face really cakey. My forehead gets oily, but the rest of my face is dry,due to exfoliation. I got a sample of this foundation, and I love it!!! At first I thought it'd be light coverage since it's very light, but it's medium coverage in my opinion. It doesn't leave me Cakey, and works great with my oily forehead. I love it!! Better than Est√©e Lauder!

I absolutely LOVE this foundation! I kept reading about it and finally went and purchased it. It took me a bit to see myself spending so much on foundation but it was worth the splurge!!! I try not to use it too often but I find myself always reaching for it!!!

i've seen a lot of beauty bloggers use this product so i finally decided to buy one and no regrets at all!!! i have Oily skin and this foundation gives me an airbrush finish look.  the bottle is small but it's lasted me forever!  100% recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this foundation after years of wearing only a tinted moisturizer and/or BareMinerals. As I was getting older though, I thought I needed something with a bit more coverage. I have very dry skin and I tend to stay away from liquid foundations, as it often leaves my skin look flaky and dry. I tried the Armani and the finish is absolutely amazing. It is dewy and made me look five years younger. Not only that, but my skin actually looked more hydrated even after taking this off! I would recommend to everyone with dry skin that strays from liquid foundations, as this product really lives up to its hype of being silky, glowy, and not at all cakey.

reviews.review_title: Your skin has gotten so much better!
reviews.review_text: Let me start off by saying I have dark acne scars and oily skin, and that I don't think I can fully how thin and pigmented this foundation is, but I will try. I've had terrible dark spots from old acne since I was in my early-mid teens. And since then, I've been on the search for a full coverage foundation/cc cream   concealer that didn't make me look and feel like a walking cake. I've tried it all. To get a good amount of coverage, I've had to sacrifice a significant amount of time, foundation, and a natural look--- so my acne scars would disappear but the trade-off was that my face would be cakey and by the end of the day, thick and oily. I didn't really believe the hype when I heard about this foundation. But it does do what it claims to do. When I wore  this foundation out for the first time, I received so many compliments on how much better my skin looked and how much it's improved. My face was dewy, (seemingly) clear, and light--- as opposed to my usual oily then dry then back to oily, (kind of) clear, cakey skin. It's expensive for foundation, but it's worth it because you don't even need to put on so much. If I had to pick a downside to this foundation, it'd be that it enhances the fine lines underneath my eyes when I smile. That and also, I can't seem to find the perfect color yet. I currently wear 5.75, but I'm looking for something more yellow toned. Suggestions would be appreciated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the small size since the full-size is expensive. I have high hope for this because my sister said it so great, light weight and flawless. This foundation is so lightweight that it doesn't cover anything. Plus that it also last in my skin for like 2-3 hours and it start to greasy because of my oily skin. There is a good thing that it doesn't break me out and the texture is silky and soft make it blend so easily. This foundation will be great for the normal skin type and for the one that doesn't need much coverage.
I have oily skin but like my skin to look glowy and this foundation did the work nice medium coverage long lasting and no scent always get compliments on it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never had a foundation color match me so well! I have a pretty hard time since I'm a darker olive complexion. I get a lot of compliments, and am always told I look glowing. Its a medium coverage, and it lasts me quite a while as I only use one pump.  It does have a tendency to get a little oily if you don't apply some kind of powder to fix it. But all in all, I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! Very light weight, I don't even feel like I'm wearing anything. A little goes a long way, provides all the coverage I need. I noticed sometimes when I put too much on it makes my face look oily. So I learned to use small amounts that don't make me look oily. Expensive- but worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this foundation because of how expensive it is and how much it is hyped up but every time I try it, I am disappointed. Light-ish coverage, feels greasy even on my normal skin, patchy because it feels oily. Not buildable in my experience (builds up to MAYBE light-medium coverage). You can easily find the same if not better foundations for a fraction of the price. Maybe this works if you have very dry skin and want light coverage. Otherwise, its a waste.
So amazing - never going back

I really didn't want to love this but I do. I have combo skin seems more dry right now than oily. I put this on with no primer. No transfer at all when I touch my face. I typically set all my foundations and didn't set this one! Beautiful natural finish. I only used one layer and it covered all my redness!
