I was skeptical about this one, but one of my fav bloggers was raving about it, I have rosacea, so, it's hard to find a good foundation that gives coverage and keeps the natural look, I'm so happy I found the foundation  that does exactly that! Silky, smooth, not cakey at all...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried many foundations and this is by far the best one i've come across. Sure it is expensive but I feel it is worth the splurge. You can apply a thin layer of this foundation for a more natural look but you can also build it up to achieve a medium to high coverage look. I have nothing bad to say about this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews for products but oh my goodness this foundation is amazing. I have tried so many (too faced born this way, marc jacobs, Nars, etc.), but this one is by far the best. I am very pretty fair in complexion and have very yellow undertones and I have always had a hard time finding a foundation that matches my skin tone and this one in #4 is absolutely perfect. It has a light to medium coverage in my opinion, but it is definitely buildable. I always get compliments on my skin when I wear this foundation with the laura mercier radiance primer. It makes the skin look so luminous and not at all like you are wearing foundation. Will definitely be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried numerous high end foundations and this is by far my favorite. It goes on flawless and didn't break out my acne prone skin. I'm giving it a 4 stars because it doesn't last more then about 6 hours on me and starts to fade. However it doesn't get patchy or sink into fine lines.
It's a good foundation but really nothing special. There are ones that are just as good or better that don't cost almost $70. Save your money, you're not missing much.

I heard everyone was ecstatic about it and it's AMAZING! I have super dry skin so with a great primer which I use Tarte Poreless I get that perfect flow. I will be buying this in the future. Love! Love!

I love this foundation ive been testing it out and i love it sooo much i build it up because i love that cake face look! And it lasts a long time it was pretty great and i sweat at work but it did hold up for a very long time ! :D

Thought this would be an amazing foundation considering all the hype over it but I was truly disappointed.. it doesn't blend well, the coverage is ok, and it's not luminous. If it was $40 I wouldn't have given such a low rating but for nearly $70, I expected a lot more from the product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is long lasting but makes my face oily after about 4-5 hours. Coverage was about medium after 2 layers.

I absolutely love this foundation! I've repurchased it six times already. It is well worth the money if you care about your skin. I have acne prone, oily skin in summer and dry skin in winter and it works beautifully during both seasons. It keeps oil at bay but doesn't cling to dry patches, amazing! I've also fallen asleep with this on various times and have never broken out, and it still looks decent in the morning!

What's everyone raving about this for? I spent $68  thinking it's going to be my holy grail foundation but I was wrong. It's just not worth that kinda money. Doesn't give my skin that healthy, fresh look like I thought it would. I've tried using different primers or setting sprays to test it out or even different brushes or a beauty blender to apply it with but its not satisfying.
This is my new go to foundation. It matches my skin tone perfectly and stays on me all day without fading or getting too dry in my problem areas.

Wanted to love it. Bought it based on all the reviews. I've wanted to try for a while but resisted because of the price. My skin is usually dry/combo but lately it's just very dry. I decided to try it during the VIB sale. It's ok. Nothing special. Not great coverage. And my skin still feels dry. Def not worth the price for me. My born this way foundation is much better for the price and dry skin. I will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing foundation. Great for dry skin

I have tried so many foundations is ridiculous! This is definitely in my top three but is not my holy grail! I feel like it didn't have the staying power of my other favorite Koh GEN do aqua foundation!   They are both pretty much the same price so I am not sure if I'll be repurchasing this one or not. It still is a wonderful foundation it's just not my number one.
Super lightweight, blendable, and natural looking. Looks like u have nothing on! Definitely worth the price ! One of my faves!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Luminous silk foundation is my favorite nightime/special event foundation. Goes on flawlessly, covers all imperfections, and the wide range of colors you're sure to find your shade. Perfect for my dry skin as it is not drying.
Best foundation ever, lightweight, flawless and good coverage

This foundation is hands down the best I've ever tried. I have tried so many different foundations and I have yet to find anything that compares to this. I have dry-to-normal type skin, but this foundation will look perfect on all skin types. TRY IT! You won't be sorry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute perfection! That's all I have to say. There is no other foundation like it and I have tried them all. Beautiful coverage that looks perfectly natural and lasts all day. Try it, you will never use another foundation again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If it doesn't break you out, then it's a great foundation. It's light-weight, okay coverage, and stays really long. I've tried half of my face with Josie Maran Vibrancy and the other half with this, and Vibrancy also stayed long but it oxidized a little bit while this one stayed same color on my skin. BUT Vibrancy didn't break me out while this one gave a few pimples at the end of the day.
Have tried so many others and always come back to this product. Easy to blend, long wear

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: just love the natural coverage, its expensive but worth the money. i wea rit for 12 hrs a day and i feel like nothings on my skin. just very natural coverage. Doesnt hide all the marks and scars but if you have a few acne scars, discolorations this does the job. i love how radiant my skin looks, its like my skin only better.

I have been dying to try this foundation! I finally got it and I'm obsessed! Well worth the cost! It's perfect for every skin type and a little goes a long way. This is the miracle foundation I've been looking for forever! Thank god!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm half way through the bottle and I cannot use anything else. I have combination to oily skin and am oily around my T-zone. I do have dry skin on some parts of my cheek and this foundation applies on flawlessly. I just put in an order for my second bottle. I don't like to spend a lot of money on makeup, but this is on my must-have list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation it goes amazing on my skin if you have dry skin and sensitive skin miz it with Josie marin oil and this it comes on very smooth and nice and not cakey
Best foundation I have ever used. New HG. Must try.

It's a very nice foundation. I give it four stars because of the price. I guess for that amount of money I assumed it would make everything look absolutely flawless. It's not any greater then any of the other 20 foundations I love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin & most foundations make me look more dry, but this one doesn't & it doesn't feel heavy at all.
Finally after JeffreeStarr's review I bought this. It's very soft. I have really really oily face and this product suits very well!!!

I love the finish of this foundation. It looks completely natural, and it's definitely a very soft velvety-matte finish, which I am all about. It wore well throughout the day as well. My only complaint would be their color selection. I'm a 7.5 in their range but just barely. However, the jump between 7.5 and 8.5 is absurd as far as the color range goes. I do wish they would cater to those with darker skin tones, though I am thankful that they finally recognized that even those of us blessed with melanin have yellow undertones and deserve a .5 range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wear the shade 6.25 in this foundation. I received a sample of this foundation in the shade 5.5 at first. I could not wait to try it.. although it was the wrong shade.. my God! I fell in love with this foundation. This is what I had been looking for all my life. I have an uneven skintone, my chin is slightly darker than the rest of my face. This foundation does not make my chin look ashy rather it covers and blends in beautifully. The result of this foundation is truly natural looking skin. It does not emphasize fine lines / smile lines. For events when I need that flawless look I mix this with my double wear in Tawny and it is the most beautiful combination of life. I have combination skin dry / oily t zone. Other foundations make my dry patches really obvious but not this foundation. I do not feel too oily but I blot every 4 hours or so.  Give this foundation a go! Its beautiful provided that you prep your skin before applying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best product ever! Love this foundation. Highly recommend it.

This is my favorite foundation. It's but gives good coverage. I have average skin - not all the same color, sometimes break out. I don't need tons of coverage but minimal coverage usually isn't good enough. It is pricey and I will say it doesn't last forever but I think it's not a bad price to pay for having your skin look good. Works great with a foundation brush. For those that said it's patchy, I always use some daytime moisturizer under it (Ole Henriksen Truth Revealed with SPF15).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this foundation because it is so hyped up. When i first tried it i was suprised with the lack of coverage i got from it. I would say it is a light coverage and can be built up to medium. I also didnt have a luminous finish on my skin either. Lastly, every time i went back to my sample to try it, it broke me out every time. Why don't they list the ingredients btw ? I would only like this foundation when i mixed it with my laura mercier silk creme foundation to get the coverage i wanted. Dissapointed with this foundation.

I purchased this foundation a couple weeks ago and this stuff is amazing! I have combination skin with an oily t-zone and this foundation is more of a natural finish. When I think of luminous on an oily t-zone, I think of an oil spill! Nope! This foundation lasts for a really long time without getting oily. One of my holy grail foundations now! I can't believe I waited so long to try it! And the lightest shade I thought was going to be too dark for me since I am a NC15 but it was the perfect colour!
I was hoping I wouldn't love this because it's so expensive but that's not the case. If you have dry skin it's amazing! It's so luminous and it gives me more than enough coverage.

I was so looking forward to trying this foundation, but was surprised by a let down.. :( it went on smoothly, but the thin/liquidy consistency needed a LOT of product to create any coverage. It looked wonderful after setting with powder, but the coverage patched off throughout the day. It looked so bad that I wiped it off in the middle of my work day. I have normal/dry skin, so this is never really a big issue for me... Not even my drugstore foundations do this! :/ I so wanted to love this!
Lots of people recommended it and I had high hopes. However it has almost no coverage and I need two full layers to achieve the look I want. Also goes on patchy... but I love the finish

This foundation is simply incredible! It looks so natural but flawless at the same time. It feels quite light weight. My skin is normal to combination, and right now, my skin feels amazing. It doesn't make my skin feel oily or greasy at all. It also doesn't make the pores bigger. My skin looks silky and flawless, it is a semi mat finish but still looks very luminous. I also applied a foundation illuminator undue and on top at the end. The foundation let the shine of the highlighter shine through. The coverage is medium. You can definitely wear this as an every day foundation or for special events. It's incredible ***

Not great. Not a ton of coverage (and too expensive to add more than one layer at a time) and if you have even combo skin, when your face starts to get the slightest bit oily, this will separate and get patchy within 5 hours. This is one of those foundations that is for improving already almost perfect skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first ever review here on sephora.com. I felt compelled to share how much I love this foundation. Its dewy, and light on the skin. I would however not use this foundation if you are looking for full coverage. It's good for evening out the skin tone, but you will need to use a concealer if you have problem areas. This is the only foundation I've ever worn that I've gotten compliments on! Looks airbrushed :) Yes, it's expensive, but it is worth the splurge!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Goes on flawlessly and works great on my skin.  I would love to have this foundation in matte form. It gets a bit oily throughout the day when i forget to set it.

Snatched this during the VIBR sale since it is a bit pricey. Very light with a natural finish, the coverage isn't super opaque but it is buildable.  It also gives that own skin but better look. I have combination skin, this didn't cling on to dry patches and I had it on for a solid 6 hours; didn't need to retouch, just blotted the oil twice. It doesn't break me out or clog my pores either. So far I am loving it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this foundation for over 4 years. I'm on my 3rd bottle. I'm on shade 5.5. I'm very picky with foundation, and I tried other brand but felt cakey. With GA, I only need 1 pump to cover my face and felt very smooth and luminous on my face, which is great. I'm so happy that now Sephora also carries GA brand.

Idk why it has such high rating. It's so hard to blend, either with my fingers or my foundation brush. I have to double the time of doing make up in order to get even skin tone. And everyone can tell oh you have make up on today. So cakey. Was thinking giving it two star because of the nice packaging , but when I recall it's price:one star for sure.

This foundation worked great for me and I found a perfect match for my pale skin! The only problem I have with this foundation is that I can't touch my face AT ALL when I have it on. If I seat during work It won't stay on no matter how much setting spray/primer I use. I find that it constantly cakes up around my mouth and rubs off extremity easily. On days I don't work and just go shopping or do daily tasks, it's totally fine. So maybe sweaty people stay away? Lol...Other than that I love the way it looks and feels on my skin.

worth every penny.Love how it sits on my skin.I never had anybody complementing about my foundation.but when i wear this many people ask me.love it love it love it.But if you have a problem skin this does not work for you probably.it has medium coverage,

Love this foundation! I have combination skin and my face looks smooth and bright throughout the day. It's very buildable so you can go for a light look during the day and more coverage at night! Great purchase!

My drug store foundation works better than this. It doesn't dry down and just sits on my face rather than sinking into my skin. Any attempt to blend will result in streakiness and cakiness. I don't understand what the hype is about. After applying this thing and ruined my makeup for the day I actually had to wash all my brushes because any brush that touched this foundation clumped and caked up my face. The range of color was not impressive. They all have a lot of red abs peach undertone. If you have a lot of yellow undertone like me I would suggest skipping this.

Honestly I don't know if I can use another one. This foundation exceeds them all! The coverage is build-able and light. I never break out or feel oily. I'm just in love with the product not so much the price. Then again though if it does all that in ok with paying over $60 :( just wish it was more like $45 hahaha but I can't have it all. It's a must if your debating

Purchased this foundation because I hated how my old foundation made my skin look. It made my skin look so old and dry and I'm actually very young so there's no excuse. Tried this one out today and I feel like a different person. My skin is glowing. Very natural finish. I'm happy and I'll definitely be sticking to this foundation for now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this when I typically buy BB creams. Creates a nice even finish on the skin (helps minimize the look of age-related hollows like tear troughs) - doesn't settle in or accentuate fine lines around eyes or lips; does blur imperfections somewhat and the soft finish lasts without looking dry.  Only drawback for me was seeing methylparaben in the ingredient list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received this sample in a beauty bag at Saks 5th Avenue. I waited to try it since samples typically aren't the correct shade. I tried it this weekend and loved the texture and coverage. Stila discontinued one of my favorite foundations that I have used off and on for almost 10 years- the Illuminating Foundation (they still make the powder though). Their foundation has the slightest bit of luminous specks in it (not like glitter, but like a luminous bronze or highlighter) that this Armani foundation has. I never thought I'd find a replacement but I believe this may be it! I can't wait to go buy full size. It really looks great on my skin. My skin type is normal with occasional breakouts during my cycle. I also have light keratosis pilaris on my cheeks that don't cause discoloration, but a heavier foundation makes less apparent.

Beautiful consistency with a variety of colors - it blends so easily. You can sheer it out or make it a medium/full coverage. One of the few foundations that feels like skin and doesn't clog my pores even after a long night out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I loveee this foundation. It applies so naturally and it's so moisturizing. I've only been wearing it for a week and I haven't stopped taking pictures of my face. It look so good in natural light and as an added bonus, it. smells. amazing. I don't think I'll be switching from this foundation any time soon.

This foundation applies itself so naturally I had been contemplating it because of the price but it is worth the money, it's very light weight and natural looking. Will definitely purchase again. Has a great color selection as well.

Just received a sample of this in the mail. AMAZING. It has great coverage while also looking like skin. Lasts all day without getting oily and looks perfect when set with the Laura Mercier loose powder. Buying myself the full product right now. 10/10

It took me years to finally try this foundation. And I'm mad at myself for not trying it sooner!!! Best foundation in the entire world in my opinion. It'll be hard to top this. Excellent in photos and just as good in person. Whenever I wear this foundation I get millions of complements!
Worth every penny. When I wear this foundation I get so many compliments. My skin is the same with every foundation I use. So that says a lot. Will definitely repurchase.

I adore this foundation! Besides the MUFE ultra HD, this is the only foundation I have ever repurchased and I've been a makeup lover for years! Shade 3 matches my fair, warm toned skin absolutely perfectly. I can't even tell where the foundation meets my skin. The finish is beautiful, it doesn't sink into my fine lines, no caking in the usual places (around my nose, on acne), doesn't need to be set with powder and lasts all day. I thought Too Faced born this way foundation might be my holy grail, but nope, I was wrong. Now that I'm back to using this again, I'm not going to bother with anything but this and the MUFE ultra HD. Absolute perfection and well worth the price tag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this foundation. It leaves a flawless finish and feels light!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is probably one of the best foundations i've ever had in my life. I've gone through many foundations but this one is just absolutely amazing. At the moment of application, it feels so natural, and gives the skin a dewy, and luminous finish. But, i'm coming to realize that its not very long lasting, hence the one star off. I decided to pick up a sample of YSL's touche eclat, it looks pretty amazing on sephora employees, and if I do decide to switch for a while.. just a reminder, GA's luminous silk will always be my first love.

This foundation is beautiful. I love the finish and the packaging. Is it worth the price tag? No. I don't find this foundation to be any different than a 40$ foundation. Light coverage.. Whatever you do, don't use a brush. Leaves brush strokes no matter how much you blend. Overall... meh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Okay coverage, nothing special, and doesn't last very long. Giorgio Armani should stick to fashion.

I have a couple other foundations I use on rotate but I gave in an got this foundation to add to my collection. I have dry and little oily skin. I have never had some many complements on my make up before and when I wear another foundation nothing.   LOVE THIS FOUNDATION IS A MUST HAVE!

Finally a foundation that blends and melts into my skin. 5 was a perfect match an I find sometimes it is hard to find a good match for my skin tone but this is perfect. Stays on pretty good for quite a few hours. Doesn't fee like I'm wearing anything.  New favourite :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: PROS - Provides a beautiful foundationless skin finish - Relatively long-wearing - Reapplies without looking cakey - Buildable coverage - Shades for a decent range of skin tones, including ~NC15  CONS - Expensive - Slightly pore-clogging (must be thorough when removing) - Weird shade configuration at the light end of the range (3 is lighter than 2)  OVERALL IMPRESSION: This foundation is incredibly luxurious in the look that it produces. It offers great coverage from medium-sheer to medium-full, and a single layer can be built upon without a cakey or unnatural finish. When wearing it, it's undetectable and produces the look of radiant skin free of imperfections. While there is a reasonable volume of foundation in a single bottle, the Luminous Silk foundation still has a high price point. I find that while it doesn't aggravate any skin issues, it doesn't improve the underlying quality of my skin per se. Still on the fence as to whether or not I wish to use this on a daily basis, given this fact and the price point. However, if you want a quality foundation, this product certainly lives up to the acclaim behind the Armani Beauty name.  Compared to the Maestro foundation, I would 9/10 times recommend one goes with this formulation. While initially considering Maestro, I found that this product offers a buildable coverage that the Maestro line lacks (i.e. is more versatile). Unless you are specifically looking for a tinted moisturizer effect and nothing more, Luminous Silk is the best option in the Armani foundation range.  Note that, for porcelain/fair skin tones, the '3' shade is in fact lighter than '2.' 2 has a bit of an unfortunate orange cast, and for the fairest of skin, I would recommend that you purchase the 3 instead.
Great foundation for people who are going for a dewy look , very light weight , radiant , also great for people with dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is perfect for dryer skin. It didn't set into dryness and give a luminous natural look to the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this before switching to the Lasting Silk version because everyone raved about it. It felt like skin, matched my skintone (#4), and provided nice coverage, but it was no good to my combination skin even with primers, powders, and setting sprays. After 8+ hours, it just seemed to break apart especially around the T-zone and my chin. Probably better for people with dry skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as an sample with my sephora purchase. Thought I wuld love this since I have dry skin and I heard that it's dewy finish. I tried on, it is dewy, but my problem with this is --- too dewy. I waited for so long for that kind of wet, tacky, too dewy + too glowy kind of feeling to go away, but it just wouldn't. I put on powder (something I usually don't do because of my extremely dry skin), and even after that, there is something just still doesn't feel right. Really want to love this foundation, but just feel like it's not for me.
It was really just meh felt really sticky and just not worth 64  dollars on one foundation. Sometimes I really felt like my face was melting off lol.   NOT WORTH DON'T BUY

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to foundation. The coverage is so smooth and flawless, the coverage is buildable and looks natural. I wear it for 8-12 hours, depending on the day and don't have too many issues with it sliding. No issues with it oxidizing or becoming streaky. I have oily skin that is prone to breakouts and do not have any issues with this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The product went on nicely but eventually my skin started breaking out in spots and I don't have acne.  Too bad, that was quite an expensive chance I took.

This is really weightless and provides great coverage while looking natural. Makeup should show your beautiful features, not make you look like a clown. This is my favorite foundation. After having tried so many, I finally found the one!

reviews.review_title: Great match for my pale skin..
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this after hearing Jaclyn Hill rave about it. And I do like it, but don't quite love it. It's a perfect match for my skin (#2) which is hard to find. But other than that I don't think it does anything too magical. I'll keep the bottle and use it. But once it's gone I might go back to Urban Decays Naked foundation which is a lot more reasonable at $40 a bottle.

I bought this thinking it was going to give me that glowy dewy looks like skin effextbut it did not. It's a normal foundation, It dix absolutely nothing for me and definitely not worth the money. I'll stick to my Dior air nude foundation. Don't waste your money! It's overly hyped
This is my daily go to. I buy No.2 and it's a nice match to my skin and feels nice to wear. I apply with a wet beauty blender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the foundation. I have dry skin and this foundation is very hydrating, and moisturizing. It goes on smooth and it makes your skin look very natural with a healthy glow.
I've been using Chanel premiere velvet foundation for a year now. I swore I'd never wear another foundation. until this one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smooth matte foundation. I have very oily skin. This foundation is flawless and keeps my skin matte. Love it.

This has to be, hands down my favorite foundation that I've purchased so far. I'm a huge make-up person and honestly this  foundation is just flawless! Makes my skin look so healthy & I love it! Pricey but worth it, I'll be repurchasing once I run out! This is a staple in my collection for sure.
Love the consistency and full coverage regardless of the amount!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the pump. Very hydrating, luminous silk feel, buildable, natural and moisturizing. No caky look and no dry spots

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS FOUNDATION. It is so close to my skin color and its light and non oily. It doesn't give you a POWDERY feel on your skin. This is my holy grail, I don't think I will ever replace it for a long time.

I loved the way this foundation looked when I first put it on, but within a few hours it would break up on my cheeks and around my nose. I tried using primer, powder, and a setting spray, but couldn't get it to last on my oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I receive a sample of this foundation and first didn't like it as much. I have always use another brand for so many years. I am talking 20 plus years with the same foundation. I decided to ask for another sample. And WALLA.... OMG I change to Luminous silk foundation. My skin looks amazing smooth after I apply. This foundation is the THE BEST I ever seen after apply the contour and blush. Is super precised for the amazing finish over all. Photo finish!!
Worth the money. This looks beautiful on the face.

I have been on the hunt for the perfect foundation. I am super dry and have seborrhoeic dermatitis on my nose and chin.  I needed a medium to full coverage to get rid of the redness without clinging to my dry patches. I tried a ton of foundations. Low end to high end. Nars sheer glow, born this way,  lancome, laura mercier, loreal pro glow...nothing worked. This foundation is amazing. It doesn't cling to my dry patches and it leaves me dewy. I hate spending the money on it but it seriously worth it. I will never use another foundation.
My favorite foundation to date. Medium coverage. Gives your skin a natural glow without looking to oily, dewy, etc.

This gives amazingly smooth and beautiful, slightly glowy finish. It can be layered on for a fuller coverage. Doesn't break me out on my acne prone skin. It's very expensive for a foundation, but I can't find any cheaper dupe that delivers as good as this one. Worth every penny!!
Best foundation! Doesn't look like cake on my face! Love it! Only foundation i use and will ever use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried a number of foundations and always felt too Made up or that I was not getting enough coverage. This one is perfect for giving enough coverage but still leaving me feeling fresh and not overly made up. I apply it with the Sephora Airbrush 55 brush and it goes on perfectly. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is alright. It's not the worst I've ever tried - and I've tried a lot of bad foundations - but it's not the best either. Despite using a primer and setting powder, I noticed it still rubs off throughout the day (especially if I ever make a phone call, then there's foundation on my phone screen). It's not cakey or anything, which seems to be a common problem in other foundations I've tried, but it does look shiny/oily by the end of a long work day.   So yeah, I'm meh about it. I'll probably use it until it runs out and then try to find something better. But hey, it clearly works for other people, so who am I to judge?

So I've tried multiple different brands foundation such as la mer, guerlain, makeupforever and so many others and this is the best for that flawless looking skin. It does not have a great coverage, but I love how it feels on my skin and how it looks on my skin too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried numerous foundations from every brand at every price point -- and then I found this one. My search is over. Hands down, the best foundation I've ever used. I have medium olive skin with a yellow undertone (4Y07) and use colour #6 applied with a beauty blender. Yes it's expensive, but you only need a pump or two of the product. It wears beautifully, doesn't crease, lasts all night, never feels oily, goes on so nicely and leaves me looking airbrushed in and out of photos. In absolute love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely dry skin with a pale complexion and have tried numerous foundations trying to find the best one that suits me and my skin. Also even though its one of the more expensive ones you do get a lot of use of it. I use it nearly everyday and still haven't ran out and I can't remember when I first purchased it.

reviews.review_title: Not what I reach for in the morning
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like I might be the only person who doesn't love this foundation. I am mixed with tan skin and it was hard to find a color match, I tried 3 different shades and mixing, etc. Depending on my shade (I spray tan so it can change) I could sometimes find a good match but even then it wasn't super great like all the hype on social media and every makes it seem. I never use this so super disappointed.

reviews.review_title: Too bad for dry combination skin
reviews.review_text: It works good at first apply.After a few hour goes dark and dry. It makes me look older.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, I think it's a great foundation. It is easy to blend and it has medium to full coverage.  There is an initial white caste because of the spf but it does go away. I absolutely love the finish because it makes me look like a k-pop star with dewy and radiant skin. My favorite aspect is that it is very lightweight and not heavy on my skin and face.  A minor con is that It's not very long-wearing because it was easily rubbed off when I blew my nose. However, it did stay on the rest of my face. I like how there is an expiration date on the bottom.  I highly recommend this foundation IF you have the money to splurge but I would not recommend it if you have oily skin. I hope this review was helpful!

i've heard AMAZING things about this product but i really was not totally impressed? didn't sit on my skin very well, and didn't last long at all throughout a normal workday. wasn't easy to build up either, with several brushes or my beauty blender. am i doing something wrong or is this really not the best foundation ever? or is it best for dry skin not combo like mine? kinda disappointed since i spent the most amount of money i ever have on a foundation before.

The hype is real with this foundation- it is a real game changer. I love the way it goes on, it is light but totally buildable if I need it to be. I apply this with my beauty blender and use just one pump each day. You won't regret this splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is amazing. My only issue is that it's not long wearing.

Everyone's skin is different (I have combination skin), and I find mine is quite picky. With this foundation I did not break out, I didn't feel cakey or dry or oily. It can be used minimally or built up. I do find after 9-10hrs my T-zone is a bit shiny, but I feel that I may always have that issue.

Finally my search ended here this is the best foundation uptil now after testing nars sheer glow, makeup forever hd, laura mercier candle glow etc....as i'am having a dry skin this foundation works great after applying a good hydrating moisturize and primer for dry skin it really brings a flawless light weight and a natural look :) highly recommend !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Found the perfect foundation. I don't typically use foundation because I hate the feeling of having make up all over my face. But this was like velvety silk texture that my skin just drinks up and disappears into, while providing amazing coverage. I would say it's medium coverage with just half a pump, and I apply more in areas where I need more coverage, like under eyes, etc. It works like magic. Super easy to blend. I use a brush as the beauty blender sponge tends to suck up the product. I use this with the Hourglass primer and it goes well together. The foundation lasted all day... amazing. Wish it was cheaper though.

After seeing all the rave reviews online, I had to get my hands on it.  Luminous silk?  I am all about anything that adds luminosity to the skin.  Unfortunately the name is terribly misleading and this foundation just did not work for my dry skin.  It highlighted every dry patch, line, pore, and wrinkle on my face AND even created a few that wasn't even there.  I really wanted to love this product, but it had to go back!

I've been using this for the past 10 years. I have tried numerous other brands during this time but I keep returning to this foundation. It doesn't last all day, but I've yet to find one that does without topping up. It is perfect for a night out, though I use it as both my everyday and going out foundation.

This is a beautiful foundation after application. It has no claim for long wearing, and it wears off after 2-3 hours for me. I have combination skin with oily T-zone and normal skin. I love my skin post application, and I really wish there is a primer that would work this foundation. My nose area looks shiny and the cheek area looks break apart after 2-3 hours. *sigh*

I Love this foundation! I was excited to see they had sample of it on online check so of course I had to try it, and was kinda hoping I wouldn't like it but I totally love it. It's my go to when I want to do my make up and dress up a little cause I know it will last. The coloring is really nice and it has a great finish. My only complaint would be that I do notice is settles in my laugh lines around my mouth, which I actually have never had before with other foundations. I find myself at the end of the day not wanting to take this off cause it looks so good still and it's so lightweight (and pricey) but obviously I have to. Overall great product I would recommend it!

I've heard a lot about this foundation before I finally decided to try it for myself, and I can now say that this is my holy grail of foundation! I did not even get a sample, I just went ahead and bought it and matched my shade with my COLOR IQ, which was a perfect match for me! The application is smooth and consistent without being too heavy. You can build up coverage and still won't look or feel like you're wearing too much on your face. My face skin is pretty smooth on it's own, but this foundation gives that flawless, airbrushed look to my skin. I get so many compliments on my skin when I wear this. It lasts all day and it just looks great. I am never going back to my old foundation!

I have hard skin to match to as well as not look to plastic! This has changed my life in the best way there is nothing like this I feel beautiful every time I use this, by the way I use it everyday and it last a long time! And two to three months

Honestly, I've tried other foundations in attempt to find a similar product with a less expensive price. But I will always run back to this foundation... the one and only - BEST foundation EVER. First of all, a foundation has never matched me so perfectly. 2 is the BEST color for fair, neutral toned skin. Secondly, when you put this foundation on, it actually looks like your own SKIN but a photoshopped airbrushed version of it (in a good way). It just smooths over and melts into the skin flawlessly. The ONLY complaint I have, is that I do get oily after a couple of hours of wear and need to blot, (but that's with every foundation I wear. I never prime either, as it creates a barrier between skin and product). You do have to set this foundation with a powder, or it will come off. It does transfer SLIGHTLY. But honestly how flawless it makes your skin look in person and in photos over powers the cons. Get it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my all time favorite foundations, and I've tried tons. It's worth every penny IMO. I absolutely love the shade range. I'm in the shade 9. It's mediu  but can easily be built up to full coverage without getting cakey. It's slightly luminous, but I wouldn't say dewy, which I like. I have dry skin, but I do not like looking dewy. It makes you look flawless and airbrushed while lasting all day. Does not transfer whatsoever. I wore this to the Drake concert and went to an outdoor bar area afterwards. I was literally dripping sweat all night long and my makeup still looked perfect. Will continue to buy over and over.

Wow this is my all time favorite foundation. It has light coverage and looks super natural. My skin is oily. but this foundation is perfect for my skin! The texture is amazing and super soft. It is definitely a silky finish.

reviews.review_title: FEW foundations deserve 5 stars - THIS ONE DOES!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I put off purchasing this foundation because of the price point. Finally I took the plunge and purchased the trial size first - The next day I purchased the full size because I NEVER want to run out!! This is, hands down, the BEST foundation I have EVER used!! I'm 53yrs old and have great skin, but this foundation just puts it over the top for me. My husband and I have been together for 30 years (this Monday) and he told me today as we were having lunch that my skin looked like it glowed!! I took a chance on the color over the internet and it was a perfect match! Any products I use under or over it look gorgeous! It's very lightweight (perfect for the heat here in South Florida but it is definitely buildable for nights out. If you are on the fence because of the price point (or any other reason) do yourself a solid and buy it - you will be AMAZED!!!
This is the BEST foundation out here IF you want A natural Look! Yes it's buildable but the finish is so natural and silky. It feels like perfect skin I love it I will forever buying it.
Very light weight full coverage foundation. I'm so happy I decided to buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was curious because of all the feedbacks , and reviews , recommendations I've been getting with regards to this foundation. I finally splurged and decided to get one. It's alright , it has the silky velvety smooth effect , but it didn't impress me to the point that I could say WOW ! , which I was honestly expecting from this . Im keeping and going to use it ,  but Im definitely not buying my second bottle .

It comes in so many shades that it's possible to find the perfect match. I have both pink and yellow undertones. I have found that most foundations I've used cater to one or the other but this foundation in 6.25 is my perfect foundation. I've even gotten compliments. My skin is as close to flawless as it may get. It's light-weight so using a brush to press the foundation into the pores has worked well for me.
Love this foundation. I have super dry skin and this is the best foundation ever
This foundation is amazing!!! It matches my skin tone perfectly and I do mean perfectly! It's light and airy as well as being enough to cover up my redness. I have fallen head over heels for this!!!!

I love the color of this foundation. It starts out great. Like some other reviews tho, I notice that my cheeks and nose look blotchy later in the day. By the end I'm a greasy mess. This is only for short days. It's too bad that I've used so much, I can't return it now.
Read the reviews got exited brought the product is good but not to die for.
Color matches and blends into my skin perfectly. I have oily skin and it doesn't make me greasy looking. Perfect coverage!

I really wanted to love this foundation. Heard this was one of the best. Tried it for a month and I noticed it began to patch up around my forehead, undereyes and nose. Not cute. Wear longevity was not good after a long workday. Returned.

I never wore foundation before, until I tried this. Seriously love it- it's a perfect consistency and color on my skin.  I used to wear Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer and this feels more moisturizing and smooth than that.  Would definitely recommend this foundation!

I have normal to dry (sensitive acne prone skin) and after reading reviews bought this one thinking it's gonna look luminous, but even with using a good moisturiser and primer it feels a little dry .. But settles in better once natural oils set in.. Good coverage but not the best..
By far the best foundation I have ever used. Natural and light weight worth every cent.

I previously used the Hourglass skin tint and found it to be a bit wet and heavy on my skin, after switching to this foundation I fell in love! It's a gorgeous texture and lightweight yet full coverage! Amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been used this foundation ever since Giorgio Armani launched this. Until my 3rd bottle I really did not think of finding other foundation, it literally was a holy grail I will never gonna leave you foundation. But while using my current bottle, I started experience it clogged into or made my pores a bit more visible. My skin indeed has been changed, but in a improved way. Sometimes it even gave me a feeling that my pores are less visible when I am not wearing this foundation, bare skin. I have been played with this foundation longtime so I know flat top foundation brush is the bestie with this for me. It is not the problem of tools. So I presume the formula has been change?   Though, it still has lightweight and beautiful finish, what I really liked. It does not feel heavy on your face. But it does NOT give a full coverage to VANISH your pores. This foundation lasted really long on my face regardless of season.
It feels like silk on my face and it's so lightweight. Omg buy it now the best foundation ever and it has skincare benefits too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I hate this product, it makes me feel so oily and greasy!! Not worth the 70 DOLLARS!!!!! I cannot believe I spent that much money on a FOUNDATION! :(
VERY lightweight and smooth. I love this foundation.

I got this after the amazing race reviews it got. And I simply can't get on this bandwagon. I've tried applying it every single way and it still ends up streaky and patchy. There's definitely not much coverage to it, it has about as much coverage as a BB cream. So if you have any acne or discoloration this is not the foundation for you.
Just got this in the mail today and tried it and all I can say is that it's perfect for my combination skin!!
Very smooth clean finish. Doesn't dry too matte or dewy. Lasts all day with the right setting spray. Loved it so much repurchased it 3 times !

reviews.review_title: amazing feel on the skin & flawless finish
reviews.review_text: This foundation is gorgeous! I have used too many to count, and this one has given me the best results I could think to have! Beautiful job with the packaging, very high end but worth every penny

I've never been a foundation wearer but in the last couple of years I've really needed the extra help. I'm on my second bottle of this and can't say enough about how awesome this is for me. It feels light on my skin and covers just enough. I feel really beautiful and confident with this on my skin. I think if you need full coverage or have skin issues, this will not hide larger issues. My needs are evening out tone and adding some youthful glow - this is perfect for those needs.

This is my absolute go to foundation, just the right amount of coverage for my skin. I have combination skin so this foundation works with my skin perfectly! Only down fall is trying to find my perfect   color with their odd number system.

I received a sample from a department store a few weeks ago and from there I was hooked. Unfortunately the Sephora where I am currently vacationing does not carry it. I purchased it online in the shade #13. Picked it up yesterday from UPS and I love it. Great coverage and it holds up to my oily skin.
I personally do not find it to be very luminous. It looks good on the skin but I don't think it is worth it

I use this foundation and it provides a smooth, silky texture on your skin. Working for almost 10 hours at my office, I need a full coverage that will last long and not leave a 'cakey' texture. Perfect 5 stars for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the smaller sized bottle of this for a trial since the full-size is so expensive, and I got it in shade 2, the lightest shade that size bottle comes in. I have normal skin with some dry patches, but I live on a hot tropical island, so this hasn't been a concern recently. I love dewy, radiant foundations, and this is just perfect. The product is very silky and easy to blend with a sponge, brush, or your fingers, but I always use the sponge. It can be allowed to settle, and added to for a fuller coverage, and it builds beautifully. I follow this up with a creamy concealer and usually set the whole face with powder, as I do with every foundation, and it lasts for most of the day. If I didn't live in such a hot, humid environment, I can imagine it would last longer.Overall, this is seriously such a beautiful finish, with buildable coverage that can last all day with proper priming and setting products.

This foundation makes it look like I have perfect skin. It may not be the most coverage but the finish looks like you just have naturally gorgeous glowing skin. This is probably my favorite foundation hands down, which is saying a lot because I'm a foundation junkie

This is an excellent foundation, that imparts a no makeup look, but your skin looks flawless. I do need to powder my nose, as that area tends to get oily during the day. This foundation is on the pricey side, however I only use 1 pump for my entire face compared to my other foundations that require 2-3 pumps. So one bottle lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation gives a very silky but even coverage. I only use half a pump to cover my face. I use a brush and finish it with a beauty blender and it gets a flawless finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was travelling back home from europe and i decided to test this product out at a duty free store. I took a little pump so that the workers dont say anything and decided to cover up my imperfections since i didnt not have any make up on. right away i noticed that the texture is literally silk like, which felt really new to me and refreshing. the coverage is super lightweight, feels like you are make up free, and is great for building up. a pump of this foundation went on my face and covered a large portion, no cakey like texture. literally a luminous silk product. going to purchase this in a couple of days at sephora.
Beautiful glowy, dewey flawless coverage! The best luminous foundation in my opinion. Definitely not full coverage but buildable!! Has potential to cover everything. Oily skin? Set with powder.

I love this foundation. I have tried many high brand foundations and this definitely beats all of them. Every time I wear this foundation, I get a lot of compliments. It also does not feel sticky like many other brands. It hides all your pores and goes on very smooth with not much blending needed. The only downside and the reason why I gave it a 4 star is because it does not last long. It might only last me couple of weeks to a month at the most. For an expensive price, I wish they had more product.
This foundation is BEAUTIFUL. Goes on smoothly and will never look thick, cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does what it says it will do.... makes your skin look flawless without looking cakey. For dry or combination skin it's a DREAM - I wouldn't recommend if you have severe acne or pigmentation, but this stuff blends out beautifully and never settles into fine lines or dry patches. It's hydrating and still wears perfectly on me through the day. I'm on my second bottle

I just finished a long search for my perfect foundations and this Luminous Silk Foundation is now a favorite. This is the foundation I wear that leaves people saying, You're wearing makeup?!   The coverage is light (build-able to medium) and can be applied with fingers, brush, or sponge. If you've got pretty great skin but want to take it to a next-level silkiness and glow, then this is for you. My skin isn't like that, though! I have a lot of pigmentation (post-inflammation, sun damage, plus melasma), but I still like it because it gives me something between au naturel and full-on, I'm-definitely-wearing-foundation makeup (for that I rely on Makeup Forever's HD Invisible Cover foundation). You can still see my spots underneath, but they're lighter and I love the finish of this foundation: lightweight, luminous, and natural. And for my dry skin, this formula is nice---it stays, but it doesn't turn cakey or settle in weirdly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try this foundation after reading all the positive reviews, unfortunately for me its just ok. Kinda runny and I didn't really love the color choices. With that said its ok for a day time foundation and if your skin tone tends to be more on the yellow end of the spectrum there are a lot of choices for you.

Nice product....leaves a soft and silky finish on your skin...melts into your skin.  Not enough coverage for my taste. It's build-able, but why would I spend so much money on a foundation to waste it away by having to apply layers of it.   However, if you don't like full coverage and like to spulge....it's superb!
I do not see what the hype was about. Really over rated. However, the shade range was excellent. But dried with a grayish undertone..
I do not understand all the hype about this foundation. Coverage is medium and is overall an OK foundation. Definitely much better options for the same price.

I've been using this foundation for years. I used to apply it with my fingers and it lasted for a year. Now I use sponge to put on my foundation & the bottle goes empty really quick. I have this in many different shades. It has medium coverage and stay on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It provides amazing dewy complexion, product is buildable to an extend. I only gave it four stars because prize point should be $40-$50.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this gives me such an airbrush finish after it sets! it's the only foundation that keeps my blush, bronzer and highlight on. don't let the 'luminous' title fool you. oily skin girls can def use this! just set with a powder. the MUFE HD was alway a little too heavy for me and never seemed to last but this is just perfect. it doesn't break apart of look cakey. i definitely recommend trying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought two shades: 6.5 and 8. The formula is wonderful - I have combo skin and I find that this doesn't exacerbate my oiliness in the warmer months. The finish is quite natural/satin-like. Not really dewy but not too matte either. It has a medium coverage which can definitely be built up to something more full. The foundation wears will throughout an 8-hour day, but it definitely needs to be touched up.  6.5 works great for NC40-NC42 skin. 8 is a bit too dark for me at the moment (NC42). I really wish Sephora Canada carried 7 and 7.5!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on very nice and smooth, skin looks great. Not the right product if you are looking for a heavier foundation, which I was not looking for. I do find it does not last the entire day though. I have combination skin and my face becomes quite oily within a few hours. Unfortunate since this product covers well and feels nice on the skin.
Fantastic foundation! I have dry skin and this has great coverage that dosen't accentuate my dry skin.
This product is the BEST. Very light and glowy look. I got it for the second time.
This is the best foundation I have ever used. Highly recommend it!!!

Finally I found a foundation  that I like. I always go to Sephora and ask for samples every time I'm interested in trying something new. I never go back and buy the full size because I don't like them. But with this foundation it was love at first sight. It looks very natural and nice
The best foundation ever !!!
Flawless with staying power!
this is the smoothest lightweight foundation i have ever used. the formula is amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage and with out a mask look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought nothing could top Lanc√¥me Teinte Idole...Giorgio Armani Luminous Silk just blew away my holy grail foundations [Lanc√¥me, Hourglass, KVD]. This on goes on smoothly [I used a BB] and stays on feeling light all day. Something about it makes my skin look flawless and airbrushed. It is also long wearing. It is a bit pricey but with foundation this good, I do not mind paying more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never usually write reviews but I had to let anyone who was interested in this foundation that this is the best foundation I have ever used. It is 100% worth the price tag. I used to use YSL touche eclat and I found that that really stuck to my dry patches and was just a patchy application overall but with Armani it sinks into the skin and looks and feels like skin - it is perfect for dry skin in my opinion. I've used this a few times now and it applies evenly and it's really easy to build up the coverage. Armani nailed it on the head with this one.

As a woman with a very oily complexion, and have tried just about every foundation out there, this is hands down THE best foundation. Since I have oily skin and blemishes, I must admit that this foundation will not completely cover it. Even if you add more layers, acne marks will still peek through. That is why Ive had to try other foundations. This is even better than Lancome 24 hour foundation. It has a more dewy look to it and just makes the skin look like its lit from within. Also, this is the only foundation I have ever used that never breaks me out. It is expensive but I think it is worth it because it is a high quality product, and foundation should be because it is sitting directly on top of the skin. I just wish it had better coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation lives up to the hype! It's incredibly lightweight but still manages to provide amazing coverage. Definitely recommend it!
Bought this based on the reviews and my word! I am impressed.  Lasts all day. Great coverage.  Very happy I tried it.
Honestly it's such a great product it covers all my blemishes and you only have to use a little bit of foundation to give you a satisfying look

I love this foundation because it gives a glowy, natural finish.  It is buildable and does not look cakey.  It also tends to last for throughout the day. My only con is that this is expensive and I have oily skin, so it does feel like it starts to run off toward the end of the day. There are better foundations for this price for oily skin, but it is an awesome foundation.

I love foundations and I have 12 bottles of foundations: Marc Jacobs, Tarte, Urban Decay (just to name a few) and this little gem is the most expensive one I own and I just love it! I am combination skin and this gives s glow and if you are oily or have combination skin then I suggest to set this but no matter what foundation you use high end or low end foundations you are going to become shinny but I don't mind because there's nothing you can do anyways.. You can set any foundation and still become oily and sometimes setting any foundations can make you look cakey anyways... But this foundation is truly beautiful!!

I've been using this foundation for over a year now but it is not one of my everyday ones. The consistency is liquidy but the coverage is medium-buildable full coverage. It makes your skin look lit from within and very smooth. My two complaints are that the product contains alcohol which can dry out your skin and it transfers like crazy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve been on the hunt for the perfect foundation since I started wearing makeup, so about 13 years.  I‚Äôve lost count of the number of foundations I‚Äôve tried over the years from drug store to high end.  I‚Äôve read so many good things about this but didn‚Äôt want to spend the money because lets face it, this stuff is expensive, but I‚Äôm SO glad I finally took the plunge.  I‚Äôve finally found the perfect foundation for me.  I have normal to oily skin and I think this works great on my skin.  The finish is so beautiful.  It looks just like skin but better.  I have pretty good skin but I like to use foundation to just even things out a little.  It‚Äôs definitely not full coverage so if you‚Äôre looking for full coverage you won‚Äôt like this.  I‚Äôd say more light-medium coverage, which is perfect for me and what I like.  It looks so natural and you can‚Äôt even tell it‚Äôs on.  It feels great on the skin, not sticky or tacky, and just melts into your skin and looks radiant.  I don‚Äôt know what magic they put in this but I‚Äôm a customer for life.  I‚Äôm also glad they offer this in the smaller size since I don‚Äôt wear makeup often, so this will last me quite a while.  If you‚Äôre on the fence, go ahead and take the plunge.  I promise you won‚Äôt regret it.

I wanna start off with saying that this indeed is the best foundation Iv tried. The finish is beautiful & it looks like my skin but wayyyy better. (I have normal/dry skin). Although, I really do wish Armani would come out with more in between shades. I have 3.5 for winter & 5.75 summer. The only way I can wear this foundation is by mixing it.. I have tried finding other foundations just for color purposes but no luck. If the color ain't right then I just can't. I wish I could wear this by itself.... ARMANI GET IT TOGETHER!!! ( help us olive girls out) ps I feel the color are going for a fake tan? I have natural olive skin with more of a yellow undertone. These shades are either to orangey or pink.

It was my first foundation after using BB cream for several years. However, I heard the terrible things that BB cream was doing to my skin so I decided to purchase my first foundation. It was too oily for my liking. Didnt cover my imperfections, but it's light-weight and perfect for summer. Not my HG foundation though.

reviews.review_title: where have you been all this time
reviews.review_text: Been looking for a dewy but long lasting, light - med coverage foundation for such a long time. Kept going back and forth with myself with should I buy it or not because the price for one foundation this hurts lol. But boy was it worth every penny. It's sheer coverage but can build to med. Gives you that dewy look without it looking like ur all oily. I got colored matched at a local sephora after I order a shade way to light. When I got it the second time it matched me perfectly  loved it so much I got the powder as well to set with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: i think i have finally found my hg foundation. i love this foundation. I used to use the Givenchy Photo Perfection foundation and it worked really well when i had oily skin but recently my skin has become more and more dry and this has just made my skin look so amazing.
I have tried a number of foundations, and this one is by far my favorite.  It provides medium coverage which can be built up with additional layers.  I feel it looks very natural.

Nc20 = 4 . I really wanted to love this product. Unfortunately, I don't have perfect skin. I'm not acne prone but I do have a blemish here and there. I even used a primer and for some reason the product just did not stick on my skin. I don't have extremely oily skin so I don't know why it didn't stick to my skin. It was extremely light coverage although I was aware it was light but I did not think it was that light coverage. I did apply two coats but it just wasn't enough. It feels great but it just didn't work with my skin. I used a kabuki brush and a beauty blender but no luck . I did sadly have to return the product. if you were looking for medium or anything more than medium coverage this is not your product. If you are acne prone or even with the blemish here and there this is not your product. If you're looking for a foundation that will last you for your 9-to-5 this is not your product . If you live anywhere where it's hot and you sweat this is not your product . If you're just looking for a expensive foundation that evens out your skin with no coverage this is the perfect foundation.

I had such high hopes for this, the words silky and full coverage( buildable)really sold and the brand of course. I just finished my first bottle and I hated it. I didn't want to add a $60 product to the graveyard drawer so I stuck with it and absolutely not again. I'm light skinned warm tone and I used number 4 which was not the perfect match at all, way too orange but the only one that was close from the light shades. As for dry skin it was fine it didn't create the tightening feeling and that the reason why I bought it mostly because my skin was suffering from dryness. Now coverage, I would say light medium side and building up for my skin it made me  more orange in those areas applied or would crease badly and the other thing I hated was how it would show pores on my nose and yes I did use a primer. The only reason I gave two stars its because of texture I loved how smooth it felt when you put it on your face and easy to apply it, very pleasing and I liked the light smell to it. I also hoped it had glow to it like a beautiful dewy glow. It feels like it should since it says silky but no glow anywhere in my face. All the pictures I have taken while wearing this all show my face orange and if I zoom in you could see my blemishes. This were things that I experienced and think of it and I wish it could be better for the money. There are cheaper foundations that are way better.
My holy grail foundation. I love mixing this with the Koh gen do foundation. It's simply flawless. Will be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have gone through so many foundations through the years and I became so tired of not being able to find one that I loved UNTIL I found this one ! I was so impressed by how light-weight it is, the buildable coverage, the flawless effect it gives the skin etc. I have oily/combo skin and this saved my entire makeup routine. I am sad that the price tag is so hefty but I truly believe this is the only foundation that has provided all the things I have looked for in a foundation. Definitely recommend !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: IMO, this would not be a good foundation for anyone with very dry, mature skin. I don't think it has any luminosity to it at all. It is very matte on my skin. It managed to creep into every crevice on my face. It is very lightweight, but can be built up a little bit. I have a feeling it might break me out too. It's going back tomorrow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If  you want your face to shine like a disco ball this is the foundation for you. Not only does it lack any coverage, it clumps gold glitter into every flaw, pore and wrinkle,You will look like a clown!

My new favorite foundation! I've been using the Urban Decay Naked foundation for almost a year, but I needed a new foundation shade for the summer, so I thought I'll give this one a try. The formula is super light and buildable, makes you feel like you're not wearing any makeup. I have combination skin,  and so far this foundation hasn't make my face cakey yet. Just make sure you use setting powder and setting spray after using this foundation, and you should be good to go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BUY BUY BUY it's a must you will not be disappointed! It lives up to it's name it really feels like Silk your skin feels absolutely flawless!

There's a reason after all these years this foundation is still a best seller... Anyone remember that crying kimoji tweet where Kim kardashian freaked out by the news that this foundation would be discontinued, this gives a nice coverage, especially in my T zone area. It does not cover my acne scars but I have darker pigmentation than most. I remember trying this when I was younger when I acneic oily skin. I didn't like it as much (and I used maybe a bottle or two?) and continued searching for foundation. Now that I am older and have become drier/combo T zone I like this a lot. Even my derm loves this foundation.   But the con of this besides it not being able to cover scars? The color matching- I can not make sense of the numbering. I am darker than Kim K and I liked 5.5. She mixes 7 and 9... a youtuber that I normally wear the same foundation color as was too pink on me... The 6.25. Another blogger likes the 7.5.... From what I've seen, if you want a bit of pink, go for a number that has .25. If you are like me and are olive/yellow tone, stick with a .5 number. I will try the 6.5 to see if that matches me better. If you want something a tad more luminous try the new ysl foundation.

I'm obsessed with this foundation! It's dewy, without looking oily, and covers pretty well if you use a concealer. I use this for nights out or days where I'm trying to look more glam than others. It's not full coverage, but I'm sure it could be if you put on more than one layer. Knock down because expensive...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like this foundation a bit too liquidy and the coverage is not great. If you want a light coverage foundation this would be ok.

I love this foundation! It has a great consistency and can be built up beautifully despite it being a more sheer foundation. It blends nicely, but dries a bit quickly while working with it. It adds a nice glow to the face without looking wet or sparkly. My only other complaint besides drying quickly is that it doesn't last as long as I'd like (about 7-8 hours)

Have never liked any foundation as much!  At 63, it's hard to find good foundations that don't sit on the skin well.  This is the perfect weight and coverage for me and the color matches perfectly.  Many color options. I tried this on the recommendation of Cindy Joseph of the Boom Stick. A former makeup artist and gorgeous at 62.  She used it in a demonstration video for her products and it looked great.   Highly recommend this for the older women!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's a Good Foundation! Just one issue doesn't last all day. But great coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My thought/experience on foundation BEFORE: Choose lighter shade so that my face look flawless like a porcelain doll. After hundreds of disappointment with drugstore foundation, Estee Lauder DW used to be my holy grail then few months later I swear to God I hate that foundation. That day was my last day of using foundation. I would avoid liquid foundation at all cost and switched to Bare Minerals Powder Foundation. I tried Laura Mercier and hated it. Same goes to Dior Skin. Amore Pacific CC compact also not my cup of tea.  After Giorgio Armani: This is the best foundation ever! I don't feel like wearing makeup at all! You can still see some of my hormonal pimples on my forehead ( I used NARS creamy concealer to cover them) but other than that IT LOOKS REALLY NATURAL AND SKIN-LIKE. Exactly what I'm looking in foundation. Now I know why I avoid wearing foundation for almost one and a half year, it is because those foundations that I used have a very thick consistency and they masked my skin couldn't breathe and I can't wait to wipe my face off! I got mine in the shade 6. Not all people will love this foundation but for those who love natural/minimal makeup would definitely love this. I would definitely repurchase regardless of the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best foundations. Looks natural and stays on 12+ hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many foundations including Nars, Kat Von D, Cover Fx, It, Benefit etc.... Nothing compares to this foundation. It feels so light on my face like I have nothing on. It blends very well... And it also does not cake up. I have oily skin but this kept my oil under control. LOVE this foundation... Will definitely be repurchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation, I find that I can build on it very easily and smoothly.  Feels good and doesn't cake or feel piled on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted something with more coverage.  The finish is great and application was easy.  I'm sure I could have achieved more coverage with by layering it but I'm the type to just like 1 application.  I walked outside and it held up pretty good especially living in Florida.
This is the BEST foundation out there! If you don't think so I dare you to find something better!

I've finally found my perfect foundation. I use the lightest shade (2) and it couldn't match my skin better. The undertone is perfect and the coverage and finish is everything I've been looking for in a foundation. DEFINITELY worth the money! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Currently, my favorite makeup base. Extremely light and lasts well for hours

I recently purchased this after seeing how many people love it. I got a sample and as soon as I applied it to my face for the first time, I was in love. It is super light weight yet it has this incredible pigmentation giving you medium to full coverage. A little definitely goes a long way. It truly makes your skin look like luminous silk. I totally recommend it!
This foundation is perfect for everyday use but it is also perfect for night outs it stays in place it feels great I feel like the longer I have it on the prettier it looks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep buying it just bought my third bottle. My go to foundation every time I need it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down my new favorite foundation ever. This foundation literally makes me look airbrushed! I love the dewy effect it leaves, it's heavy coverage but not cakey, just everything I have ever wanted in a foundation. You are definitely getting what you paid for.
best foundation I've ever used. Gives a beautiful finish and a nice light medium coverage.
This stuff is amazing!! I soooo love it!!!

I have tried for 15 years to find a color that matched my skin tone AND give me a full coverage at the same time (while not drying out my skin). This stuff is amazing! It's great for all seasons, over moisturizer, mixed with oil or illuminating serum! My fav!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Background: oily T-zone, oily forehead, and slightly dry chin and cheeks; prone to breakouts. Habits: washes face at in morning and night, followed by toner, moisturizer accordingly. I have tried and finished bottles of foundation from many different companies, and Giorgio Armani's Luminous Silk foundation is the first (and hopefully last) foundation that has ever broken me out. I am prone to getting pimples, so the first FOUR TIMES I got pimples from switching to this new foundation, I blamed it on my skin/hormones. Eventually, I realized during the weeks I go without foundation, I have next to zero pimples, and the day immediately after me wearing the foundation, as if there were some timer, a new pimple pops up without fail.
