It barely covers any of my pimples, unless I layer it on 3 times -- by then it would look horrible and cakey. It does not control oiliness, and in fact exacerbate it. I'd have it on for maximum 3 hours, my forehead and nose starts getting extremely shiny -- EVEN WITH MATTIFYING POWDER. Too bad I missed the 30 day period window because I waited too long to try this on, or else I would have returned it in a heartbeat. It exacerbates break outs, oiliness, and does not cover pimples, only adds more texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried to find the right foundation and was SO hoping this was the one. Unfortunately, it is not. It is too sheer for what I am looking for and only lasts half a day. It also comes off when I touch my face or hold my phone to my ear.  On the Pro side, it is oil free and does not cause my sensitive, combination skin to break out. I just expected more for the money I paid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this foundation. It glides effortlessly onto the skin like silk, as the name suggests.  The finish is a healthy looking, natural skin finish.  This foundation does give medium to full coverage as advertised, but since it is so lightweight, it doesn't seem like full coverage. I have used every foundation out there and this is my absolute favorite!

I soooo loved this foundation it felt great on my skin it was nice coverage light weight Luminious and it looked awesome EXCEPT FOR THE FACT that they do NOT cater to fair skin tones at aaalllll even the lightest shade looked completely rediculous on me and when I tried to lighten it it didn't work because it still look super tan and I have pink undertones when this has mainly yellow undertones like no I have nooo idea how jeffree star can use this cause I'm as pale as he is and yet he doesn't look weird with it but I look like a freak so I had to return it :( please come out with more shades!!
The coverage is perfect. I don't use it as my everyday only when I need that coverage but it's amazing. I can't complain I love it. It's thin and gives you that coverage you need. I'll buy it gain.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second time purchasing this foundation, I cringe every time because of the price but it is so worth it this is one of my very favorite foundations! I have oily skin and I know there are people who say this can't work for people who are oily but it does its beautiful. Don't be scared by the 'luminous' this is not a dewey finish at all in my opinion. I have the YSL touche eclat old formulation and that is dewey, this is like a satin finish. Not super full coverage but the finish and look this gives makes up for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been searching for a foundation for many years.  I've found a few that were very nice but always had issues with finding the correct shade given I have neutral undertones and this seems to be elusive regardless of the price point.  I don't know why I decided to give this foundation a try as most of the reviews are very lukewarm but I am so glad I did.  I have very dry skin and have boughts of very flaky skin.  This foundation does not make the texture of my skin worse in appearance, provides great coverage, does not break down into a patchy mess after a full day of wear and comes in a travel size so I can afford to purchase two shade and mix a custom color perfect for my skin tone.  If you have dry mature skin and love a velvet like finish, this is worth a try.

At first I loved this foundation, but with time I was disappointed. It leaves a gorgeous dewy glow, but even when set with powder and spray, I found that 5 hours into my day I felt extremely greasy and lost my coverage which was already very light for my preference. I have drier skin so I've never experienced the shine that was all over my face mid day. I bought it without checking over the price and when I learned later how much I paid for it I was extra upset. I also went thru it super fast. Was gone in 2-3 months.

This is my absolute favourite foundation! I literally spent months trying to find the perfect foundation. I tried make up forever HD, Est√©e double wear, Lanc√¥me, Laura Mercier, Too faced born this way, nothing compared to this. I'm combination but mostly oily. I was nervous that this would be too luminous, but no it's perfect! It looks so natural, blends super well into my skin. You can't even tell I'm wearing foundation. Lasts all day! When I come home from an 8 hour work day, it's still perfect! Usually foundation separates on my nose and chin, but not this one. I use the hourglass veil primer, together it is perfection. Don't hesitate, just buy it! Well worth the price tag :)

I waited forever to buy this product but after much hype I finally purchased it and I'm so glad I did. Love this foundation and what it does for my skin. Goes on beautifully, never cakes. And the finish is natural! I do set it with powder to ensure long lasting application. Will be repurchasing!
Love this foundation! I have clear skin that just needs the skin tone evened out and it's great. Had to return it due to the shade being a bad match-hoping they'll add more shades so I can try again.

Where can I begin this product is a life saver I have pale dry skin which are both horrible to cater for when looking for a foundation but this for sure is my go to I brought it risking the price and I have to admit it's better than my Nars for more colour range for paler girls I brought mine from feel unique because I'm pale
I'm not a person that buys expensive foundation. But holy moly this foundation did change my life.

honestly i really wanted to love this foundation. upon first applicaion i did!! my color match matched my skin color really well in person (although it looked too light in photographs so maybe it was too light lol), and it DOESNT look cakey at ALL. omg. i love high end foundations for that so much, i literally layer and layer and it still looks bomb. BUT. the coverage is super light, so it takes me a couple layers till im happy. i then set with laura merciers (i use her oil free primer too) translucent powder, and i LOVE the look. for maybe 2 hours. this literally just wipes off my skin so quickly, and i didnt even think i was that oily of a human :( it just doesnt last on my face at all, and i really wish it did. maybe this is amazing for dry skinned girls but i wouldnt recommend it for anyone who considers themself a bit oily. overhyped i think :/

I was a little hesitant to purchase at first. Due to the hype from YouTube gurus and magazines, so on and so forth. Then I went into the Sephora at Downtown Disney, tried a bit on my skin and wow!!! I loved the feeling. Word of caution it is a bit runny, a little on the heavy side. A little bit goes a long way. For the summer I wouldn't recommend so much, however for fall, winter or celebrate inside with AC. Your face will look flawless. Airbrush look, smooth to touch and little to no transfer. Blends so beautiful to. I will be purchasing this from now on.
This foundation is beautiful. I liked how it made my skin look ALL day. I have dry skin and this really worked for me. Great coverage, very light feel.

Wanted to upgrade to a real foundation after using a tinted moisturizer forever. Absolutely love it. Perfect amount of coverage, hides what needs to be hidden but your freckles can still show through! Very natural look, smooth finish. Couldn't be happier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have had so many people recommend this and I finally got around to sampling it and have been completely disappointed. The coverage is light to medium and washes my skin out; it doesn't appear luminous at all. It went on very matte.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this, I really did. I've been getting samples from this every now and then because I just couldn't commit to the full price. A couple months ago, I fell in love with another foundation and everything about it was just great. Totally forgot about Luminous Silk until I went back to the store for new foundation. I decided that since I've always been getting samples, I would just splurge this time instead of the other foundation. Tried it on, wasn't in love. I thought it was because I applied makeup on top of a not clean face. Next day, applied it to a clean face. Wasn't in love. Tried exfoliating my face. Still not in love. Tried different primers. Nope. It isn't a bad foundation! There are so many pros, but it really just is average. If I had bought it for about the price of my other foundations ($35-$45), I really wouldn't care much, but the stark price difference (I can literally buy new lipstick with the difference) is not worth it for this product if you're already in love with your current foundation.   Additionally... All the darker colors seemed to have a red or yellow tint. I couldn't find one in my shade that was just purely neutral.

I bought this foundation reluctantly after seeing so many people rave about it. It's pricey but so worth it. I have normal skin, maybe a little on the oily side but this foundation is beautiful. I wouldn't use it in the summer just because I get dewy on my own but colder less humid weather... And this is my holy grail!! Great coverage and such smooth looking skin

As high end foundations go, this is average. Years ago when I first switched to high end foundations I loved this. Now that I've tried other high end foundations, I find this to be just average. I do think it photographs better than it looks in real life. The lasting power is decent, but it doesn't get me through an entire work day. It's best when my skin is good. I have dry skin and sometimes have dry patches. This catches on any flakes, so I can't use this if things aren't going nearly perfectly on my face. It's more of a semi matte foundation that has a flattering glow in photos. Again, this is best in photography. Honestly though, I have other foundations that are flattering in real life as well as photography.
I like this foundation on my good skin days. It does make it look silky but doesn't cover much. I probably won't repurchase this since it's so expensive. Not really worth it!

This foundation is okay im not obsessed with it.... For the price it needs to be more than just an okay foundation, I have a few bottles Of it and the other formulation they discontinued and i honestly prefer the one they discontinued whats up with brands discontinuing a thing thats already good thinking they can make it better.... Smh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was soo excited to try this foundation, because im so extremely dry, and everyone raves about how this foundation is amazing for dry skin. I had put off purchasing this because it was so expensive, but I finally bit the bullet and bought it.. I was so disappointed.. it creases SO bad especially around my mouth, it makes me look 10 years older.. returned it.
It feels nice and light but not what I expected for the price.  Not exactly what I was looking for, but will use it some.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: must have foundation if you have more dry skin. I have trouble finding foundation that won't adhere to dry areas on the face but this foundation is amazing! very silky and natural. you can build it up if you want more coverage. well worth it!
Hands down my one and only holy grail. Nothing else compares.

Love the colour match I'm shade 5, it's a bit pricey and I have dry/dry combination skin. I love how it looks I wish it was more full coverage and it has a tendency to crease around the mouth and on my forehead.. For the price, I expected a little more.

I have really dry skin , I was getting supper hyped up about this foundation when I go it and heard good reviews . It is very light coverage but looks beautiful and dewy except around my nose , my nose area is super dry and this just makes it 100x times horrible I've tried everything but I've come to realize this foundation doesn't work for me the nose are is patchy and dry and my Marc Jacobs foundation that it's full coverage doesn't do that , none of my foundations do that but this one. Not worth the money . Too dry around my nose area and patchy.
For $62, I expected this foundation to blow me out of the water & it doesn't whatsoever. I have dry skin & it just makes me look oily & almost looks crumbly. Not impressed.

I have very dry skin now that am on my middle 20's and foundations always crease on me and make look dull. I also have a hard time finding a good shade for my medium, yellow golden skintone (hard to explain). I find myself needing to exfoliate more to get rid of flaky dry skin and I wear lots of moisturizer. I bought this foundation in number 6. When I swatched this on my face and neck it literally disappeared it was a perfect match. I wore this with a little bit of primer just on my T Zone and it looks and sits so beautiful on my skin. I didn't even set it just to truly test it and it did not crease or ball up with my dry skin, it also gives me a healthy glow and does not feel like I am wearing anything. The coverage is sheer to medium which is perfect for me since I've never had acne and I just have very little redness around my nose. I can see how this foundation is not for everyone but it works wonders with dry skin. In my opinion this foundation is worth every dollar and I only have to use very little to get perfect skin blending with my beautyblender. If you have dry skin ask for a sample, you will love this!

Love this foundation! If you're wanting heavy coverage then don't get this, but otherwise it's beautiful and looks very natural. I love it! I do see a lot of people complaining about the lighter coverage, but it does say that it is lightweight! So just keep that in mind.
There isn't anything special about this -- especially since it's $62. It just looks normal with mediocre coverage.

I really didn't want to love this foundation lol.... I waited a really long time to try it because of the price... Sad to say, it 1000% lives up to the reviews!!! I purchased the 3.75, and I have never had a foundation match my skin more perfectly. It is a little less coverage than I usually prefer, but it is buildable , and gives a beautiful luminous finish..   That being said, because of the price, this probably won't be my foundation for every day use. But it's definitely staying in my collection and I will repurchase a bunch of times lol
Lightweight, airy, and works well with my dry skin. Normally I would never pay this much for foundation but after a free sample, I had to have it. So worth the money!

I've been on the hunt for my perfect foundation forever, who hasn't? Well I've found it. The shade match is phenomenal, and the finish is like skin. It's lightweight and luminous and wears well throughout the day. It is on the pricey side, but the only other foundation I've found that compares is the Bareskin by Bare Minerals.
This thing is amazing! By far the best foundation I've used

I have dry skin but don't always want a dewy look. I look for a more satin finish or demi matte. This foundation on its own is super super luminous and glowy so if you're into that you'll love it. But I also set my face with a little translucent powder and get the finish I want. I think this foundation is beautiful, natural looking, and versatile. I also struggle with makeup staying on my face for whatever reason no foundation would stay on my face no matter how I primed or set it. But this stays in place all day. New holy grail!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using the Est√©e Lauder DW stay in place foundation for so long I wanted to try this foundation out. It is amazing. I have oily skin, and yet this foundation does not make me look super oily, and it looks just like skin. It has a very good coverage and it lasts a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal to dry skin and this foundation gives me a beautiful radiant finish. The foundation provides a light to medium coverage, which I love!
This foundation was amazing, I was hesitating to buy it in the beginning but I'm obsessed with it, it gives my skin such a luminous and flawless texture I love it. Would definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: of all the foundations i have tried over the years, this is by far the most fantastic. It is so light weight for everyday use and is buildable if you want more coverage. I use this with the Giorgio Armani illuminating primer and my skin looks fab! A must have in my opinion and worth every dollar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing foundation, one of the best I have tried. The product glides on smooth, has excellent coverage and does cake on. I really like that I can add more of the product to a enhance my coverage. Very satisfied customer !

Absolutely love this foundation. I tried many others before I finally settled for this one. Completely melts in my face and the end result is very natural. I do not like the caked let finish . So this is just awesome
Love it! My go to must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this foundation after reading so many great reviews but sadly ended up returning it. It was just average and for the price tag I didn't think it was worth it. There wasn't anything bad that I can point out but I found another cheaper brand that looked better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, let me preface this by saying I never, ever thought I would be OK with spending this much money on foundation. Not to say that I use drugstore makeup (on my face) or anything, because I have learned from experience that you get what you pay for, but the $62 price tag on this was really hard for me to swallow. I only decided to try it out (they don't have this in my local Sephora for me to get a sample) because I had the 15% off coupon and I figured that would be the best time to give in and splurge just to see what everyone was raving about. Well now I'm hooked. See, I had been using the Clinique Beyond Perfecting foundation and I was in love with it. It lasted all day and controlled my oil which was the only foundation I could find that would do that AND was affordable. I had tried this and really liked it, but I thought the Clinique foundation was the answer because of its price. Then my face started to break out horribly and I couldn't figure out why. I tried switching up my skincare, changing my daily routine, nothing worked. Then I remembered around the time that my issues started was after I'd been using the Clinique for a few days. I decided to try wearing this very expensive Luminous Silk foundation for a week, going back to my normal skincare routine, as well. Low and behold, after about three days my acne slowly started to diminish. This Giorgio Armani wears beautifully and it lasts ALL DAY. My oil does not come through, and my skin responds well to it - no breakouts or irritation. I do set it with Laura Mercier translucent powder. I put my foundation on at around 6:30 in the morning and by about 6:00 in the evening, it still looks great, with ZERO touch ups throughout the day. I'm sorry for the lengthy review, ladies, but if you're on the fence about this one because of the price, it is worth every penny. Buy it!
I have dry skin and this foundation gives me life! Doesn't settle in fine lines! I'm in love!

this foundation is literally amazing. it looks so natural and beautiful when applied with a beauty blender. sometimes when i'm too lazy to wet my beauty blender i spray some tatcha face mist on it and it gives my face an amazing glow.
It's very silly with medium coverage. Natural finish with glow. Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Foundation is weird and maybe this is just one of those products that is not a good fit for my particular skin type, but after reading a lot of hype (and the above-average price tag), I was really expecting a great foundation. Instead I found it... ok?  But honestly  I've seen drugstore foundations perform as well, so given the price I can't recommend. I found it dry, very hard to blend, and cakey. Also very hard to layer if you want to build more coverage.  I tried it with a couple of different primers and none really changed my opinion.   For the record, my skin is fairly dry and I was looking for something lightweight with a luminous finish.  It is lightweight, but not in a good way, as it didn't really melt into my skin the way a good foundation does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I literally have no words to describe this foundation, i looks amazing on the skin... i makes my skin glow.. Its just so beautiful.
Love it so much it does not last a whole day though and at the end of the day you will look like a greasy hot dog but when you first apply it it looks like heaven

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this foundation and loved the way it felt on the skin, the coverage & glow it provided, but the color (5.5) was too dark. I am ordering it in 5, and it will be hands down my favorite foundation if I can match it to my skin tone

I actually like this formula more than the equivalent by Yves. It feels weightless on my skin, it doesn't slide in my oily areas at all, and it is a full enough coverage to make everything perfectly uniform. If blends effortlessly, and seems to just melt into my skin tone to create a perfect colour match. If you are like me, and have that cool skin tone with a slight greyish undertone, this colour will match up exactly! I recommend applying with a beauty blender.

reviews.review_title: Natural finish very light but very low coverage.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It looks very natural on skin but it has very low coverage even less than a cc cream it very light liquidy. I think it just got too much hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i was a little hesitant to buy this product at first because it was a little on the pricey side. but girl let me tell you!! it is the biggest bang for your buck. when i was at the store, the sephora employee who was helping me said that it's light to medium coverage, but after using it, i disagree 100% - this is a full coverage foundation. i use this most when i'm trying to create a glam makeup look (going out, events, weddings, etc).  the only thing i would have to say about this product though, is that if you have super dry skin like myself, use a hydrating primer (like the Smashbox photo finish hydrating primer) before you wear this primer because i found that after 3-4 hours of wearing it, my dry patches were showing a little bit  other than that, if you're worried about the price, it's worth it honey!

I have to admit, I checked this out because I read that Kim K was crazy about it. I had never spent this much on foundation before, but I decided to take the plunge. The fragrance was light and clean. The coverage is medium but buildable. I actually had to buy 2 colors to create my perfect shade but I love it. My skin always has a healthy glow now. Worth it.
I don't usually go for the dewy look but this foundation feels so nice on the skin. Full coverage but light weight. Definitely worth it.

I was leary due to the cost. However it is the best foundation i have ever used. It goes on so smooth. It's flawless. Covers all my imperfections. I don't even feel like i have any foundation on. And u only nedd 1 maybe 2 pumps to cover entire face. So u don't need much. Highly recommend

I have spent so much money trying to find the perfect foundation. I am so so so happy I have finally found it. I was hesitant to purchase because of the price, but let me tell you it is sooo worth it. This stuff is literally skin. It never cakes and looks so natural. I am so happy to have found my hg foundation!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am yet to find a better foundation. Amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IF YOU ARE NOT A PREGNANT WOMAN: I have been using the Armani Foundation for about three years now, and I have to say it is one of the two bests (the other one being Guerlain's Lingerie de Peau).  It's thin and light weight, yet the coverage is perfect for someone who doesn't have major blemishes. My skin is combination leaning toward oily, but Armani foundations (both Luminous Silk and Maestro) have never given me any pimples or skin clogging. Just wonderful. My skin does get a bit oily toward the later half of the day, but my foundation looks flawless again as soon as I dab the excess oil away. So the stuff is pretty long lasting. Depends on the moisturizer I use underneath, the finish ranges from matte to a semi-matte with a subtle sheen, which is very healthy looking. My makeup always applies so easily on top of this. The foundation infuses so well with the skin that it is not really detectable, and it never cakes up. Great product and super worthy. HOWEVER, IF YOU ARE PREGNANT: Unfortunately this product contains both methylparaben and butylparaben. UGH!!! Why? Methylparaben is not that huge of a problem, but butylparaben might increase the chance of birth defects :( I'm extremely disappointed to find out about the ingredients because now I have to stay away from this wonderful product until the baby is born. I would so have given this foundation a 10 stars otherwise. But it is just NOT COOL for such a high end product to contain potentially harmful substance :(

Best foundation for photos hands down. I reached 25yrs and I switched from bare minerals to Armani! I love it and it looks incredible and flawless, make sure you blend! I can't believe I went my entire life without this product, can't live without it now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never been using a foundation all my life till I reached 24 and I said I had to. The reason was that I never found one that can give me flawless look on my dry/reddish skin type and VERY sensitive on top of that. This is amazing specially if you moisture well and dab all over face gives a glowy fresh look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I finally found a foundation that I can wear with confidence.  I received this as a sample, thankfully, because I would have NEVER tried it on my own.  Purchased the full size, yes pricey, BUT worth every penny.  This does not fade from my face, or melt off.  LOVE LOVE LOVE.

I really wanted to love it especially because the price! I have dry to very dry skin blemishes that I want to hind, but the only thing is  it was too dark for my pale skin I tried the palest Shades and still was easy 1 to 2 shades too dark. It also just wasn't the as full coverage as I like it was a sheer to light coverage for me

I have tried many foundations and this one is the best.  It is more expensive then many others however your skin looks so natural almost like you do not have any makeup on at all but perfect.  It is build-able as I do need full coverage and I can get the coverage I need from this.  I would recommend this foundation to all.

This one is amazing - it's the foundation I've been looking for years. I have used YSL fusion foundation and other foundation before, some of them looks really nice when I finish the makeup, but all of them will fade away after few hours. The only way to prevent this awkward situation is to add one drop of facial oil so that I won't hate my face after backing to home. The Armani LSF don't need this step - it last long and almost won't fade away on my combination skin even after 10 hours. Worth every penny!

Received a sample of this and wow. Usually for me the samples aren't even enough for half my face but such a small amount provided full flawless coverage. It felt like nothing was on my face. It lasted through heat and a full day of party. Buying the full size now.

This foundation is LIFE. Got a sample of this product and it is the BEST I ever had! I guess it all depends on the type of finish you like- but, if you like a semi-dewy (or satin) look for your skin but when you touch it it FEELS just like skin and it's as if you're wearing nothing at all than this is it!!!! I know a lot of commenters mentioned the lighter coverage and I would have to disagree. Foundation should enhance not cover entirely, and you can always place some corrector/concealer over the spots that need it while using this product. If that still doesn't work then....perhaps you need to focus more on your skincare regime and step away from makeup until all else is in order.

reviews.review_title: Gold standard was a correct assessment
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Turning 47 this year. It doesn't bug me but I've hit that 'me' moment. Not out of necessity, but out of I've never really had that moment. So, I was happy with my current foundation (used forever) but my skin has been changing and therefore my foundation was not far behind... I heard this was the 'gold standard' of foundations and thought I'd try it. Time to get 'serious about skincare' and all that. I've always had oily skin but not acne prone so using moisturizers was detrimental as well as acne or oil control products. If you can be oily-normal, that was me. Now I'm beginning to dry up a little via age so I've hit 'Combination' skin. Back to my review: Long story short, It's the gold standard. I used Sephora's color IQ business ONLINE and punched in my previous brand's foundation and concealer colors and received my number of 1R07, showing me my Geo Armani luminous silk foundation color match of 5.25 --- I hit go, got it, and yep, it was a perfect match to my skin color. No mall trip, no people, two thumbs up. Held up to to my dry AND oily areas, zero product 'feel' on my face, and held up well after 8 hours, not perfect, but better than any other foundation I've ever used. Underneath i had Lancome Genifique and a daily moisturizer w/ SPF 20. Used my old brand of concealer with zero consistency or color contradictions. *oh, and trust the video, you can add more of this to conceal problem areas

reviews.review_title: Best foundation I have ever used
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing. I love bare minerals and am a fan of Chanel liquid foundations and the Born This Way Foundation, but this one takes the cake. I have very sensitive, combination skin (dry face and oily t-zone) and this formula makes my skin glow and look like I have second skin that's flawless!!

I've tried to start loving cheaper foundations Because this is so pricey but it lasts me a long time so it's totally worth it and the quality is amazing. I have extremely sensitive skin, like u try and put a peel on me and my skin will turn red instantly, and this foundation is so gentle! Totally worth the money

EVERY girl is simply out to find their perfect beauty regimen,foundation is the most important. This is the BEST hands down! Ive tried it ALL..id pay 300$ a bottle for this BC it's THAT amazing! Maestro is what I mix with this :)
This is the best foundation I have ever used! So smooth and silky, provides a perfect amount of coverage without caking. Doesn't clog my pores and doesn't run either. A must buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample, and I have to say I am not impressed. The actual formulation is extremely sheer, and it takes a lot of formula to build up to medium coverage. It is strongly scented like a dry rose smell, something someone 60+ would like. Not worth the hype.
Just beautiful. Looks great on my mother and grandmother too. Worth the splurge.

I was so disappointed. I have oily skin but other foundations have lasted so much better. This foundation wipes off my skin like melted butter. At all times: after application, after setting, after a few hours... it just comes right off!!!!!!!!!!!! The only positive thing about it is that it didn't make my acne prone skin breakout. It's such a shame it doesn't set on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so beautiful! It gives my face a beautiful silk finish. It doesn't clog my pores, and it leaves my face feeling smooth. If you're on the fence about this, GET IT! You will not regret it!

First off -- the color codes for this foundation is super-confusing (eg, 5.5 and 5.75 are VERy different...), so make sure you get matched in store before buying a full bottle!   Once you figure out your shade, though, this is an amazing light/mid-weight foundation. Lasts all day, looks totally natural, and doesn't feel heavy or clog pores at all. A bottle lasts forever -- I use mine 5 days a week and have been going strong for more than 6 month, with still more left to go. Highly recommend!
This foundation is everything. My skin looks so luminous and hydrated. It blends beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation I've ever used. I've been using this foundation for a couple years now and I just won't try anything else, even though this is a bit pricey.  It's completely worth it - goes on incredibly smooth, color is perfect, gives full coverage and stays on all day.

The price tag on this baby is rather high.  But let me tell you...     This is truly an amazing foundation.  One pump covers my entire face (I use the urban decay optical blurring brush to blend) and then I set it with a light dusting of Nars translucent setting powder.  Oh my...  My skin looks airbrushed, soft, silky and like I'm not wearing makeup.  As if I clicked some kind of glowy blurring filter on Instagram that instantly makes your skin look better ;).   I wore it all day with no fading issues and it gave just the right amount of coverage.  I'd say the best part was how easily it applied.  It is so silky and blends like a dream.  I'm glad I don't go through foundation quickly because of the price tag.  I can definitely see this being a repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I am combo skin (on the cliff of oily) skin so I was REALLY worried on how this would turn out on my skin. After all, there is a fine line between looking dewy and fried chicken.  I felt like 2 pumps is enough to cover your small flaws. It gave me all the glow in all the right directions and I hated the fact that I love it so much because IT'S. SO. EXPENSIVE.   In my video, I wore the foundation on for 13 hours and it still looked sooooo beautiful on me! I gave you much more details in my video. The review starts at 11:06!

I was very hesitant to purchase this foundation because of the price tag but I am so glad I did!!! The coverage is medium to build-able and gives the skin such a natural look! I set this with the luminous silk powder and holy cow the results are insane!! It looks so beautiful and natural like I just have perfect skin! My best makeup days are days when I wear this foundation with the powder and I couldn't be more pleased! If you are on the verge of buying it I say do it because it is worth the price tag! My skin type is totally combination, I have horrible dryness around my nose and eyes and insane oiliness on my chin and this foundation covers it all and feels very comfortable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have read so many reviews about this product online, but was never able to justify this price for foundation. I splurged one day and it was the best decision. Love this foundation!
Yes the price is steep. But the product is amazing. Luminous finish. Silk-like texture. Medium coverage. It's everything I've ever wanted in a foundation. And tons of colors for everyone!

I have combination skin and this stuff just made me so oily! I had to basically pack on powder just to fix it because I was in such a hurry to get to work. Not a fan, but still not the worst! Would work better for others but not for me.

I've been hearing about this for ages but had a hard time swallowing the price but I've now purchased 2 bottles and I have a feeling this will be a new staple in my daily routine. The name is very telling of what to expect, luminous radiant silk like skin that doesn't look at all heavy. I would call this a nice medium coverage that can easily be enhanced with a little spot concealing. On my skin it stays put all day and doesn't crease or wear off. definately worth the $60 price tag.

Girl... if you love looking l Iike a bombshell with glowing, flawless skin you need to run to Sephora and buy this, like now. Go!  This has gorgeous buildable coverage, a super natural, dewy finish.  Doesn't dry out, and just has serious magical powers. Worth the cost fo sho.  Love!!

This is my holy grail foundation right here!! I have tried literally every high end foundation and this one beats them all. I get sooo many compliments on my skin when I wear this foundation. I have oily skin and this last my entire 12 hour shift. It's so worth the money I promise you.

I don't understand the hype! It's just a normal foundation, light to buildable coverage. Price is overrated. I tried shade 8 which was dark & tried 6 which was light. The rep told me that they don't carry #7 Sephora store! So I returned both .. Waste of money.

reviews.review_title: daaaaammmnnn Giorgio, back at it again!
reviews.review_text: Definitely my favorite foundation.  It's worth the price you pay for sure. I use about 3 pumps for a full coverage on my face. I have the occasional breakouts and some acne scarring, this works like a dream. Everytime I wear it I get compliments on my skin. It's light and buildable, what more could you ask for. Ive tried 80% of the foundations on the market and I would rebuy this in a heartbeat! Yes it's expensive but it truly is worth it.

I had high expectations, but have been let down before by highly-hyped products.  I have mature, dry skin.  I typically wear more dewy finishes but now prefer this one!  It is comfortable, long wearing and provides good coverage.  Very pleased with this.  Currently I wear it only on special occasions because it is so expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I avoided this foundation like the plague.  It was over hyped and over priced and I just couldn't understand why.  I eventually caved when my local sephora finally carried it in store so I could get color matched properly.  Needless to say, it's an amazing foundation.  I have oily to combination skin and this foundation does that leave my skin feeling oily.  I actually have a glow and I love it.  So i can honestly say it is worth the hype.  I will say, i am deducting one star for the price.  I probably will repurchase, but I only chose this foundation for special occasions but if it wasn't so expensive I would wear it everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Medium coverage and you can build it up. It lasts on my combination skin a long time and gives a luminous finish to the skin. It is very natural looking.. This is one of my favorite foundation and definitely will repurchase it once I use it up.

I've been looking for a light foundation that somewhat cover for many years. I have tried BB, CC cream, and also many other brands but this one work so well. The texture of the foundation is so light and silky, I don't even feel like I have any make up on! I hesitated at the beginning because the price as high but it is so worth to purchase!

reviews.review_title: The foundation I've been looking for!
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for close to 6 months now and I absolutely love it. Easy to apply, great cover up, super lightweight, and it gives a glowing finish. The price is worth it to me. This is the foundation I've been looking for!!!

This is a really good foundation very light weight and also cover. I was afraid it was not going to work for me since i have normal to oily skin but it did I just set with powder and looks flawless on the skin! Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of Armani Luminous Silk Foundation with an order and was smitten from the moment I smoothed it on my skin. The color was a little too dark but the formula was everything I had been looking for.....flawless, medium coverage that went on like silk and gave me a luminous finish. It was a dream to apply and wear on my super dry skin. My search for the perfect foundation was over. I immediately ordered the full size product but what I received was Disappointment. The full size product's formula is much thinner than the sample and offers light coverage at best. Had the product matched the sample I would have rated this foundation 5 stars instead of 3. Even so, Armani Luminous Silk Foundation deserves high praise for the right skin type, perhaps normal to slightly dry. It absolutely applies like silk and on a less than very dry skin, I'm certain it will give the radiant look we gals crave. But, fair warning....the end result is light coverage. Yes, the foundation is buildable but if you need medium coverage, the amount of product needed to achieve that look is cost prohibitive for most.

I have THE most oily skin, all over. My face would literally look wet at the end of the day, prior to using this foundation. It goes on so smooth, and makes my skin look absolutely flawless! I was concerned about the price at first, but now that I've used it I totally justify the price. If you have oily skin, try it! It's the most beautiful foundation I've ever used!
Made me oily I ended up returning it
I had a personal session and the beauty consultant out this on me. Its super easy to apply and stays on all day. I love it.

This is a nice light to medium foundation. I use this with a damp sponge which is my number 1 technique to apply foundation. This last on me for 10 hrs if I prep properly. I will be using this foundation for my wedding. Cuz there is no flashback!

I've really been wanting to try this foundation, so I purchased the smaller one to see if I like it. And let me just say that I've never had a foundation match my skin better than this one! And I bought it online, so I couldn't sample it first! I will defiantly be repurchasing the bigger size when I run out!! Defiantly worth the money!!
I really like the formula and the color matches, however the lid leaks terribly.

Love this foundation. I have combination skin with acne scars and I'm so impressed with this foundation. It is semi matte, medium to full coverage and sits beautifully on the face. I'm so impressed by this foundation, happy to say it's worth the price.

Great foundation.. Had a little trouble finding a color to match me since I'm at suck an awkward color right now but it's hard to make it look Cakey and looks very natural. I tend to get a little oily with foundations and even after I powder my entire face oil still seems to come through. I will however will purchase this again :)
Had been wanting to buy this for a long time, and I really loved it! Awesome and beautiful packaging totally worth what I paid for

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty oily skin, so I was hesitant about trying it. I finally bit the bullet because i was sick and tired of wearing really heavy foundations targeted for oily skin. I got this and I really really like it. It has a surprising amount of coverage for something so light. It doesn't last all day, but I dont expect it to. By the end of the day, I AM oily, but it doesn't look like it separates or anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Silky, lightweight, and melts perfectly into my skin. Amazing coverage for how light it feels. The color matches better than any foundation I have used; this is the first shade I have found that is pink enough for my complexion. Stays on all day with minimal touching up. Expensive but worth it. Can't say enough.

I am super oily. I never though that this will work for me. But it does and I love this foundation. Looks so natural and it covers my imperfections. I do have to set my t-zone with powder but I do it with all my foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the formula, however the shade I got was way too light. I'm very very fair and I usually wear the lightest shade from each brand, however the lightest shade here was a 2 and was way too light. I figured I would keep it and use it to contour or mix with a darker foundation. Otherwise I would suggest trying this on in person and only ordering if you've checked out your shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation leaves my skin with a beautiful enhanced natural appearance with an exceptionally lovely finish. However, it is not long lasting. I have tried quite a few combinations of primer and powder in an attempt to keep it on my face, but with very limited success. The warmer the temperature the worse it performs. Although, even in cooler weather it never has great longevity. Therefor, this foundation is great for going out to dinner and perhaps a movie. Not so great for an 8 hour work day or an afternoon at the park, etc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was jut okay for me.  I had expected a more radiant finish.  I did return this and bought the Koh Gen Do foundation....and totally love it.

This is my holy grail foundation I have yet to find one that I love as much as I do this one take it I've tried various brands! But this one is not patchy it does not go into every fine line, pore or imperfection ! It does not make me break out or make my current break outs any worse! And last all day! It's really worth the money!!!
Love love love!!! My new favorite foundation! All those other foundations I've put to the side bc this one has taken their place.
I'm the palest shade (2) and this color matches me perfectly and it's sooooo full coverage.

I love this foundation even thought it still makes me a bit oily.. I am very oily around my nose.. I apply dr. Brandt pores no more primer on my nose, apply this foundation and apply Laura Mercier translucent powder and i still get a bit oily. I just taking blotting paper and blot around 1 or 2 times during the day. It is worth the money, try it out everyone's face reacts different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample in 5.5 and it was a PERFECT match. I loved it. The foundation also blended perfectly with my skin. It looked so natural and beautiful. I was instantly in love.  And then....2 hours later, I turned into a grease bomb. I was so oily. To note, I am very dry. Most dewy foundations on me is matte. I was surprised and powdered myself two times throughout the day which I never do. But I kept getting oily again and again.  Very weird. Maybe the luminous silk powder would work better? Not sure.
great foundation. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is what the word flawless means! Absolutely beautiful finish. I got 7.5 for my NW40 skin. It stays on all day and gives a very very smooth finish. I am in love!

MY HOLY GRAIL FOUNDATION! The most beautiful, natural, luminous foundation there is!!! It is such a beautiful formula, it's honestly hard to reach for something else on my vanity. I love this foundation so much! Definitely worth every penny! And even more beautiful if you set it with the luminous silk powder!!!!

This foundation gives me such a natural look i just love it! I know that the countainer is glass to make it more glam but honestly i wish it was in an unbreakable material...it not easy to transport and not convenient. Always worried to break it.
I have only used a sample of this foundation but I am 100 percent going to buy the full size bottle! It made my normal/dry skin look so luminous and flawless. Perfection. Holy grail. Done.

Okay, to the people who left bad reviews. Did you not even read the description box for the foundation before you bought it? It's supposed to be sheer coverage. That's why it's not very build-able and has a water like consistency. It's supposed to enhance the beauty of your natural skin. Not cover it. So stop hating on it because it's not covering blemishes or dark spots. And also if this guy designed the foundation to enhance the skin then he's amazing and deserves the $62. Not everyone needs to wear full coverage in order to look pretty.

I'm not one to write reviews but WOW!!!!! This stuff is no joke the real deal! Yes it's pricy..but its 100% worth the price! It's covers my skin perfectly. I feel like porcelain. It's not heavy, not cakey, and the colors work great with any skin tone. Whether you want a light wear or a little more foundation for evening wear, it looks amazing both ways! Super easy to match. Use it with a damp beauty blender, concealer of choice, and finish with Laura Mercier translucent loose setting powder, a light mist of setting spray of choice, and you're good to go! 100% recommended hands down an amazing product, thanks Armani :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, natural finish with full coverage. Fits perfectly to my combination and troublesome skin. I use beauty blender to put this on and the result is amazing. I definitely recommend this product!

Absolutely amazing. I've long been looking to switch from Makeup Forever's HD due to horrible color matching and even worse flash back. I have very oily skin and this works perfect for me. I use pore refiner primer and set with Laura M powder. For a night out i add de slick spray. Worth the price.

I purchased this foundation after viewing a lot of Youtubers MUA using and raving about it. And I don't regret the purchase. Is really amazing, is medium to full build-able coverage. Don't flash back in photos and stay all day/night long. I use it in my weeding and in the pictures my face looks amazing without imperfections (that I have a lot). Really recommend this foundation. I have combination skin (really dry outside and normal/oily T zone).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this foundation in hopes that it would live up to all the hype surrounding it however i did not get what i was expecting. Unless you have absolutely perfect skin this foundation is basically useless as it doesn't actually cover any imperfections other then evening out your skin tone a tad. The finish on your skin is alright but not something i would pay $75 for.

For the price of this I am pretty disappointed. I want to love it, but I just can't. It has too much of a watery consistency for my liking, it does little to no coverage unless I put 3 layers of it on. I'm just overall not impressed what so ever :(

Amazing finish but not enough coverage unless you use double your normal amount. I don't recommend for oily skin as I had to blot several times during the day. Unfortunately, this isn't the foundation for me but I can see how it could be for others!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a makeup junkie, (as i am sure a lot of Sephora customers are), my most hoarded product is foundation. i am always looking for a long lasting, full coverage, natural finish foundation. I have searched and tried so many, both high end and drugstore. I have found some great products, but none compare to this foundation. I have acne-prone skin, with a lot of redness and scarring. This foundation looks AMAZING. It truly doesn't look or feel like you are wearing a ton of makeup. I worked out with it on to test the longevity and it looked just as good after as it did when i applied it. I don't know why it took me so long to try this foundation (maybe the price). I am so glad i got it.
Love the way it glide on my skin nice coverage Finally a perfect match foundation

I reallllyyyyy wanted to love this (I mean it's 62 dollars I HAD to love it) but I really don't :( I wanted a medium coverage foundation so the associate suggested this and said it was build able. While she was right, that it is buildable, I feel like I have to use half the bottle to get any coverage. I was having to use it sparingly because if I used it everyday I would've run out way to soon and I'm not about to spend 62 dollars on foundation constantly! I have oily skin and some invented texture on my forehead so I think this foundation is better for people with really great skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation I have ever used in my entire life. I'm a VIB Rouge Member, so obviously purchase a lot of make up. I have many foundations that are good, but nothing too impressive. I bought this one about a month ago and WOW. It's beautiful, it's perfect, and it lasts ALL DAY! Over 12 hours for SURE. I have dry skin, although my nose can get a little shiny (not oily) at the end of every day. I use the Nivea shave balm as my primer with my MUFE correcting primer for redness, I apply the foundation and set with MAC mineralize skin finish powder. PERFECTION!!!!!!
I will be homeless living in a box but still use this product. I haven't worn liquid foundation since I switched to bm loose powder ten years ago. Tried this and will never no back

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this foundation after everyone online raved about it and was pretty disappointed. I know its not a full coverage foundation but to even apply it takes me about 3-4 pumps just to cover my face, and that doesn't hide any imperfections. It also creases pretty easily and doesn't smell that great (I know thats not what I'm paying for but it smells chemically and I don't like it) Also, half way through the day even after using setting spray it was starting to settle in lines and rub off.   The only positives I have about this are that it was not too oily and I am really happy with the shade- it matches really nicely to my skin without turning orange through the day.  Overall- not worth the money in my opinion.
This is very silky on the face and covers all my redness as well! And has an amazing after glow also last all day on my face!!!! Love it great quality
Love the way it glide on my skin nice coverage Finally a perfect match foundation

I reallllyyyyy wanted to love this (I mean it's 62 dollars I HAD to love it) but I really don't :( I wanted a medium coverage foundation so the associate suggested this and said it was build able. While she was right, that it is buildable, I feel like I have to use half the bottle to get any coverage. I was having to use it sparingly because if I used it everyday I would've run out way to soon and I'm not about to spend 62 dollars on foundation constantly! I have oily skin and some invented texture on my forehead so I think this foundation is better for people with really great skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation I have ever used in my entire life. I'm a VIB Rouge Member, so obviously purchase a lot of make up. I have many foundations that are good, but nothing too impressive. I bought this one about a month ago and WOW. It's beautiful, it's perfect, and it lasts ALL DAY! Over 12 hours for SURE. I have dry skin, although my nose can get a little shiny (not oily) at the end of every day. I use the Nivea shave balm as my primer with my MUFE correcting primer for redness, I apply the foundation and set with MAC mineralize skin finish powder. PERFECTION!!!!!!
I will be homeless living in a box but still use this product. I haven't worn liquid foundation since I switched to bm loose powder ten years ago. Tried this and will never no back

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this foundation after everyone online raved about it and was pretty disappointed. I know its not a full coverage foundation but to even apply it takes me about 3-4 pumps just to cover my face, and that doesn't hide any imperfections. It also creases pretty easily and doesn't smell that great (I know thats not what I'm paying for but it smells chemically and I don't like it) Also, half way through the day even after using setting spray it was starting to settle in lines and rub off.   The only positives I have about this are that it was not too oily and I am really happy with the shade- it matches really nicely to my skin without turning orange through the day.  Overall- not worth the money in my opinion.
